Over time, he decided that carpentry would be his full-time profession.

He currently works every day. Sometimes he will receive orders from his customers, but he does not work on a fixed schedule. Máximo makes doors, chairs, game tables, dining sets, desks, and tables. He wants to use the loan to buy paint, lacquer, and thinners to use on the pieces that he makes so that he can continue his business. In the future, he wants to continue working and attract more customers.

loans.use: Purchase paint, lacquer, and thinners

loans.name: Vilma Doris

texts.es:
Vilma, tiene 25 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de comida, reside en San Simón, departamento de Morazán, vive con sus padres y hermanos, es madre soltera de una niña de cuatro años;  ella está solicitando su segundo préstamo ya que este negocio lo atiende desde hace 4 años junto a su madre, desarrollándolo desde las 6:00am hasta 7:30pm, este negocio es la fuente de ingresos para cubrir las necesidades diarias del hogar.
Este préstamo lo invertirá en compra de materiales para el negocio como pollo, carnes, frijoles, aceite, vegetales estos básicamente son los que necesita diariamente para preparar los alimentos y ofrecerlos a los clientes, ella pretende tener un buen comedor, con abundantes ganancias.
Ella se propone pagar bien este préstamo para poder optar por más en un futuro y con esta ayuda dar el desarrollo deseado al negocio y garantizar el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Vilma is 25 years old and earns a living by selling food.  She resides in San Simón, Department of Morazán, with her parents and siblings.  Vilma is a single mother with a four year old daughter.  She is requesting a second loan for her business, which she has managed the past four years with her mother.  Vilma works from 6am to 7:30pm.  This business is the source of income by which she covers her daily household needs.

She will invest the loan in supplies for her business such as chicken, meat, beans, oil, vegetables, and other basic ingredients she needs every day for preparing the meals offered to her customers.  Her goal is to have a successful diner that generates plenty of revenue.

Vilma plans to repay this loan on time so that she will be eligible for more loans in the future.  With this support, she will be able to develop her business and guarantee the welfare of her family.

loans.use: Purchase chicken, meat, beans, oil, vegetables, and other ingredients

loans.name: Casilda Maria

texts.es:
Casilda es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Triunfadoras” ubicado en el distrito D. Cabanilla, provincia D. Lampa, departamento D. Puno, tiene 46 años D. edad, D. estado civil casada y con 03 hijos. La señora tiene estudios D. educación primaria incompleta.

Casilda viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 02 años, su  préstamo inicial fue D. S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital D. su negocio D. venta D. animales caseros.

Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 1500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá para comprar más animales.

Su sueño para el futuro es tener ganados mejorados. Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal son las reuniones.
texts.en:
Casilda is a member of the Communal Bank “Mujeres Triunfadoras” (Triumphant Women), which is located in the District of Cabanilla, Lampa Province, Department of Puno. She is 46 years old, married, and has three children. Casilda did not finish her elementary school education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for two years. Her first loan was in the amount of 500 PEN, which was used to increase her business capital for selling domesticated animals.

Now she is requesting a new loan of 1500 PEN to invest in the purchase of more animals. Casilda dreams of improving her income in the future. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the meetings.

loans.use: Purchase more animals to sell

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La señora Juana es socia del banco comunal El Arenal, ubicado en el Distrito de Callería, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 41 años de edad y está casada , tiene 2 hijos menores que todavía dependen de ella.
Lleva 1 año trabajando con Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue de 300.00 soles.
La señora Juana se dedica al servicio de alquiler de cuartos, desde hace tiempo, con los prestamos de Manuela  Ramos está haciendo arreglos  para mejorar la presentación de sus habitaciones y pueda alquilar aun mejor precio.
Con éste préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 soles, lo invertirán en la implementación de un  baño, comprarará un juego de baño, una ducha,  una llave de ducha, pegamento, teflón,un balde de pintura y una bolsa de cemento. 
Con el poco tiempo que lleva en Manuela Ramos, Juana está mejorando partes de su casa, lo cual le genera ingresos para mantener a su familia.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por el apoyo brindado a su persona y está muy contenta.
texts.en:
Sra. Juana is a member of the Communal Bank “El Arenal”, which is located in Callería District in the Department of Ucayali. She is 41 years old, married, and has two young children who are dependent on her. Juana has been working with Manuela Ramos for the past year. Her first loan was in the amount of 300 PEN.

Sra. Juana has been renting out rooms for some time. Using the loans from Manuela Ramos, she was able to make renovations to improve the appearance of the rooms so that she could rent them out at a higher price.

With this loan of 1000 PEN, she will install a bathroom. She will buy a bath set, shower, shower faucet, adhesives, Teflon, a bucket of paint, and a bag of cement. In the short time she has been with Manuela Ramos, Juana has made improvements to parts of her house that help generate income to support her family.

She thanks Manuela Ramos for the support provided to her as an individual, which has made her very happy.

loans.use: Purchase materials for installing a bathroom

loans.name: Cristhian

texts.es:
El Sr. Cristhian tiene 20 años de edad, vive con sus padres, él tiene un copetín desde el año 2000, allí tiene ventas de empanadas, sanwich, croquetas, menú del día, agua caliente para mate y agua fría para tereré, esto lo lleva acabo gracias a la ayuda de su madre quien es la encargada de preparar las comidas.
Cristhian continúa sus estudios en el colegio ya que está cursando  el último año de la educación media. Bien temprano se levanta a ayudar a su madre antes de ir al colegio y a la vuelta del mismo ya se encuentra atendiendo nuevamente el negocio.
Cuenta con  un vehículo el cual tiene problemas mecánicos y desea invertir el préstamo en  su reparación ya que lo utiliza para la compra de sus mercaderías y el traslado de las mismas desde su hogar hasta su puesto de ventas. Por tal motivo constituye una herramienta indispensable en sus labores cotidianas.
texts.en:
Sr. Cristhian is 20 years old and lives with his parents. He has a snack bar that he has managed since 2000. There he sells turnovers, sandwiches, croquets, hot water for “mate” (an herbal beverage), and cold water for “tereré” (another type of herbal beverage). He works with the help of his mother, who is in charge of preparing the food.

Cristhian is continuing with his studies and in his final year before receiving his high school diploma. He wakes up early to help his mother before leaving for school. When he returns, he takes over managing the business.

Cristhian owns a vehicle that has mechanical problems, so he plans to invest the loan in repairs. He uses his car to buy supplies and transport them from his house to his business. For this reason, his car has become an indispensible piece of equipment that he needs for his daily work.

loans.use: Repair the vehicle that he uses for his business

loans.name: Yerly

texts.es:
La señora Yerly pertenece al banco comunal El Arenal, del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali,  tiene 43 años y está casada.  Tiene 4 hijos, su esposo maneja moto car (transportista).  Lleva 3 años trabajando con los prestamos de Manuela Ramos, para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar.
Yerly se dedica a vender  por las mañanas jugos, hamburguesas y gaseosas  en su casa, que se encuentra cerca de una posta médica (Centro de Salud). 
Con su ultimo préstamo de S/. 2,500.00 soles, piensa invertirlo en su negocio, comprará una nueva licuadora y una extractora que mucha falta le hace, comprara también ½ saco de azúcar, 1 botella de esencia de vainilla, 1 botella de miel, 1 botella de algarrobina, 3 jarras y 1doc. De vasos y una pequeña vitrina.
La señora Yerly está muy agradecida  con Manuela Ramos  por la confianza  y la oportunidad de poder realizar un negocio propio que le genera ingresos a su hogar.
texts.en:
Sra. Yerly is a member of the Communal Bank “El Arenal”, which is in the Calleria District of the Department of Ucayali. She is 43 years old, married, and has four children. Her husband drives a motorcycle taxi as a carrier.

Yerly has worked with the loans from Manuela Ramos for three years in order to help her husband with the household expenses. She sells breakfast juices, hamburgers, and sodas from her house that sits next to a health clinic. With this latest loan of 2500 PEN, she plans to invest in her business by purchasing a blender and a juicer that she currently lacks. Yerly will also buy half a sack of sugar, one bottle of vanilla extract, one bottle of honey, one bottle of carob extract, three pitchers, a dozen glasses, and a small display case.

Sra. Yerly is very grateful to Manuela Ramos for the confidence and the opportunity to pursue her own business so that she can generate household income.

loans.use: Purchase a blender, a juicer, and supplies for her business

loans.name: Barbara Obdulia

texts.es:
Barbara Obdulia S. F. tiene 50 anos. Es soletera  vive con la hija, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 1 hija que se llama Jessica de 17 años.

Los miembros de la V:R:C: Dole 2 se dedican a labores agrícolas en la hacienda bananera DOLE, ubicada en la cabecera cantonal, todos los miembros viven en el Cantón Ventanas, la mayoría de los socios trabajan mas de un año en la mencionada hacienda, y sus actividades son relacionadas a la bananera. Son aproximadamente 13 socios.

Barbara trabaja en la bananera realizando labores como la limpieza de los riego en la hacienda desde hace un año, hacen compras en Comercial Murillo en Ventanas.  

Solicita el crédito para ponerse un negocio en la casa y adecuar el local y comprar productos para su negocio. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueno es mejorar la vivienda y cumplir la meta del negocio.
Le gusta lavar cocinar y bailar.
texts.en:
Barbara Obdulia S. F. is 50 years old, single, and lives with her 17 year old daughter Jessica in the canton of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.  

The members of the V:R:C Dole 2 work as farmers on the Dole banana plantation, which is located in the center of the canton.  All of the group members live in the canton of Ventanas, and the majority have worked at the plantation for more than a year.  There are about 13 members in the group.

For more than a year, Barbara's job on the banana plantation has been to clean the irrigation systems and shop at the Murillo store in Ventanas.

She is asking for this loan in order to set up a business in her home and purchase merchandise for the business.  The support of this loan will help her financially be able to meet her needs.  Her dream is to improve her home and achieve her goal of opening a business.  

She likes to clean, cook, and dance.

loans.use: Improve her home to include a store and purchase merchandise

loans.name: Casimira

texts.es:
Casimira es socia del Banco Comunal “Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe II” ubicado en el distrito de Cojata, provincia de Huancané, departamento de Puno, tiene 56 años de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 09 hijos (01 dependientes). La señora no tiene estudios.

Casimira es socia nueva del Movimiento Manuela Ramos, y su préstamo solicitado es de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le servirá para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de comidas, carnes y lanas.
	
Su sueño para el futuro es tener más capital para su negocio. Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  son las reuniones.
texts.en:
Casimira is a member of the community bank "Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe II" [Our Lady of Guadalupe II], located in the Cojata district in the province of Huancané in the department of Puno.  She is 56 years old, married, and has nine children (one dependent on her).  She is not educated.

Casimira is a new member of the Movimiento Manuela Ramos, and she is asking for a loan of 500 nuevos soles, which will allow her to invest more money in her business that sells food, meat, and wool.

Her dream for the future is to have more money for her business.  The thing she likes best about her community bank are the meetings.

loans.use: Invest money in her business that sells food, meat, and wool

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
La señora Lidia es socia del banco comunal El Arenal, del distrito de Callería, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 64 años de edad,  está casada y tiene 6 hijos mayores.
La señora Lidia hace 14 años comenzó con el negocio de la madera, junto con su esposo que ha estado a su lado todos estos años de trabajo.  Gracias a los ingresos de este negocio han podido construir su casa y cubierto los gastos de educación de sus 6 hijos que ahora ya son profesionales.
Estos últimos años se ha dedicado al servicio de alquiler de bicicletas, pero también se compró 2 moto car para poner trabajar  en transporte, del cual recibe una feria (pago) de S/. 20.00 soles diarios.  Además vende aceite y cera.
Con éste préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 soles,  la señora Lidia va a comprar repuestos y un motor nuevo para su moto car.
La señora Lidia se siente muy feliz porque gracias a los préstamos de Manuela Ramos ha logrado que sus hijos sean profesionales y que ella, a su edad, este tranquila porque no depende de nadie y todavía quiere seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Mrs. Lidia is a member of the community bank El Arenal, in the district of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 64 years old, married and has 4 adult children.
Mrs. Lidia started in the wood business 14 years ago, along with her husband who has been working with her shoulder to shoulder all these years. Thanks to the income from this business, she has been able to build her house and support the education expenses for her children who are all professionals now.
In the last few years she has been focusing on the service of bicycle rentals, but she also bought 2 moto-taxis for the business of public transportation from which she receives a daily revenue of S/. 20 Soles. She also sells oil and wax.
With this loan of S/. 1,500 Soles, Mrs. Lidia will buy repair parts and a new motor for her moto-taxi.
Mrs. Lidia feels very happy because thanks to the loans from Manuela Ramos she helped her children to become professionals, and at her age she is worry-free because she is self-sufficient and wants to continue working.

loans.use: Bur motor and repair parts

loans.name: Jacinto Ramón

texts.es:
Jacinto Ramón A. T. tiene 55 anos. Es soletero  vive con los padres y con los sobrinos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 1 hioa que se llama David de 4 años.

Los miembros de la V:R:C: Dole 2 se dedican a labores agrícolas en la hacienda bananera DOLE, ubicada en la cabecera cantonal, todos los miembros viven en el Cantón Ventanas, la mayoría de los socios trabajan mas de un año en la mencionada hacienda, y sus actividades son relacionadas a la bananera. Son aproximadamente 13 socios.

Jacinto trabaja en la bananera destellando es decir, sacando lo malo de la fruta desde hace un año.
  
Solicita el crédito para ponerse un negocio en la casa y adecuar el local y comprar productos para su negocio. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueno es mejorar la vivienda y cumplir la meta del negocio.

Le gusta hacer pedirte.
texts.en:
Jacinto Ramón A. T. is 55 years old, single, and lives with his parents and his nieces and nephews in the canton of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.  He has a four year old son named David.

The members of V:R:C: Dole 2 work as farmers on the Dole banana plantation, which is located in the center of the canton.  All of the members live in the canton of Ventanas, and the majority have worked for more than a year at the plantation and work with bananas.  There are about 13 members.

Jacinto has worked for a year separating the bad fruit from the good.

He is asking for this loan to set up a business in his house and acquire a store and purchase products for his business.  The support of the loan will help him financially provide for his needs.  His dream is to improve his home and succeed in starting a business.

loans.use: Improve his home to include space for a business

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
La Sra. Elena M. vende una gran variedad de productos naturales como ser: Tratamientos para la cara, desodorantes, vitaminas, pasta dentales, jabones, cremas para el cuerpo, etc….
Su negocio se mantiene estable y sus condiciones de vida se ve notablemente que son favorables, es casada y es madre de 4 hijos los cuales dependen a un 100% de ellos, mismos que actualmente están cursando estudios secundarios. 
Doña Elena decidió dedicarse a este negocio ya que las condiciones económicas no eran muy favorables y con los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran lo suficiente para cubrir todos los gastos del hogar y ahora con sus ingresos sus condiciones de vida han mejorado.
En la actualidad la Sra. M. no cuenta con el capital de trabajo suficiente para surtir más su negocio y satisfacer la demanda de sus productos ya que su clientela día a día acrecienta:- razón por la cual esta solicitando el credito.
texts.en:
Sra. Elena M. operates a business selling natural products: Facial treatments, deodorants, vitamins, toothpaste, soaps, body lotions, etc.  Business is steady and she has a comfortable life.  She is married and has 4 children, all still living at home.  The children are in high school now.
Dona Elena decided to start the business because times were tough and her husband's income didn't stretch to paying all of the family's expenses.  The income from the business allows the family to live better than they did before.  
However, Dona Elena now lacks the working capital she needs to stock the business and meet the demand for her products. She is applying for this loan to raise the funds she needs to support her growing business.

loans.use: Buy products to resell.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Jofre Orlando

texts.es:
Jofre de 34 años, tiene un taller de soldadura, vive en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso de la flor ubicada en una zona caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas. 

Hace 10 años atrás empezó a trabajar y aprender como soldador en un taller pero como necesitaba más ingresos decidió tener su propio taller. Con unos ahorros y la ayuda de su esposa pudo tener su propio taller de soldadura. Conoció en una construcción que lo contrataron a uno de los que ahora es su gran amigo quien le ayudo hacer más grande su negocio. Ahora el trabaja desde muy temprano con contratos en casa casi todos los días instalando techos, infraestructuras etc. 

Para darle una mejor vida a su familia él quiere comprar con el préstamo materiales de construcción para su casa ya que es de caña y cemento. En el futuro quiere comprar un terreno para hacer una cancha de futbol sintética y tener más ingresos.
texts.en:
Jofre, 34, owns a welding shop.  He lives in a semi-urban zone called Paraiso de la Flor, a hilly area with few paved roads.  

Jofre started as a welder 10 years ago, learning the trade and working as a welder in another shop.  He decided to start his own business so that he could increase his income  With savings and help from his wife, he managed to set up his own shop.  He was hired for a construction project by someone who has become a good friend and helped him grow the business. Now he works almost every day, from very early in the morning, on jobs such as roof construction and infrastructure installation.

Jofre is applying for a loan to rebuild his house.  The house is made from cane and cement and he wants to improve it for his family.  He will use the loan to buy construction materials.  In the future, he wants to buy land to build a football pitch so that he can increase his earnings.

loans.use: Cement, concrete blocks, sand.

loans.name: Carlos Alfredo

texts.es:
Carlos Alfredo  M. S. tiene 55 anos. Es soletero  vive con los padres y con los sobrinos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijo que se llama David de 4 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. Dole 2 se dedican a labores agrícolas en la hacienda bananera DOLE, ubicada en la cabecera cantonal, todos los miembros viven en el Cantón Ventanas, la mayoría de los socios trabajan mas de un año en la mencionada hacienda, y sus actividades son relacionadas a la bananera. Son aproximadamente 13 socios.

Carlos trabaja en la bananera como embalador  es decir realizando empaques para que salgan a la venta trabaja desde hace un año, las comprar las realiza en el comisariato  1 en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para ponerse un negocio en la casa y adecuar el local y comprar productos para su negocio. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueno es mejorar la vivienda y cumplir la meta del negocio.
Le gusta trabajar y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Carlos Alfredo M. S. is single and lives with his parents, nieces and nephews in Ventana, a canton in Los Rios province.  He has 1 son, David, who is 4 years old.  

The members of the Dole 2 V.R.C. work on the Dole banana plantation in Ventana.  Most of the members have worked on the plantation for more than a year and they earn their incomes from the local banana industry.  There are approximately 13 members.  

Carlos works as a packer, boxing bananas in order to make them ready for sale, work that he's been doing for a year.  He buys the bananas from a warehouse in Ventanas.

Carlos is applying for a loan to set up a home-based business.  He will fit out a space and stock it with products to resell.  The loan will help him buy the things he needs immediately.  His dream is to improve his house and meet his goals for the business.  He likes working and playing sports.

loans.use: Home-Based business.

loans.name: Segundo Amado

texts.es:
Segundo Amado C. L. tiene 29 anos. Vive en Unión Libre  vive con la compañera y con la hija, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 1 hija que se llama Gabriela de 5 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. Dole 2 se dedican a labores agrícolas en la hacienda bananera DOLE, ubicada en la cabecera cantonal, todos los miembros viven en el Cantón Ventanas, la mayoría de los socios trabajan mas de un año en la mencionada hacienda, y sus actividades son relacionadas a la bananera. Son aproximadamente 13 socios.

Segundo trabaja en la bananera como amarador de cintas, es decir empacando el banano para que salga a la venta trabaja desde hace un año, las comprar las realiza en el comisariato  1 en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para ponerse un negocio en la casa y adecuar el local y comprar productos para su negocio. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueno es mejorar la vivienda y y dar el estudio a su hija.

Le gusta trabajar y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Segundo Amado C. L., 29, lives with his partner and daughter in Ventana, a canton in Los Rios province. His daughter, Gabriela, is 5 years old.

The members of the Dole 2 V.R.C. work on the Dole banana plantation in Ventana. Most of the members have worked on the plantation for more than a year and they earn their incomes from the local banana industry. There are approximately 13 members.

Segundo works as a packer, boxing bananas in order to make them ready for sale, work that he's been doing for a year. He buys the bananas from a warehouse in Ventanas.

Segundo is applying for a loan to set up a home-based business. He will fit out a space and stock it with products to resell. The loan will help him to fulfill his immediate economic needs. His dream is to improve his house and for his daughter to go to school. 

He likes working and playing sports.

loans.use: Home-Based business.

loans.name: Cecilia Maura

texts.es:
Cecilia es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Triunfadoras” ubicado en el distrito de Cabanilla,  provincia de Lampa, departamento de Puno, tiene 48 años de edad, de estado civil  conviviente y tiene 02 hijos, la señora  estudió educación primaria.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 03 años, nos cuenta que su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de abarrotes. También compra y vende cueros y quinua.

Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en la mercadería de su negocio. 

Su sueño es ampliar su negocio. Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo y el ahorro.
texts.en:
Cecilia is a member of the Mujeres Triunfadoras community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Puno.  She is 48 years old, partnered and has 2 children.  She has a primary school education.

Cecelia came to Movimiento Manuela Ramos 3 years ago and tells us that she used her first loan, for S/.300 new soles, to stock her grocery business.  She also buys and sells hides and quinoa. 

Cecelia is applying for a new S/.300 new soles loan that she will use to buy merchandise for her grocery business.

Cecelia's dream is to expand her business.  What she most likes about her community bank is that she can borrow funds there relatively easily.

loans.use: Buy products to resell.

loans.name: Dionicio Eusebio

texts.es:
Dionicio Eusebio R. O. tiene 56 anos. Vive en Unión Libre  vive con la compañera y con el hijo, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijo que se llama Julio de 35 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. Dole 2 se dedican a labores agrícolas en la hacienda bananera DOLE, ubicada en la cabecera cantonal, todos los miembros viven en el Cantón Ventanas, la mayoría de los socios trabajan mas de un año en la mencionada hacienda, y sus actividades son relacionadas a la bananera. Son aproximadamente 13 socios.

Dionicio trabaja en la bananera como Jefe de campo y encargado de labores Agricolas trabaja desde hace un año, las comprar las realiza en el comisariato  1 en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para ponerse un negocio en la casa y adecuar el local y comprar productos para su negocio. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueno es mejorar la vivienda y cumplir la meta del negocio.
Le gusta trabajar y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Dionicio Eusebio R. O. is 56 years old.  He lives with his common-law wife and his child in Ventanas district, Los Ríos province.  He has one child who is called Julio who is 35 years old.

The members of V. R. C. Dole 2 perform agricultural tasks on the DOLE banana plantation which is in the district capital.  All the members live in Ventanas district.  Most of the members have been working on the plantation for more than a year and work for the banana industry.  There are approximately 13 members.

Dionicio works as a field manager and is in charge of agricultural work.  He has been working there fore a year.  He makes his purchases in Comisariato 1 (a market) in Ventanas.

He is requesting this loan so that he can set up a business in his home, adapt the premises and buy products for his business.  This loan would help him financially to cover his needs.  His dream is to improve his home and achieve his business goal.

He likes to work and take part in sports

loans.use: To set up a business in his home

loans.name: Luís Jacinto

texts.es:
Luís Jacinto M. T. tiene 32 anos. Es soltero  vive con los padres, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijo que se llama Luís de 11 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. Dole 2 se dedican a labores agrícolas en la hacienda bananera DOLE, ubicada en la cabecera cantonal, todos los miembros viven en el Cantón Ventanas, la mayoría de los socios trabajan mas de un año en la mencionada hacienda, y sus actividades son relacionadas a la bananera. Son aproximadamente 13 socios.

Luís trabaja en la bananera como regador encargado de los riego en la hacienda, trabaja desde hace un año, las comprar las realiza en el comisariato  1 en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para ponerse un negocio en la casa y adecuar el local y comprar productos para su negocio. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueno es mejorar la vivienda y cumplir la meta del negocio.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Luis Jacinton M. T. is 32 years old. He is single and lives with his parents in the town of Ventanas in the province of Los Rios. He has a son called Luis who is 11 years old.

The members of V.R.C. Dole 2 are farm workers in DOLE's banana's farm, which is located in the main town, all the members live in Ventanas town, most of the members have been working more than a year on this farm, and their activities are related to the farm. They are approximately 13 members.

Luis works on irrigation at the farm for more than a year now, he does grocery shopping at the supermarket 1 in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to start a business at his home and set up his store and buy products for his business. With the loan's help he would be able to fulfill his needs. He dreams on improving his house and start his business.
He likes practice sports.

loans.use: to start a business at his home and set up his store and buy products for his business

loans.name: Omar Alberto

texts.es:
Omar Alberto G. C. tiene 25 anos. Es soltero  vive con los padres, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos.  No Tiene  hijo.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. Dole 2 se dedican a labores agrícolas en la hacienda bananera DOLE, ubicada en la cabecera cantonal, todos los miembros viven en el Cantón Ventanas, la mayoría de los socios trabajan mas de un año en la mencionada hacienda, y sus actividades son relacionadas a la bananera. Son aproximadamente 13 socios.

Omar trabaja en la bananera como enfundador por lotes  en la hacienda, trabaja desde hace un año, las comprar las realiza en el comisariato  1 en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para ponerse un negocio en la casa y adecuar el local y comprar productos para su negocio. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueno es mejorar la vivienda y cumplir la meta del negocio.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Omar Alberto G. C. is 25 years old. He is single and lives with his parents, lives in the town of Ventanas in the province of Los Rios. He has no children.

The members of V.R.C. Dole 2 work at the DOLE banana's farm, which is located in the main area of the town, all the members live in Ventanas, most of the members work for more than a year in the farm, and their activities are related to the farm. There are approximately 13 members.

Omar works in the banana farm as bag packer for more than a year and does his grocery shopping at the supermarket 1 in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to start a business at home and set up a store and buy products for his business. With the help of the loan he would be able to cover his needs. He dreams about improving his house and start up his business.

He likes to practice sports.

loans.use: to start a business at home and set up a store and buy products for his business

loans.name: Mary Ines

texts.es: La Sra. Mary es cliente antigua,  se dedica a la confección y venta  de deportivos, buzos, poleras, chamarras en su tienda,  en esta actividad le colaboran sus dos hijas mientras ella atiende otro puesto que adquirió recientemente en la que comercializa también los deportivos que confecciona.  Doña Mary vive en casa familiar en la zona los andes de la ciudad de la paz. El destino del crédito esta destinada para adquirir Telas para realizar poleras para este fin de año, la Sra. es una cliente muy trabajadora y responsable siempre velando por el bienestar de su familia, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mrs. Mary is a returning client, she works creating and selling sporting clothes, hoodies, sweaters, jackets at her store, she gets the help of her daughters at this store, while she works at another site that bought recently where she also sells items she creates. Mrs. Mary lives in a family house in the Andes zone in the city of La Paz. She is requesting the loan to buy fabric to saw new sweaters this year. Mrs. Mary is a very hard working and responsible client who is always working for the well being of her family, and is very grateful to the institution for the support received.

loans.use: to buy fabric to create sweaters and other sporting gear for her store

loans.name: Cecilia Paulina

texts.es:
Cecilia es socia del Banco Comunal “Punta Sahuacasi” ubicado en el distrito Azángaro,  provincia de Azángaro, departamento de Puno, tiene 47 años de edad, de estado civil  casada y tiene 05 hijos (03 dependientes). La señora tiene estudios de educación primaria completa.

Cecilia viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 04 años, nos cuenta que su primer préstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para  incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de quesos, chalina y artefactos.

Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá  en la mercadería de su negocio.

Su sueño para el futuro es tener más capital para su negocio y tener una casa en Puerto Mazuco. Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  son las reuniones y las charlas.
texts.en:
Cecilia is a member of the community bank “Punta Sahuacasi”, located in the district of Azángaro, province of Azángaro, department of Puno. She is 47 years old, married and has 5 children (3 of them are still dependants). Mrs. Cecilia completed her elementary school.

Cecilia has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 4 years; she tells us that her first loan was for S/. 300 Nuevos Soles which she used to increase the working capital for her business of selling cheeses, scarves and other products.

She is now requesting a new loan for S/. 1000 Nuevos Soles which she will invest in merchandise for her business.

Her dream for the future is to have more working capital for her business and to have a house in Puerto Mazuco. What she likes the most about her community bank are the meetings and talks.

loans.use: Invest in merchandise for her business

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: Guillermo, de 50 años, es soltero y muy trabajador, vive en su casa propia. Toda su vida se ha dedicado a la carpintería, en un inicio su trabajo lo desarrollaba en su casa fabricando puertas, ventanas y otros muebles, sin embargo el no contar con las herramientas necesarias, no lograba realizar con eficiencia los muebles que se le pedía. Es por ello, que ahora trabaja en una empresa constructora, como ayudante, por lo que puede desenvolverse bien esa área, se esmera cada mes para hacer mejor su trabajo. Pero lo que más le gusta a Guillermo es trabajar de manera independiente en su taller, es por ello que desea comprarse cepilladoras eléctricas y una máquina talladora, ya que son herramientas indispensables para obtener un buen acabado los muebles que fabrica. Es su segundo crédito con MFP, y se compromete en ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, ya que desea contar con posteriores préstamos en el futuro. Con el crédito que solicita, piensa comprar madera e implementar su taller con nuevas herramientas, con el fin de poder trabajar con mayor eficiencia.
texts.en:
Guillermo is 50 years old, single, very hard-working, and lives in his own home. 

All of his life, he has worked as a carpenter.  He began working in his home building doors, windows, and other furniture.  However, he did not have the necessary tools, so he wasn't able to build the furniture that had been ordered efficiently.  For this reason, he now works at a construction company as an assistant so he can develop his skills in this area.  He puts in a lot of effort every month to do better at his work.  

However, Guillermo would like to work independently in his own workshop, so he wants to buy electric planers and a shaping machine, which are indispensable tools to obtain a good finish on the furniture he builds.

This is his second loan with MFP and he promises to make his payments on time because he would like to take more loans in the future.

With this loan, he would like to purchase wood and outfit his workshop with new tools so he can work with more efficiency in the future.

loans.use: Purchase wood and new tools

loans.name: Henry

texts.es:
el sr. Henry S. cuenta con una pulpería y tambien da el servicio de moler maíz, su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitación, su negocio opera bajo el nombre de pulpería “ANY”.
Don Henry esta casado y junto a su compañera de hogar han procreado 4 hijos los cuales dependen de ellos y les brindan los gastos de alimentación, educación, salud y vivienda.
Henry se levanta todos los dias bien temprano para atender sus clientes que vienen a moler maiz para fabricar las tortillas, luego de dar este servicio inicia las operaciones con su pulperia.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia y asi surtir su negocio.
texts.en:
Mr. Henry S. has small convenience store and also provides service to grind corn; his business is located at the house where he lives and it operates under the name of Any’s Store. Mr. Henry is married and together with his wife have 4 children who are dependants; Henry and his wife provide for the expenses of food, education, health and housing.
Henry gets up very early every day to help his customers that come to grind corn to make tortillas; after providing this service, he begins operating his store. He will use the loan to buy more merchandise and stock up for his business.

loans.use: Buy rice, sugar, beans, corn flour, meats, dairy products, cured meats, eggs, lard, margarine, soups, bread, cookies, pasta, salsas, salt, condiments.

loans.name: Moises Edwin

texts.es: El Sr. Edwin a pesar de ser una persona joven durante su anterior crédito demostró puntualidad y responsabilidad,  la actividad en la que se desempeña diariamente es la costura, el confecciona chalecos de tela polar, por esta época se dedica a cumplir contratos con diferentes instituciones.  El cliente vive en casa de sus señores padres, es en la misma donde desempeña su actividad. El destino del crédito es para la compra de una maquina de cocer recta, ya que esta maquina le ayudara a realizar mas rápido y de mejor manera su trabajo, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Edwin is a young person, but he demonstrated punctuality and responsibility with his last loan.  

He works every day sewing.  He makes polar fleece vests because he has contracts to complete with different institutions.  

He lives with his parents and works at home.  

He is asking for this loan to purchase a serger, which will allow him to work more quickly and create a better product.  

He is very thankful to the institution for the support they have given him.

loans.use: Purchase a serger (sewing machine)

loans.name: Afiq

texts.en:
Afiq Abdullayev, 44, owns a little grocery store in the local market where he sells a variety of goods. He has run this business since 2008. Afiq, together with his wife, have 3 children to support. 

Afiq has asked for a loan of 1000 AZN to purchase more grocery products, allowing him to expand his options and increase his inventory. He believes that this will allow him to reach a wider customer base so he can increase his income to help provide for his family. 

Afiq looks forward to seeing the results of this investment and hopes that his family can become more economically secure for the future. He recently finished repaying his first loan from AqroInvest successfully.

loans.use: purchase more goods to increase her profit

loans.name: G.s. Nuñez Group

texts.es: El Grupo Solidario Núñez lo conforman María y Milagro del Socorro ambas poseen las mismas actividades económicas como la venta de comida. María realiza este trabajo todos los días pues es su principal fuente de ingresos para su hogar, es una Señora muy trabajadora y se encuentra feliz de juntarse con su Compañera de trabajo Milagros que también se dedica a lo mismo hace más de 5 años que se dedica a esta actividad económica como lo es la elaboración de comida. Pues es así que juntas deciden realizar este financiamiento con el fin de comprar materia prima.
texts.en:
The Solidario Núñez Communal Bank is comprised of María and Milagro del Socorro.  Both of them have the same business activity of selling food.

María does this every day as this is her main source of income for her household.  She is a very hard-working woman.  She is happy to join her work colleague, Milagros, who has been doing the same work for over five years.  She too makes food.  That is how they decided together to get a loan in order to buy ingredients.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Yarita Piedad

texts.es:
La señora Yarita es socia del banco comunal El Arenal, del distrito de Callería,  Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 24 años de edad, está casada y tiene un hijo de 3 años, su esposo se desempeña como soldador, tiene trabajos eventuales, por ello apoya a su esposa en su actividad económica y aportar a los gastos del hogar.
Lleva trabajando con Manuela Ramos año y medio, su primer préstamo fue de S/. 300.00 soles, con ese dinero comenzó su negocio de compra y venta de pescado seco que le mandan cada semana del bajo Ucayali.
Con éste préstamo de S/. 1,500.00, piensa invertir s/.1,000.00 en pescado seco y los S/. 500.00 soles restantes lo guardará para algún imprevisto que tuviera.
Gracias a Manuela Ramos la señora Yarita puede trabajar y así apoyar a su esposo económicamente.
texts.en:
Yarita is a member of the communal bank El Arenal, in the Callería district of the Ucayali region.  She is 24-years-old, married, and has a three-year-old son.  Her husband works as a welder.  He has occasional work, because of this he supports his wife in her work to be able to provide for the household expenses.  
She has been working with Manuela Ramos for a year and a half.  Her first loan was for 300 soles, with this money she started her business buying and selling dried fish that is sent to her every week from lower Ucayali.
With this loan of 1,500 soles, she plans to invest 1,000 soles in dried fish and the remaining 500 soles will be saved for unexpected expenses.  
Thanks to Manuela Ramos, Yarita can work and support her husband economically.

loans.use: purchase of fish

loans.name: Celestina

texts.es:
Celestina es socia del Banco Comunal “Punta Sahuacasi” ubicado en el distrito Azángaro,  provincia de Azángaro y departamento de Puno, tiene 53 años de edad, estado civil  casada y tiene 04 hijos, la señora  llegó a estudiar educación primaria incompleto.

Celestina viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 02 años, su  préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de artesanías.

Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 2000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar lanas para tejer medias, escarpines y chompas.

Su sueño para el futuro es tener más capital y hacer estudiar a sus hijos. Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la facilidad de préstamo, la puntualidad y la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Celestina is a member of the Punta Sahuacasi Communal Bank.  It is in the Azaángaro district, Azángaro province, Puno department.  Celestina is 53 years old, married, and has four children.  She did not complete elementary school.

Celestina has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for two years.  Her first loan was for 300 soles.  She used the money to increase the capital in her business of selling handicrafts.

She is now requesting a new loan for 2,000 soles.  She will use the money to buy wool in order to weave tights, socks, and sweaters.

Her dream for the future is to have more capital and to have her children go to school.  What she likes best about her communal bank is the ease of the loan, the punctuality, and the responsibility.

loans.use: To buy wool to weave tights, socks, and sweaters

loans.name: Nueva Integracion Group

texts.es: Emily es una señorita de 23 años y la secretaria del grupo “Nueva Integración”, la cual está soltera y desde muy pequeña le gusto ser la profesora en los juegos de niños, ahora a su edad ha seguido con esta vocación la cual le ah llevado a estudiar en la Universidad de “La CANTUTA”, indica que desde que salió de la escuela ha trabajado en el “I.E.P. EULE” animada por su tía, lleva ya 6 años trabajando en la escuela y con los prestamos de Edaprospo paga sus estudios y últimamente ha comprado una moto la cual hace taxi en la zona y lo trabaja su papá. El grupo lleva 2 años de conformados y van en su cuarto préstamo, pero Emily se ha adherido al grupo hace un mes, junto a ella son nueve los integrantes de este grupo que  debe su nombre a la zona en la que viven “Nueva Alianza” y que están felices por contar con la ayuda de Edaprospo y el capital que les brinda para mejorar sus vidas.
texts.en:
Emily is an unmarried 23-year-old who is secretary of the “Nueva Integracion” (New Integration) Group.  From a very early age, in childhood games she always wanted to be the teacher.  Now at her present age, she has pursued this vocation, which led her to study in the University of “La Cantuta”.  This has meant that since leaving school, Emily has worked in the “I.E.P. “EULE”, motivated by her aunt.  Emily has worked in that school for 6 years, and she paid for her studies with loans from Edaprospo.  And now, finally, she has purchased a scooter to serve as a taxi in the zone and her father drives it.

The group has existed for 2 years and is in its 4th loan cycle.  But Emily has only belonged to the group for a month.  She is one of 9 members of the group, which owes its name to the zone they live in, “New Alliance”.  

They are happy to count on the help of Edaprospo and the capital it offers to improve their lives.

loans.use: TO BUY PRODUCTS AND SUPPLIES

loans.name: Maria Del Pilar

texts.es: La señora Maria es cliente nueva en la agencia, la actividad a la que se dedica es la odontología y atiende en el consultorio de una clínica de la ciudad de la Paz, actividad que realiza por las tardes.   Doña pilar vive en casa familiar su domicilio esta ubicado en la zona de llojeta específicamente, comparte el departamento con su hija la cual es encuentra estudiando en la universidad estatal.  La inversión del crédito es para poner parquet en cuatro habitaciones de su departamento y en la fachada del mismo, ya que esta haciendo la remodelación, es una Sra. Muy responsable y esta agradecida con la institución.
texts.en: Señora Maria del Pilar is a new customer in the agency (Emprender). She is an odontologist and works in a clinic in the city of La Paz in the afternoons. She lives in her family home, located in the LLojeta community. She shares an apartment with her daughter, who is studying at the state university. She will use the loan to put parquet floors in four rooms of her apartment and also at the front, since she is remodeling. She is a very responsible woman and is grateful to the institution.

loans.use: Put parquet floors in the rooms and front of her apartment.

loans.name: Manuela Del Socorro

texts.es: Manuela Del Socorro tiene 47 años, se dedica a una bar y comedor, tiene 30 años de dedicarse a este negocio, todos los días de la semana trabaja, algunas personas que le ayudan a atender y elaborar sus comidas. Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de leña, jugos, granos básicos, bolsas, platos entre otras cosas ya que esta se encarece y se le hace más fácil y económico comprarla por grandes cantidades, esto le aumentara la producción y la oportunidad de tener mejor provecho de las ventas. Manuela tiene como objetivo buscar la manera de atraer a más clientes para recibir mejores ingresos que le ayuden a solventar sus necesidades, quiere que su negocio prospere para darle estabilidad a su hogar.
texts.en: Manuela del Socorro is 47 years old.  She works at a bar and eatery and has been in this business for 30 years.  She works every day of the week and there are some people that help her to attend to the business and make the dishes.  Manuela is currently requesting a loan for the purchase of firewood, juices, basic grains, bags and plates, among other items that are becoming more expensive.  It is easier and more economical for her to buy them in large quantities, and this will increase her production and the opportunity to enjoy better sales.  Manuela’s objective is to look for a way to attract more customers to receive more income to help her cover her needs.  She wants her business to prosper to provide stability to her home.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Lucy Ines

texts.es:
La señora Lucy es socia del banco comunal el arenal, del Distrito de Calleria departamento de Ucayali, tiene 57 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad.
Lleva con Manuela Ramos 14 años y se dedica a la confección de ropas y sabanas, con los prestamos ha ido implementando su pequeño taller de costura, con uno de las préstamos que hizo se compró una máquina.
La señora Lucy con el ultimo prestamos de S/. 1,500.00 soles que Manuela Ramos de dio lo invertirá en la compra de telas para que confeccione las sabanas, comprar 20 metros de tela de sabana, 2 conos de hilo blanco 50 metros de pasa cinta y 50 metros de cinta satinada en varios colores.
La señora Lucy está agradecida con Manuela Ramos porque con las ganancias que tiene le alcanza para pagar sus cuotas mensuales y con lo que le queda sigue invirtiendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Lucy is a member of the communal bank El Arenal in the Callería district of the Ucayali region.  She is 57-years-old, married, and has three children who are now adults.
She has worked with Manuela Ramos for 14 years.  She works making clothing and sheets and with her loans as been implementing a small sewing workshop.  With one of the loans she bought a sewing machine.  
Lucy will use the most recent loan of 1500 soles from Manuela Ramos for the purchase of fabrics for making sheets.  She will buy 20 meters of sheet fabric, two cones of white thread, 50 meters of fabric tape, and 50 meters of satin ribbon in various colors.
Lucy is very thankful to Manuela Ramos because with the profits she makes she has been able to make her monthly payments and with what is left over she continues to invest in her business.

loans.use: Purchase of fabrics

loans.name: Celia Isabel

texts.es:
Celia es socia del Banco Comunal “Azangarinas Valientes” ubicado en el distrito Azángaro, provincia de Azángaro, departamento de Puno, tiene 48 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y tiene 02 hijos (01 dependientes), estudió hasta 5to de educación primaria.

Celia viene  trabajando con  el Movimiento  Manuela  Ramos desde hace 04 años, su    préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de artículos artesanales.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra de lanas para tejer sus chompas, pantalones y chalinas, para luego venderlas.

Su sueño para el futuro es terminar de construir su casa y mejorar su negocio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la puntualidad y la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Celia is a member of the Azangarinas Valientes communal bank, located in the Azángaro district and province within the department of Puno. She is 48 years old and has a live-in partner and two children, one of which is dependent. She completed up to the fifth year of elementary school.

Celia has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for four years. Her first loan was for 300 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN), which she used to increase the capital for her handicrafts sales business.

She is requesting a new loan of 1,500 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN), which she will invest in the purchase of wool to knit her sweaters, pants and scarves and later sell.

Her future dream is to finish building her house and to improve her business.

What she likes most about her communal bank is the punctuality and the responsibility.

loans.use: To purchase wool for making sweaters, scarves and other items

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: Luisa tiene 57 años, es una madre de familia muy noble y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia, junto a su hija y su sobrina. La actividad que se dedica es la venta de sandalias y ropa para bebes, dicha venta lo realiza en un mercado cercano a su distrito. Lleva años vendiendo y recorriendo diversos mercados, pero con el tiempo logró establecerse en un puesto de venta, que hoy en día continua. Desde entonces, el trabajo le ha sido mucho más reposado. Durante estos 20 años de trabajo, reconoce que le gusta mucho, además que le es rentable, ya que deja la mercadería a crédito recibiendo un poco más las ganancias por los intereses que cobra. Con  el tiempo, desea comprarse su propio puesto de venta en el mercado, de ese modo asegura su porvenir. Es su 16avo crédito con MFP, y sabe que tiene que pagar puntualmente  sus cuotas y esta dispuesta a hacerlo. En su banco comunal es un cliente muy participativo y preocupado por el bienestar de su grupo. Con el crédito que solicita, piensa incrementar más ropas para bebes  y variedad de sandalias para el verano entrante, para tener variedad de mercaderías que ofrecer.
texts.en: LLuisa is 57-years-old.  She is an admirable mother to her family and very hard-working.  She lives in her own house with her daughter and her niece.  Her main work is the sale of sandals and baby clothing.  These sales are made in a nearby market in her neighborhood.  She has been selling for years in various markets, but over time was able to establish herself in a sales location that she continues with today.  Since then the work has been much more relaxing.  During these 20 years of work, she recognizes that she likes it very much, in addition to it being profitable.  Now she can sell the merchandise on credit and receive slightly more profits because of the interest she charges.  Over time, she would like to purchase her own sales location in the market and in this way ensure her future.  This is her sixteenth loan with MFP and she knows that she has to make her payments punctually and she is ready to do that.  In her communal bank, she is member who participates a lot and is concerned with the well-being of the group.  With the loan she is requesting, she would like to increase the quantity of baby clothing and sandals for the coming summer in order to have more varied merchandise to offer.

loans.use: Increase the quantity of baby clothing and sandals to be able to offer more variety to her customers.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “LA AMISTAD DE OLLANTAYTAMBO ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lucila; La socia tiene 43 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos, la socia se dedica a la venta de salchipapas, pollipapas y a la agricultura, la socia tiene un pequeño terreno dónde siembra papa y maíz, ella utiliza las papas de su terreno y las fríe a esto le acompaña un pedazo de pollo frito y unos tallarines delgados, a este plato le llamamos pollipapas,  el otro plato llamado salchipapa está hecho con papas nativas fritas, salchichas en rodajas fritas y le acompañan las diferentes salsas según el gusto del cliente. La socia solicita el crédito porque desea invertir en su negocio de comidas al paso y comprar insumos y también unas sillas para que sus clientes se sienten. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos y de sillas para implementar su negocio ambulatorio.

La socia  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Lucila belongs to the “La Amistad de Ollantaytambo” community bank which is located in Ollantaytambo district, in Urubamba province, in the department of Cusco.

Lucila is 43 years old and has 3 children.  She works selling 'salchipapas' and 'pollipapas' (both traditional Peruvian fast foods).  She also works as a farmer.  She has a small plot of land where she grows potatoes and corn.  She uses the potatoes from her land, fries them and accompanies them with a piece of fried chicken and some thin noodles.  This dish is called 'pollipapas'.  The other dish called 'salchipapas' is made with her own potatoes fried, slices of fried sausage and different sauces according to the customer's taste.  She is requesting this loan as she would like to invest in her food business and buy ingredients and also some chairs so that her customers can sit down.  She is requesting the loan to invest in buying ingredients and chairs to keep her street vending business going.

She is grateful for the loan and appreciates it.  She pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To invest in buying ingredients and chairs to keep her street trading business going

loans.name: Reina Mariluz

texts.es:
Reina se dedica a la venta de granos básicos y tortillas, tiene 31 años de edad y reside en Jucuapa departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposo y tres hijos de 10,8,2 años de edad, ella lleva ya dos años de tener el negocio y trabaja de 8:00am a 5:00pm, lo comenzó por iniciativa propia, por la necesidad de ayudar a su esposo con las demandas del hogar.
Ella hoy solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, maicillo, frijol, estos son los granos que comercializa con la gente cercana de la zona, esta inversión le ayudara a tener productos a alcance para vender en cualquier momento, también tendrá la oportunidad de tener mejores ventas y que sus clientes la prefieran.
Su sueño es que su negocio sea estable para generar los ingresos suficientes y dar a sus hijos la educación necesaria para optar por un estilo de vida distinto.
texts.en:
Reina works selling basic grains and tortillas.  She is 31 years old and lives in Jucuapa in Usulután department.  She lives with her husband and three children aged 10, 8 and 2.  She has had this business for two years and works from 8.00am to 5.00pm.  She set up her business on her own initiative as she needed to help her husband with their household expenses.

She is requesting this loan to buy corn, millet and beans.  These are the grains that she sells to nearby people in the area.  This investment will help her to have products on hand to sell at any moment.  She would also have the opportunity to have better sales and for her customers to prefer her business.

Her dream is for her business to be stable so that she can make enough income and give her children the necessary education for them to choose a different style of life.

loans.use: To buy corn, beans and millet

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “LA AMISTAD DE OLLANTAYTAMBO ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Francisca; La socia tiene 51 años de edad, es casada y tiene 4 hijos, la socia se dedica a la artesanía y a la atención de su tienda de abarrotes la socia tiene en su casa en el primer piso una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en la cual ha incorporado artesanía de tipo bisutería, ella vende en un espacio que da a la calle a vista de todo el público aretes hechos manualmente y también llaveros con motivos inkas, La socia también tiene un pequeño terreno el cual produce maíz y papa. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de aretes ya hechos y otros elementos decorativos en arcilla.

La socia  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Francisca is a member of the “La amistad de Ollantaytambo” community bank which is located in Ollantaytambo district, in Urubamba province, in the department of Cusco.

Francisca is 51 years old.  She is married and has 4 children.  She sells handicrafts and also serves in her grocery store.  She has a small grocery store on the first floor of her house in which she also sells hand-made jewelry.  She sells in a space which overlooks the street within view of the public.  She sells hand-made earrings and also keychains with Inca motifs.  She also has a small plot of land where she grows corn and potatoes.  She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of ready-made earrings and decorative clay items.

She is grateful for the loan and appreciates it.  She pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To invest in buying ready-made earrings and decorative clay items

loans.name: Sandra Esmeraldas

texts.es:
Sandra de 40 años, vive en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso de la flor ubicada en una zona caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas. Tiene una pequeña papelería. 

Hace 8 años atrás comenzó a vender láminas educativas, papelería, cuadernos, plumas en su casa ya que estaba aprendiendo del negocio porque trabajaba en una escuela como profesora y sabía las necesidades de los alumnos. Poco a poco fue comprando mas papelería y útiles para vender en un pequeño local que puso en su casa hasta ahora que continua dando clases en las tardes y en las mañana trabaja en su papelería. Uno de sus hijos le ayuda atendiendo en las tardes las la papelería. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar papelería, cuadernos para su negocio. En el futuro quiere agrandar su negocio con mas artículos para darles una mejor vida a sus hijos de 16 y 14 años.
texts.en:
Sandra, 40 years old, lives in a periurban area called Paraíso de la Flor located in a region characterized by its dirt roads and mountains.  She has a small paper shop.

Eight years ago, she began to sell educational sheets, stationery, notebooks, and pens in her house.  She learned about the business because she worked in a school as a teacher and she knew what her students needed.  Little by little she bought more paper and supplies to sell in a small shop she set up in her house.  Now she continues to teach classes in the afternoon and works in her paper shop in the morning.  One of her children helps her by working in the shop in the afternoon.

With the loan, she wants to buy stationery and notebooks for her business.  In the future, she would like to expand her business with more items in order to give her children, 14 and 16 years old, a better life.

loans.use: Papers, pens

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ciriaca Paulina

texts.es:
Ciriaca es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Mensajeras” ubicado en el distrito de Juliaca, provincia de San Román, departamento de Puno, tiene 43 años de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 04 hijos, realizó estudios de educación  primaria.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 06 años,  nos cuenta que su primer préstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de abarrotes y tejidos.

Ciriaca solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar mercaderías para su negocio de venta de abarrotes y tejidos.
	
Su sueño para el futuro es tener un carro y ser vendedora de carros.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Ciriaca is a member of the "Las Mensajeras" Banco Comunal, which is located in the Juliaca district in San Ramón province in the department of Puno in Peru. She is 43 years old, married and has four children. She has an elementary school education.

Ciriaca has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for six years. She tells us that her first loan was for S/. 300.00 nuevos soles (300 Peruvian soles) and she used that money to increase the capital of her business selling groceries and fabrics.

Ciriaca is requesting a new loan of S /. 1000.00 nuevos soles, money that she will use to buy merchandise for her business.

Her dream for the future is to have a car and to sell cars.

What she likes most about her Banco Comunal is the reliability.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her business, which sells groceries and fabrics.

loans.name: Khafiz

texts.en:
Khafiz S. is married with three children. He is from Agsu, in the southern part of Azerbaijan. He sells foodstuff in his grocery store. His merchandise is varied and of very good quality. He has been in this trade for almost 6 years. 

Khafiz is very disciplined and responsible.  The first loan he took from AqroInvest helped him to increase his income and improve his life conditions.  The benefits from the loan have helped him to overcome many challenges that came his way and allowed him to achieve success in business. 

Khafiz has always sought to achieve economic freedom and independence. He is hoping this loan will help his venture to continue growing and to continue bringing him profit.

loans.use: To purchase stock for grocery store

loans.name: Responsabilidad Group

texts.es:
María Precila ella pertenece al grupo “RESPONSABILIDAD” donde tiene el cargo de secretaria, el cual esta conformado por 8 compañeras, Maria Precila vende ropa hace  6 años tiene un puesto de venta en un mercado de su zona, ella empezó en este  negocio ayudando a su cuñada pero con el tiempo decidió seguir sola poniendo su propia tienda de ropa, ahi ofrece a su clientela toda clase de ropas como polos, chompas, pantalones, blusas y vestidos. Lo que también ofrece a sus clientas es el pago a crédito por los productos que le compran, gracias a su trabajo ha podido ayudar a su esposo en la construcción de su casa para darle seguridad y comodidad a sus hijos también los ayuda en sus estudios.

Con el tiempo lo que mas quiere es trasladar su negocio a su propia casa y también incursionar en el negocio de la dulcería por que también se dedica esporádicamente a preparar tortas, bocaditos y toda clase de dulces, lo que hará con su préstamo es comprar ropa para esta campaña navideña ya que hay mucha venta.

Un socio se encuentra en la foto pequeña a mano derecha porque no estuvo presente en el momento de sacar la foto grupal.

*Maria precila esta vestida con chompa negra y polo plomo es la tercera de las sentadas.
texts.en:
María has been selling clothing for six years in a stall in the market in her area.  Her business is called "Cynthia".  She began this business helping her sister-in-law, but in time decided to continue alone with her own store.  She offers her customers all types of clothes like shirts, sweaters, pants, blouses, and dresses.  She also lets her customers buy items on credit.  Thanks to her work, she has been able to help her husband with the construction of their house, which will give safety and comfort to their children and help with their studies.

In the future, she would like to move the business to her own house and also begin a business selling sweets, because she also sometimes prepares cakes, snacks, and all kinds of sweets.  

With this loan, she will purchase clothing for the Christmas season, when she has many sales.  Like her eight partners, she is a member of the group "Responsabilidad" [Responsibility], where she holds the office of secretary.

One group member is pictured in the small photo in the top right hand corner because he was not present when the original group photo was taken. 

*María is the 4th person in the picture. She is seated.

loans.use: Purchase clothing

loans.name: Tahira

texts.en:
Tahira A. is married with two children. She is an aspiring entrepreneur from Agsu city. Tahira runs a business selling office supplies and other household items in the central marketplace. Her enterprise is well-known for a flexible discount system she offers to her customers. 

Tahira has always wanted to be self-employed. Her husband has been very supportive of the idea, which is why she ventured to make her dream come true about 3 years ago. 

Tahira wants to keep her enterprise running to be able to provide for her family and support her elderly parents. She has many bright ideas she is hoping to implement along the way.  Tahira is a lively optimist and tries to mirror that attitude in her work as well. She is requesting a loan of 1000 AZN  and is hoping to repay the loan as successfully as the first one.

loans.use: purchase more merchandise to increase income

loans.name: Cirila Alejandrina

texts.es:
Cirila es socia del Banco Comunal “Azangarinas Valientes” ubicado en el distrito de Azángaro, provincia de Azángaro, departamento de Puno, tiene 25 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y con 02 hijos. La señora tiene estudios de educación primaria.

Cirila viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 08 meses, su   primer préstamo fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para incrementar el capital de  su negocio venta de productos de la Región.

Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá para comprar papas, chuños y quesos para su negocio.

Su sueño para el futuro es tener un negocio de chifleria. Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la puntualidad y la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Cirila is a member of the “Azangarinas Valientes” community bank located in the Azángaro district and province in the Puno department. She is 25 years old, lives with her partner and has two children. She has completed elementary school education.

Cirila has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for eight months. Her first loan was for 500 new soles, which was used to increase her business' capital selling regional products.

Now, she will request a new loan of 800 new soles which will be invested in the purchase of potatoes, freeze-dried potatoes and cheeses for her business. Her dream for the future is to have a "chifle" (fried plantain) shop. What she likes most about her community bank is the punctuality and responsibility.

loans.use: Purchase potatoes, freeze-dried potatoes and cheeses for her business.

loans.name: Gurmencinda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA UNION DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba  y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Gurmencinda; tiene 47 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de alquileres de habitaciones de su casa,ella trabaja en un hotel ya hace cuatro años, por medio de este negocio de alquileres saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar las habitaciones para alquilar. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción y terminar de construir su casa.


La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Union de Ollantaytambo" community bank. The bank is located in the Ollantaytambo district, belonging to the Urubamba province in the Cuzco department.

The member is Gurmencinda. She is 47 years old and is married and has five children. The member alternates her daily activities with renting rooms in her home. She has worked in a hotel for four years. Through the business renting rooms, she's able to help her children get ahead. She wants to improve the rented rooms. She is requesting the loan to buy construction materials and finish building her house.

She is thankful for the requested loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: The member requests a loan to buy construction materials and finish building her house.

loans.name: Tarana

texts.en:
Tarana A., a 40-year-old single entrepreneur, has been selling home products for 2 years.  These products are in high demand and are widely used for girls' dowries and for family celebrations. 

Now, Tarana is planning to enlarge her range of goods and is requesting a loan of 1000 AZN.  

An active and strongly motivated client of AqroInvest since 2008, her credit history makes her eligible to receive new and larger loans.

loans.use: To purchase home products for resale

loans.name: Sofia Karem

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “LA AMISTAD DE OLLANTAYTAMBO ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Sofia; La socia tiene 25 años de edad, ella es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos, la socia se dedica administrar su restaurante pollería, ella tiene un pequeño negocio que por las mañanas es un restaurante y por las tardes es pollería, la socia trabaja atendiendo a sus cliente y contrato una muy buena cocinera y juntas trabajan desde muy temprano, por las tardes ellas hacen pollos a la brasa y los venden de las misma forma juntas la dueña es la moza y cajera  la vez, la socia contrató a un joven para que atienda las mezas por lo que requiere un pequeño capital para su salario.  La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en su negocio con un pequeño capital para pagar a su joven ayudante.

La socia  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sofia is a member of the community bank "La Amistad de Ollantaytambo" [The Friendship of Ollantaytambo], which is located in the district of Ollantaytambo in the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.

Sofia is 25 years old, married, and has three children.  She manages a chicken restaurant.  She has a small business that in the mornings is a restaurant and in the afternoons is a poultry store.  She works serving her customers and hired a very good cook, and they work together from very early in the morning.  In the afternoons they grill chickens and sell them.  Sofia is the owner, waitress, and cashier all at the same time.  She hired a young person to wait on tables, but she needs money to pay their salary.  

She is asking for this loan to invest in her business with money to pay her young employee.

She is thankful for the loan provided, and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: Pay her employee's salary

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “LA AMISTAD DE OLLANTAYTAMBO ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Oscar; El socio tiene 46 años de edad, el es conviviente y tiene 7 hijos, el socio tiene como principal actividad la agricultura, el socio también trabaja en una ferretería el esta encargado de atender a los clientes y mostrarles todo lo que tienen en la tienda y que se les ofrece. El socio trbaja en esta ferretería 15 años y el también desea trabajar unos años mas y luego aperturar un negocio similar. El socio desea comprar semillas, abodno y poder sembrar papas. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar semillas de papa.

El socio  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to "La Amistad de Ollantaytambo" community bank. The community bank is located in the Ollantaytambo district, belonging to th Urubamba province in the Cusco department.

The member is Oscar. He is 46 years old, lives with his partners and has seven children. His principle activity is farming. He also works in a hardware store and is in charge of attending to customers and showing them all that they have in the store on offer. The member has worked in the hardware store for 15 years and he also wishes to work some more years and then open a similar business. He wishes to buy seeds and fertilizer so he may be able to plant potatoes. The member is requesting the loan to purchase potato seeds.

The member is thankful and values the loan granted in this manner and, at the same time, promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: The member is requesting a loan to purchase potato seeds..

loans.name: Sarita Colonia Group

texts.es: Isabel es L. tesorera D. grupo Sarita Colonia, tiene 38 años D. edad y vive en L. UCV 204 b D. Huaycan, está soltera y tiene tres hijos D. 18, 17 y 12 años, elL. lleva 4años trabajando con Edaprospo. ElL. hace productos D. Confitería como maní dulce y salado, chifles (plátano frito), habas, arrocillo y muchos más y con el esfuerzo D. su trabajo ha logrado mejorar su casa, además el ultimo préstamo lo ah utilizado en aumentar L. materia prima para sus dulces. Tiene planes D. poner una cubichería en su casa. El grupo “Sarita Colonia” lleva un año trabajando con Edaprospo y es conformado por 8 vecinas –amigas y eligieron el nombre porque trata D. una mujer que es un modelo para ellas.
texts.en: Isabel is the treasurer of the group Sarita Colonia. She is 38 years old and lives in the UCV 204b of Huaycan. She is single and has three children who are 18, 17, and 12 years old. She has worked with Edaprospo for four years. She makes confectionary products such as sweet and salty peanuts, "chifles" (fried plantains), beans and rice and much more and, with the effort of her work, she has been able to improve her house. In addition, she used the last loan to expand ingredients for her sweets. She has plans to launch a restaurant in her house. The "Sarita Colonia" group has worked with Edaprospo for a year and is maD. up of eight neighbors and friends and they elected the name because it represents a woman who is a role model for them.

loans.use: Purchase products and stock.

loans.name: Agustina De Los Angeles

texts.es: Agustina De Los Ángeles tiene 25 años, su actividad es la venta de calzado. Hace más de 4 años, que se dedica a este negocio, por lo que ha sido difícil este continuar con este negocio, por los diferentes desafíos que ha enfrentado pero esto no la detiene a salir adelante es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora. Este negocio lo aprendió de su esposo ya que anteriormente él se dedicaba a vender de manera ambulante pero con el paso del tiempo consigue un trabajo y fue así como Agustina se hace cargo del negocio. Este crédito es para la compra de una gran variedad de calzado. Actualmente se acerca una muy buena temporada y desea aprovecharla.
texts.en:
Agustina De Los Ángeles is 25 years old.  She has worked for more than four years selling shoes.  It has been difficult to continue her business because of different challenges she has faced, but they haven't prevented her from getting ahead, because she is a very hardworking and enterprising person.
