She learned this business from her husband, who previously worked as a street vendor, but now has another job, and now Agustina takes care of the business.  

She is asking for this loan to purchase a variety of shoes.  A busy season is approaching, and she would like to take advantage of it.

loans.use: Purchase shoes

loans.name: Ariza

texts.en:
Ariza H.  is 53 years old. She and her husband purchase and resell cows and poultry as their business. She has 3 children. Ariza would like to request a loan of 1000 AZN in order to purchase additional cows. This will increase her inventory and meet her customers' demands. She believes this will lead to greater revenue and ultimately, greater profit for her family.

 In the future, Ariza would like to reinvest the earnings generated by this loan into her business to purchase additional cows and to increase their income further. She promises to repay her loan on time as she did with the first loan that she has successfully repaid.

loans.use: to purchase one cow and fodder

loans.name: Americo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LA UNION DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.


El socio es el Sr. Americo; el tiene 40 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; el socio se dedica a preparar pan, el tiene una panadería donde prepara diferentes tipos de pan y también se dedica a la crianza de pollos, el socio trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m y su esposa se dedica a la crianza de pollos y juntos sacan adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere mejorar su negocio. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos  como harina, manteca y otros insumos para preparar pan.


El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to "La Union del Ollantaytambo" community bank. The bank is located in the Ollantaytambo district, belonging to the Urubamba province in the Cusco department.

The member is Americo. He is 40 years old and lives with his partner and has two children. The member is dedicated to making bread. He has a bakery where he prepares different types of bread and also is dedicated to raising chickens. The member works from 5AM until 6PM and his wife is dedicated to raising the chickens and together they help their children get ahead. The member wishes to improve his business. The member is requesting a loan to purchase products such as flour, butter and other ingredients to make bread.

The member is thankful to those who are part of this dream through this means and he promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: The member is requesting the loan to purchase products such as flour, butter, and other ingredients to prepare bread.

loans.name: Digna Adilia

texts.es:
La Sra. Digna Hernández se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo popular tiene una pequeñena pulperia, tambien se dedica a la fabricacion de rosquillas.
Digna sigue elaborando rosquillas pero ha bajado en su producción debido a su nuevo negocio ya que anteriormente elaboraba 3 veces por semana y ahora lo hace 2 veces a la semana. 
En su negocio de pulpería se encuentra lo mas necesario para el consumo diario como ser: azúcar, Arroz, espaguetis, salsas, cubitos, etc… y especialmente todo lo relacionado en carnes y lácteos.
Doña Digna esta casada y es madre de cuatro hijos con una bebe de 2 meses de nacido, su esposo se dedica a la albañilería (construcción y reparación de viviendas) 
Digna tomo la decisión de dedicarse al negocio para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de los hijos.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia y asi surtir mas su negocio.
texts.en:
Señora Digna Hernández sells popular consumer products. She has a little grocery store, and she also makes fritters. Digna continues to make fritters, but she has decreased her production because of her new business. In the past, she made them three times a week, and now she makes them twice a week. In her grocery store, she stocks the most necessary items for daily consumer use, such as sugar, rice, pasta, sauces, bouillon cubes, etc., and especially everything related to meat and milk.

Doña Digna is married and is the mother of four children, with a baby two months old. Her husband works as a bricklayer, doing housing construction and repair. Digna decided to work at her business to help her husband with the expenses of their children.

She will use the loan to purchase merchandise to stock her business.

loans.use: Buy rice, sugar, coffee, milk, bread, crakcers, beans, lard, and oil to stock her store.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Dina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA UNION DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Dina; tiene 30 años de edad, y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tiende de abarrotes y también se dedica a la venta de jugos en el mercado de Ollantaytambo, ella tiene un pequeño puesto y por medio de estos pequeños negocios saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar la tienda de abarrotes. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite al por mayor.


La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Dina is a member of the community bank "La Union de Ollantaytambo", which is located is the Ollantaytambo district in the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.

Dina is 30 years old, married, and has two children.  She balances her daily activities with running a general store.  She also works selling juices in the market in Ollantaytambo, where she has a small stall.  Thanks to these businesses, she hopes for her children to get ahead.  

She would like to expand her general store.  She is asking for this loan to purchase items like rice, sugar, milk, and oil at wholesale prices.

Dina is thankful for the loan and promises to make all of her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase rice, sugar, milk, and oil at wholesale prices

loans.name: Erick

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “LA AMISTAD DE OLLANTAYTAMBO ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Erick; El socio tiene 24 años de edad, el es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos, el socio tiene como principal actividad la agricultura, el socio también trabaja vendiendo artesanía, el socio aprovecha que Ollantaytambo es un pueblo muy antiguo con un legado histórico único, el socio realiza trabajos de artesanía pero le rinde mejor si los compra al por mayor y los vende luego, entonces él se a dedicado a comprar del pueblo de Pisac artesanía al por mayor desde cuarzos, piedras preciosas, aretes, collares , llaveros entro otros diferentes trabajos y los vende en un pequeño local que el alquilo cerca al maravilloso complejo de Ollantaytambo su pequeño espacio. El socio solicita el préstamo para poder invertir en la compra de artesanía ala por mayor. 

El socio  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Erick is a member of the community bank "La Amistad de Ollantaytambo", which is located in the district of Ollantaytambo in the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.

Erick is 24 years old, married, and has two children.  He works in agriculture, but also sells handicrafts.  Ollantaytambo is a very old town and he would like to make the most of its unique historical legacy.  He has made handicrafts, but knows that it is better for business if you buy them in bulk and sell them later.  He would like to buy crafts in the town of Pisac like quartz crystals, gemstones, rings, necklaces, and key chains, among other items.  He will sell them in a small store that he rents near the wonderful complex of Ollantaytambo.  

He is asking for this loan in order to invest in the purchase of handicrafts at wholesale prices.

He is thankful for the loan and promises to make all of his payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase handicrafts at wholesale prices

loans.name: Las Entusiastas De La 3Era Etapa De La Era Group

texts.es: La señora Rufina es una D. las integrantes del grupo “Las Entusiastas D. La Tercera Etapa La Era” las cuales son muy amigas, ella tiene 60 años y está casada, tiene 6 hijos D. los cuales indica que su mayor logro ah sido conseguir que todos ellos sean profesionales, antes trabajo en una fábrica D. muebles que cerró hace 15 años, desD. entonces decidió junto a su esposo poner su propio negocio D. tapizado y arreglo D. muebles, últimamente ha tenido más gastos por la salud D. su esposo y desea pronto poner una cebicheria en su casa, para lo cual con el ultimo préstamo compro las mesas y desea que Edaprospo le ayuD. a conseguir poder llevar adelante sus proyectos y así mejorar su casa y su calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Señora Rufina is one of the members of the group "Las Entusiastas D. La Tercera Etapa La Era” (Enthusiasts of the Third Stage of the Era), all of whom are good friends. She is 60 years old and is married. She has 6 children, and she indicates that her greatest success has been to see that all her children have careers. In the past, she worked at a furniture factory that closed 15 years ago. After that, she decided with her husband to set up her own business upholstering and repairing furniture. Lately she has had more expenses related to the health of her husband, and she soon wants to set a a ceviche restaurant in her home. With her last loan she bought the tables for it, and she wants Emprender to help her carry out her projects and thus improve her home and her quality of life.

loans.use: Buy products and ingredients

loans.name: Rosa Francisca

texts.es:
Rosa de 64 años, vende ropa de hombre y mujer. Vive en una zona urbana llamada suburbio y caracterizada porque la mayoría de sus habitantes son comerciantes. 

Ella trabaja en un puesto de venta de ropa en el mercado “J” que lo han inaugurad, vende pantalones, blusas, ropa interior. Trabaja sola desde las 08h00am hasta las 14h00pm, una de las dificultades para realizar las ventas es que en la edad que tiene ya no puede trabajar óptimamente porque si llega a enfermarse va a ser muy difícil. Mientras que ella vende ropa su esposo vende en su casa botellas de agua para poder solventar los gastos de la casa. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar blusas, pantalones y ropa interior para surtir más la ropa. En el futuro quiere tener un local propio porque tiene problemas con el municipio porque están readecuando los puestos
texts.en:
Rosa is 64 years old. She sells men's and women's clothing. She lives in an urban zone called Suburbio, where the majority of the inhabitants are business people.

She has a stall for selling clothes in Market J, which has just been set up. She sells pants, blouses, and underwear. She works only from 8 in the morning until 2 pm. One of her difficulties in making sales is that at her age she can't work as much as she would like to, because it would be very difficult if she got sick. While she is selling clothing, her husband sells bottled water in their home to be able to pay the household expenses.

With the loan, she wants to buy blouses, pants, and underwear to increase her stock of clothing. In the future, she wants to have her own location because she is having problems with the city because they are remodeling the market stalls.

loans.use: Buy blouses and pants to increase her stock.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA UNION DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nilda; tiene 35 años de edad, y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio atender un kiosco escolar y también tiene un cafetín en el mercado de Ollantaytambo, ella atiende desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, ella quiere ampliar su negocio. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar para el cafetín como carne, gaseosas, pollo y verduras.

La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the communal bank “LA UNION DE OLLANTAYTAMBO.” The bank is located in the Ollantaytambo district, which belongs to the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Nilda, and she is 35 years old. She has a live-in partner and 4 children. She altenates her daily activities with her business: she works in a school snack kiosk and also has a small café at the Ollantaytambo market. She works from 7:00 a.m to 5:00 p.m., and she would like to expand her business. She is requesting the loan to buy products to prepare for the café, such as meat, chicken, vegetables and soft drinks. 

The borrower appreciates the loan she is requesting, and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: Buying products to prepare for her café, such as meat, chicken, vegetables and soft drinks

loans.name: Nancy Julia

texts.es: Nancy es una mujer emprendedora vende dulces como: lec he asada  y pasteles, diariamente reparte estos productos en los colegios e instituciones que funcionan en su comunidad. A sus 51 años de edad Nancy ha logrado que sus dos hijos mayores sean profesionales y uno aun esta   bajo su tutela  y está cursando la secundaria en una escuela pública, esta iniciativa de negocio se emprendió desde muy joven, pues sus padres tenían una pequeña panadería lo que la motivo para aprender el curso de repostería. Además se está dedicando a la crianza de cuyes que le generan buenas ganancias pues son de alta demanda en la zona, ha logrado mejoras en su vivienda  y se ha comprado una batidora moderna para el preparar sus postres. El préstamo será invertido en  insumos para sus diversas preparaciones  y en aportar junto con su esposo para el viaje de promoción de su hijo. Nancy está contenta por tener este financiamiento y pagara puntualmente sus cuotas mes a mes.
texts.en: Nancy is an enterprising woman who sells sweets like: leche asada (a flan-like dessert) and cakes.  She delivers these products daily to the schools and institutions that operate in her community.  At 51-years-old, she has accomplished that her two children become professionals.  One is still under her care and is studying in secondary school in a public school.  She began her business when she was very young.  Her parents had a small bakery that motivated her to learn how to bake.  Additionally, she raises guinea pigs which brings in good profits because they are in high demand in the area.  She has been able to improve her home and has purchased a modern mixer to prepare her desserts.  This loan will be invested in ingredients for her various preparations and will also be used to help support, along with her husband, her son’s class trip.  Nancy is happy to have this loan and will make her payments promptly every month.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA UNION DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba  y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Nilda; tiene 26 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de refrigerios, ella hace sándwich de pollo y carne y también vende bebidas y los vende en la plaza de armas de Ollantaytambo, ella trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia quiere tener una cafetería. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar gaseosas y panes al por mayor para hacer sándwich.


La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "La Union de Ollantaytambo". The bank is located in the Ollantaytambo district, which is in the Urubamba province and the department of Cusco.
The member's name is Nilda. She is 26 years old, married, and has 2 children. The member alternates her household tasks with running a business selling snacks. She makes chicken and meat sandwiches and also sells drinks. She sells her goods in one of the town squares of Ollantaytambo. She works from 6:00am to 5:00pm. She wants to have a cafeteria. The member is requesting a loan to buy sodas and bread to make sandwiches. 
The member is grateful for the loan and she promises to make her repayments according to the established timetable.

loans.use: To buy sodas and bread to make sandwiches

loans.name: Otilia

texts.es: Otilia, de 60 años, es una madre de familia muy trabajadora, es separada de su esposo y vive en su casa propia en compañía de su hijo. Todos los días de la semana Otilia, se dedica a la venta de helados, en la puerta del colegio que queda a 10 cuadras de su casa. Sus ventas las realizan con mucha amabilidad y carisma, como la refieren los alumnos. Es por ello que Otilia espera es su sitio habitual en las afueras del centro educativo en la entrada y salida de clases, para vender helados. Este trabajo le ha sido rentable, pese además la competencia que tiene, pero eso no la desanima, ella aún continua con la venta y trabaja con mucho esmero para salir adelante. Hace 30 años que trabaja, siendo su principal fuente de ingresos y que su trabajo sea más rentable, y para ello desea ampliar su negocio con la venta de otro tipo de helados, de la marca más reconocida en el mercado. Es su 16avo crédito con MFP, por lo que asegura que este crédito será muy beneficioso es el desarrollo de su actividad. En su banco comunal es una socia my querida y respetada por lo que lidera este grupo. Con el crédito que solicita, va incrementar más helados para la temporada de verano que se acerca.
texts.en: 60 year old Otilia is a hardworking mother. She is separated from her husband and lives in her own house with her son. Every day of the week, Otilia sells ice cream at the entrance of the high school that is 10 blocks from her house. The students say that she does this work with great kindness and charisma. This is why Otilia waits in her habitual place outside the education center to sell her ice creams at the entrance and exit of the classes. This work has been profitable for her despite the competition, but the competition does not discourage her and she continues to work and sell her goods with a real commitment to succeeding. She has been doing this work for 30 years and it is her main source of income. She wants to grow her business and make it more profitable by selling other types of ice cream of the most recognized brand. This is her 16th loan from MFP and she assures us that this loan will be very beneficial to the development of her business. She is a loved and respected member of her community bank, and for these reasons she is the leader of the group. She is requesting this loan so that she can stock more ice cream for the coming summer season.

loans.use: To stock-up on ice cream.

loans.name: Glenda Nuvia

texts.es:
La Sra. Glenda Hernández se dedica al comercio tiene una pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación la cual opera bajo el nombre de Pulpería “los 4 Hermanos” negocio con el que cuenta con mas de 6 años de experiencia y administración del mismo.
El crecimiento en su negocio es notable y sus condiciones de vida han mejorado en gran manera y esto debido al apoyo que recibe de su esposo.
Doña Glenda esta casada y es madre de 4 hijos que junto a sus esposo están trabajando para darles una buena educación, don Rigoberto esposo de Doña Glenda se dedica a la agricultura ya que la zona donde vive es productiva de granos básicos.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia para surtir mas su negocio.
texts.en:
Glenda is a shopkeeper. She has a grocery store that she runs from her home under the name "Los 4 Hermanos" ("The 4 Brothers"). She has more than 6 years experience running this business. 
Her business has grown notably and their quality of life has improved greatly, and this is due to the support that she receives from her husband. Glenda is married and is the mother of 4 children. Together with her husband, she is working to give them a good education. Glenda's husband, Rigoberto, works in agriculture and the area where they live is known for its production of grain crops. 
She will use this loan to buy merchandise to supply her business.

loans.use: To buy beans, rice, sugar, butter, oil, aceite, refreshments, juices, dairy products, meat,  lacteos, carnes, sausages, pastas, soups, flour, corn meal, and tortillas.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Yrma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA UNION DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba  y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Yrma; tiene 48 años de edad, y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de pensión pollería, ella atiende desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 1:00 p.m y por medio de este negocio saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar su negocio. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pollos y papas al por mayor.


La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Yrma belongs to the “La Unión de Ollantaytambo” community bank which is located in Ollantaytambo district, in Urubamba province, in the department of Cusco.

Yrma is 48 years old.  She is single and has one child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business running a poultry store.  She works there from 5.00am to 1.00pm and, through her business, she helps her child to get ahead.  She would like to expand and improve her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy chicken and potatoes wholesale.

She is grateful for the loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy chickens and potatoes wholesale

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “LOS HIJOS DE QOLQUEWASI ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Javier; El socio tiene 56 años de edad, el es divorciado y tiene 1 hijos, el socio tiene un pequeño restaurante, el socio trabaja con su hija y juntos se organizan para sacar adelante su pequeño restaurante, el socio necesita aumentar insumos y comprar aceite, harinas, arroz al por mayor para que le sea rentable su negocio.  El socio solicita el préstamo para poder invertir en la compra de insumos para su restaurante. 

El socio  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Javier is a member of the “Los Hijos de Qolquewasi” community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province, in the department of Cusco.

Javier is 56 years old.  He is divorced and has 1 child.  He has a small restaurant.  He works with his daughter and together they make progress with their small restaurant.  Javier needs to increase his supplies and buy oil, flour and rice wholesale to make his business profitable.  He is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of supplies for his restaurant.

Javier is grateful for the loan and appreciates it.  He pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To invest in the purchase of supplies for his restaurant

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “LOS HIJOS DE QOLQUEWASI ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Alberto; El socio tiene 39 años de edad, el es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos, el socio tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes, y también tiene un vehículo el cual lo da para que hagan servicio de taxi. El socio desea el préstamo para invertir en el combustible de su vehículo.   

El socio  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Alberto belongs to the Los Hijos De Qolquewasi Communal Bank.  It is in the Huanchac district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Alberto, age 39, has a live-in partner and two children.  He has a small grocery store, and he also has a vehicle that is used for taxi service.  Alberto wishes to use the loan to buy fuel for his vehicle.

He appreciates and values the loan that has been provided. Therefore, he promises to complete his payments by the established deadlines

loans.use: To buy fuel for his vehicle

loans.name: Agueda

texts.es:
La señora Águeda es socia del banco comunal El Arenal, del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos, su primer préstamo recibido de Manuela Ramos fue de S/.300.00 soles, con el cual comenzó su negocio.
Águeda es costurera  pero también tiene su negocio de venta de bebidas gaseosas, lleva 14 años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos y asegura que le va muy bien, porque puede aportar algo de dinero a su hogar y ayudar a su esposo, que es empleado de una triplayera (elaboran triplay). 
Con este préstamo de S/. 2,000.00 soles, invertirá en la compra de 10 metro de tela y una recubridora, que necesita para dar mejor acabado a sus prendas de vestir y también comprará 5 cajas de gaseosas de diferentes sabores.
La señora Águeda  confía en que Manuela Ramos le siga apoyando con los préstamos y le agradece porque puede dar una buena educación a sus menores hijos y por  todo lo que ha logrado hasta el momento.
texts.en:
Agueda is a member of the communal bank El Arenal in the Callería district of the Ucayali region.  She is 45-years-old, is married, and has four children.  Her first loan with Manuela Ramos was for 300 soles, with this loan she opened her business.  
Agueda is a seamstress, but she also has a business selling sodas.  She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for 14 years and says that it has gone very well for her because she can use some of the money to support her home and help her husband, who is an employee in a plywood factory.
With this loan of 2000 soles, she will invest in the purchase of 10 meters of fabric and a coating that she needs to give a better finish to her garments.  She will also purchase five boxes of sodas in different flavors.  
Agueda trusts that Manuela Ramos will continue to support her with loans and thanks her because she has been able to give a better education to her younger children and for everything else that she has achieved up until now.

loans.use: Purchase of fabric and threads

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA UNION DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosalia; tiene 34 años de edad, y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de frutas, ella vende en el mercado de Ollantaytambo, ella vende manzanas, naranjas, platanos, uvas, naranjas y papayas, ella trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar frutas al por mayor.

La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: This borrower belongs to "La Unión de Ollantaytambo" ["The Union of Ollantaytambo"] communal bank.  This bank is located in the Ollantaytambo district, in the province of Urubamba, department of Cusco.  This borrower is Ms. Rosalia.  She is 34 years old, lives with her partner, and has one son.  She alternates her daily activities with buying and selling fruit at the market in Ollantaytambo.  She sells apples, oranges, bananas, grapes, oranges, and papayas.  She works from 6:00 AM to 7:00 PM and would like to expand her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy fruits wholesale.  Rosalia is grateful to be receiving the loan she requested and she promises to make her repayments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy fruits wholesale

loans.name: Eliar Jose

texts.es: Eliar José  de 34 años,  tiene una pulpería en donde vende, enlatados, canes, sopas y carnes. Inicio cuando tenía ciertos ahorros, propios fue así que inicio este medio de vida  ya que necesitaba este ingreso necesario para su hogar. El tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo y con el paso del tiempo es que ha logrado ampliar su negocio. Trabaja desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche todos los días vendiendo golosinas, bebidas, granos, pan y gaseosas Una de las dificultades en estos meses para trabajar en su tienda ha sido la enfermedad de su esposa ya que él se debe encargar de sus hijos. Con el préstamo quiere comprar bebidas, granos básicos, pan entre otros. Pues se acerca una buena temporada y quiere ofrecer de todo.
texts.en: Eliar José is 34 years old.  He has a small grocery store in which he sells canned goods, soups and meat.  He started his business when he had a certain amount of savings.  He started the business as he needed the income for his family.  He has two dependent children in his care and, over time, he has managed to expand his business.  He works from 6 in the morning until 9 at night every day selling candies, soft drinks, grains, bread and soda.  One of the recent difficulties he has had in working in his store has been his wife's illness since this means that he also has to take care of his children.  He will use his loan to buy drinks, basic grains and bread, amongst other products since a good season is approaching and he wants to be able to offer everything to his customers.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA UNION DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba  y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Gloria; tiene 49 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de frutas y crianza de pollos, la socia vende diferentes tipos de frutas ya que en su pequeño terreno produce frutas como naranjas, mandarinas y ciruelos y después los vende en forma ambulatoria, la socia quiere tener un lugar donde pueda vender la fruta y pollos. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar frutas y pollos al por mayor.


La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Ollantaytambo Union communal bank.  The bank is located in the Ollantaytambo District, Urubamba Province, Department of Cusco.

The member is named Gloria.  She is 49 years old and married with three children.  She alternates between her daily activities of selling fruits and raising chickens.  She sells different types of fruits that she grows on her small plot, including oranges, mandarins and plums.  She sells her fruits as a walking vendor.  Gloria would like to have a permanent place to sell her fruits and poultry.  She is requesting a loan to buy fruits and chickens at wholesale prices.

She is grateful for the requested loan and promises to make timely payments.

loans.use: To buy wholesale fruits and chickens.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA UNION D. OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia D. Urubamba  y departamento D. Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Francisca; tiene 76 años D. edad, y es viuda y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias y se dedica a su hogar, ella es ama D. casa y sus hijos ya se hacen cargo D. ella cuidándola, la socia quiere tener una tienda D. abarrotes. La  socia solicita el préstamo para la mantención D. su casa.

La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
La socia belongs to “LA UNION D. OLLANTAYTAMBO” communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Ollantaytambo, in the Urubamba province and Cusco department.


The member is Francisca; she is 76 years old, a widow and she has 6 children. The member alternates her daily activities and looks after her home, she is a housekeeper and her children take care of her. The member wants to have a grocery store. The member is requesting the loan for the maintenance of her home.

The member is grateful for the requested loan and promises to make the payments in the period specified.

loans.use: The member is requesting the loan for the maintenance of her home.

loans.name: Saguinto Group

texts.es:
Banco de emprendimiento integrado por  8 integrantes de los cuales 5 viven en la misma zona del km. 13 urbanizacion Arcoíris y urbanizacion Campo verde y las demás viven en el barrio de San Lorenzo.  
Su Actividad: servicio venta De comida, venta de ropa, cosméticos, etc.
La Presidenta es la Sra. Cristina modista hace 5 años, trabaja en su domicilio ya que cuenta con el material de trabajo propio, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de tela para la confección de sus prendas ya que le hicieron pedidos de poleras. Su Estado civil: concubina con el sr. Benigno y tienen tres hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar.
                                                                                                              Secretaria La Sra. Mariela  vive en el barrio San Lorenzo hace 1 año, su actividad es venta de comida en su domicilio concubina con el sr. Luis el cual es mecánico y tienen un hijo en su poder, con el dinero del crédito comprara insumos para la elaboración de sus platillos.
                                                                                                              Tesorero: Román  su actividad es albañil, vive en la urb. Arcoíris km. 13 y trabaja cerca a la zona donde vive, concubino con la Sra. Carolina la cual se dedica a labores de casa y cuentan con 2 hijos a su poder.  Son personas responsables y puntuales y están agradecidos con la institución por el apoyo económico y la motivación de superación en sus negocios y actividades.
texts.en: Venture bank consists of 8 members of whom 5 are living in the same area of Arcoíris and Campo Verde and the rest live in the neighborhood of San Lorenzo. Their activity: selling food, selling clothes, cosmetics, etc. The President is Mrs. Cristina who has been a dressmaker for 5 years. She works at home and has her own work materials. The money from the loan will be used to buy fabric for the creation of the garments as she has already received orders for t-shirts. She is living with Mr. Benigno and they have three school-age children. The secretary Mrs. Mariela has lived in the neighborhood of San Lorenzo for 1 year. Her business is selling food at home and she lives with Mr. Luis who is a mechanic and has a son. With the loan they will buy ingredients for the preparation of their meals. The treasurer, Román, is a mason. He lives in the area of Arcoíris and he works in the district near to where he lives with Mrs. Carolina. She is a stay-at-home mother with two children. These are responsible and punctual people and they are grateful to this institution for the financial support and motivation to excel in their businesses and activities.

loans.use: Purchase of fabric and ingredients for meals

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “L. UNION D. OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a L. provincia D. Urubamba y departamento D. Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Gregorio; el tiene 48 años D. edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; el socio se dedica al negocio D. venta D. pop corn, el venD. en una carreta en una D. las calles D. Ollantaytambo y también trabaja en L. municipalidad D. Ollantaytambo y por las tardes sale a vender el pop corn, el socio quiere tener otra carreta mas para vender. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar una carreta nueva.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “L. Union D. Ollantaytambo" (The Ollantaytambo Union).  The bank is located in Ollantaytambo District, which belongs to Urubamba Province, Department of Cusco.

The member is Sr. Gregorio. He is 48 years old, lives with his partner and has 3 children.  The member makes his living selling popcorn.  He sells the popcorn from a cart in the streets of Ollantaytambo.  He also works in the municipality of Ollantaytambo, and in the afternoons he goes out to sell his popcorn.  Sr. Gregorio wants to have another cart so can can increase his sales.  He is requesting the loan in order to purchase a new cart.

The member thanks all those who are a part of making his dream come true, and he promises to comply with his re-payment schedule in the established time frame.

loans.use: This member is requesting the loan to purchase a new sales cart.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es: Rocío, tiene 22 años, es una joven muy trabajadora, vive en casa de sus parientes. Desde muy temprana edad ha trabajado vendiendo productos de belleza, y con las ganancias que recibía puede cubrir los gastos educativos en un instituto particular, en el que cursa  el 4to ciclo de diseño grafico. Es así, que a sus compañeras de estudios, les ofrece sus productos de belleza, por eso carga un bolso grande donde lleva la mercadería y los catálogos para futuros pedidos en cosméticos. Ella afirma que le va muy bien en la venta, y lo que más le gusta son las campañas reiteradas que realizan las empresas, siendo así premiada con varios productos adicionales a sus pedidos. En adelante, su mayor deseo es terminar de estudiar su carrera y ejercerla y claro sin dejar su negocio que no le parece nada complicado. En su segundo crédito con MFP y se compromete en pagar de manera puntual sus cuotas. Además, señala que le gusta trabajar en su banco comunal, ya que son personas muy solidarias. Con el crédito que solicita, va comprar más productos de belleza, para atender los diversos pedidos pendiente.
texts.en:
Rocío is 22 years old and very hardworking. She lives at home with her parents. From a very young age she has been selling beauty products. With her savings she has been able to cover her education expenses for a private institute where she is in the 4th year of graphic design. 

She sells beauty products to her schoolmates, so she always carries a big bag with merchandise and catalogs for future orders of cosmetics. Sales are going very well for her and what she likes most are the frequent product promotions that the companies do because she earns extra products with her orders. For the future, her greatest wish is to finish studying and to work in her field, and, of course, to continue with her business, which seems very feasible to her. 

This will be her second loan with Microfinanzas Prisma and she promises to make her payments punctually. She has also indicated that she enjoys working with her communal bank because the members are very supportive. With the loan she is requesting, she will buy more beauty products so she can fill various outstanding orders.

loans.use: To purchase more beauty products.

loans.name: Las Iguanas (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
En la calle 26 De Septiembre de la ciudad de Portoviejo en un sector conocido como la calle de las iguanas por encontrarse muchos de estos animalitos en ese lugar y que son protegidos por los habitantes de ese lugar, encontR. el Banco Comunal Las Iguanas los mismas que se reúnen cada quince días.  
Este es un grupo de personas que a pesar de que este es su primer ciclo es muy unido y  sus socias muy amistosas. Ellas se dedican a diferentes actividades, tales como: (comercio, ventas, producción y  servicios,).

Aquí encontR. a la señora Ana Cristina,  ella tiene 20 años y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual ha procreado una hermosa bebe de 5 meses, ella estudia el quinto semestre de Ing. Civil en la Universidad Técnica De Manabí. Su marido trabaja en un taller de aluminio y vidrio.

Se dedica al comercio vende productos de Avon, Sayce y lebel (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios de damas). Trabaja todos los días de tres a cuatro horas diarias de acuerdo a lo que tenga que hacer ya que acomoda su horario de estudio y de trabajo, además de dedicarle tiempo a su pequeña bebe la cual deja al cuidado de su mamá cuando realiza sus labores, tiene en este negocio ya dos años y dice que le ha ido bien, deja a crédito sus productos y cobra cada quince días.

Este crédito es para comprar sus productos ya que tiene varios pedidos y en especial comprar productos de oferta los mismos que luego vende al precio normal lo que representa mejores ganancias. Sus sueños son terminar sus estudios y poder ejercer su profesión.
texts.en:
We come upon the Las Iguanas Communal Bank on 26 De Septiembre Street in the city of Portoviejo. The area around the bank is known as “Calle de las Iguanas” because so many of these little animals are found in the area and protected by the area’s inhabitants. Bank members meet every fifteen days.
Even though this is their first loan cycle, this group of people is very united and its members very friendly. The members work in different activities, including: (business, sales, production and services).

Among them is Mrs. Ana Cristina. She is 20 years old. She is in a common-law marriage that has produced a beautiful 5-month-old baby. She is in her fifth semester studying Civil Engineering at the Technical University of Manabí. Her husband works in an aluminum and glass workshop.

Ana Cristina works in business, selling Avon, Sayce and Iebel products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and ladies’ accessories). She works three to four hours every day depending on what she has to do. She accomodates her school and work schedule while also saving time for her little baby. She leaves her baby in the care of her mother while she does her work. Ana Cristina has been in this business for two years now; she says it has gone well for her. She gives her products on credit and collects payment every fifteen days.

This loan is for buying products because she has several requests. She especially wants to buy products on sale, which she will then sell at the normal price, making a greater profit. Her dreams are to finish her studies and to be able to work in her profession.

loans.use: Buy beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and beauty accessories.

loans.name: Nara

texts.es:
La señora Nara es socia del banco comunal El Arenal, del Distrito de Callería, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 59 años de edad.  Está casada y tiene 10 hijos todos ya mayores e independientes. 
Nara  lleva 7 años trabajando con Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue de  S/. 300.00 soles, con ese dinero empezó su negocio.
Ella se dedica a la venta de comida  para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de su casa  y lo hace solo por las tardes, vive con su esposo que se desempeña como agricultor. 
Con este préstamo de S/. 1,200.00 soles, invertirá una parte en su negocio de comida y la otra parte lo destinara para comprar 5 kg de  semilla de maíz, 2 kg de semilla de frejol, ½  kg de semilla de tomate, ½ kg de semilla de culantro de la región, ¼  kg de semilla de pepinillo, ½ kg de semilla de vainitas y otras semillas mas.  
La señora nara está muy complacida con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, porque con ese dinero puede trabajar para poder mantenerse y pagar los servicios de su hogar.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nara is a member of the Arenal communal bank in the Callería district within the Ucayali department.  She is 59 years old.  She is married and has 10 children, all of whom are grown up and independent.

Nara has been working with Manuela Ramos for the past 7 years.  Her first loan was for 300 soles and was used to start her business.

She sells food in the afternoons in order to help her husband with the household expenses.  She lives with her husband who works in agriculture.

She will use part of the 1200 soles loan towards her food business and put the rest towards buying 5 kg of corn seed, 2 kg of bean seed, ½ kg of tomato seed, ½ kg of regional cilantro seed, ½ kg of green bean and other seeds.

Mrs. Nara is very pleased with the loans from Manuela Ramos because with this money she has been able to work towards maintaining herself and paying the household utilities.

loans.use: To buy groceries for food preparation.  To buy seeds.

loans.name: Luz Angelica

texts.en:
Luz is fifty-one years old.  She lives along with her partner and two children in the district of Tambogrande.  It is a rural region with a large number of small farms and agricultural laborers.

The family raises cattle and sheep on their property.  They run a small dairy and produce milk and cheese.  Luz sells these products to their neighbors and to other local residents.  In addition, Luz’s husband works as a field laborer in local farms during harvest times and when they require other help.

This will be Luz’s first loan with Edpyme Alternativa.  She plans to invest the loan proceeds in improving her corrals, the dairy business and purchasing balanced feed for her animals.  She is very proud of her business and hopes to be able to continue to expand in order to provide a better future for her children.

loans.use: To  improve her corrals, the dairy business and purchase balanced feed for her animals

loans.name: Luz Karina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LA UNION DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba  y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Luz Karina; tiene 27 años de edad, y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de bar, ella vende gaseosas y cervezas, ella atiende desde las 6:00 p.m hasta las 12:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar gaseosas y cervezas al por mayor.


La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “LA UNION DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”. The bank is located in the district of Ollantaytambo, which belongs to the province of Urubamba and department of Cuzco.


The member is Mrs. Luz Karina. She is 27 years old, in a common law marriage and has 2 children. The member alternates her activities between her daily activities and the bar business. She sells soft drinks and beer. She serves from 6:00 p.m until 12:00 p.m. She wants to enlarge the business and is asking for the loan to buy soft drinks and beer wholesale.   

The member is grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: The member is asking for the loan to buy soft drinks and beer wholesale.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.en:
Jose is thirty years old.  He lives in the village of Mercedes de Pedregal in the district of Tambogrande.  His wife and two minor children share a rustic home in rural part of the region.

Jose has a number of sheep and one cow.  He raises the sheep in order to sell them for their meat and he gets milk from the cow.  In addition to raising animals, Jose manages a small plot of land which the family inherited from their parents.  On the land he raises mangos and limes.  Through these activities Jose works to maintain a stable income stream for his family.

This will be Jose’s first loan with Edpyme Alternativa.  He has a good credit history with other institutions.  He plans to invest the funds in the purchase of additional animals and to purchase balanced feed in bulk.  He hopes to be able to continue to improve his family’s lifestyle and to provide for the education of his children

loans.use: Purchase of additional animals and to purchase balanced feed in bulk

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa lives in the vilage of Macuaco in the district of Oyotun.  It is a rural region near the cities of Chiclayo and Lambayeque with a large number of small farms.  Rosa owns her home which she shares with her children and husband.  They are a well respected family in the region as a result of their good disposition and fairness.  Rosa is fifty-one years old.

Out of the front of her home, Rosa manages a small general store.  She sells a wide range of goods, including dry foods, beverages, detergent, hygienic supplies and candy.  She is happy to be able to work as her own boss and earn additional income for her family.

Rose plans to use the requested loan in order to expand her merchandise.  She believes that she will be able to increase her daily sales and expand her clientele by having a better product range and more consistent services.  Rose dreams of providing her children with a good education so that they have the maximum number of options in their future.

loans.use: To expand her merchandise

loans.name: Clara

texts.es:
Clara es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Flores de Vilquechico” ubicado en el distrito de Vilquechico, provincia de Huancané, departamento de Puno, tiene 26 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y tiene 01 hijo, la señora realizó estudios de educación superior.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 01 año, su primer  préstamo solicitado fue S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de abarrotes, además la señora vende animales menores

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar mercaderías para su tienda.
	
Su sueño para el futuro es tener más capital para su negocio y tener un carro.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la puntualidad, la responsabilidad y el ahorro.
texts.en:
Clara is a member of the “Las Flores de Vilquechico” comunal bank, located in the district of Vilquechico, in the province of Huancané, in the department of Puno. She is 26 years old, lives with her partner, and has one child. She completed her high school studies.

She has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan was for PEN 500.00, which allowed her to increase her working capital for her small grocery business. She also sells small animals.

She is requesting a new loan of PEN 1,000.00, which she will use to buy merchandise for her store.

Her dream for the future is to have more capital for her business and to have a car.

What she most likes about her communal bank is the punctuality, responsibility, and savings.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Ricardo Antonio

texts.es: Ricardo Antonio tiene 54 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de tapicería. Hace más de 30 años que se dedica a esta actividad, por lo que no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos y ha sido de gran ayuda para mejorar. El nombre de su negocio es Tapicería L. ya que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado construir lo que tiene hasta lo momentos, tiene 1 hijo a su cargo que ha demostrado que se preocupa por lo que él. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima como clavos, telas, pega, zipper entre otras cosas que son necesarias. Ya que actualmente tiene ciertos pedidos para esta época del año.
texts.en: Ricardo Antonio is 54 years old. He has an upholstery business. He has been doing for more than 30 years, which is why this is not the first time he has taken out loans, which have been very helpful for improving his business. The name of his business is L. Upholstery. With much hard work, he has been able to build up what he has. He has one son in his care, and who has shown interest in the business. He is requesting the loan to buy materials such as nails, fabrics, glue, and zippers, among other necessary things. He currently has some orders for this time of year.

loans.use: To buy nails, fabrics, glue, and zippers, etc.

loans.name: Javier

texts.en:
Javier lives in the village of Pan de Azucar in the district of Oyotun.  The region is primarily rural with many small farms.  Javier and his wife  own  their home and a small plot of land nearby.  Javier is 67 years old.

For over thirty years Javier has planted various crops on his land and worked as a farm hand for his neighbors.  He is a very hard working and strong man, traits which have earned him great respect in the region.  He is always ready to help and provide a friendly slap on the shoulder to someone in need.

Javier plans to invest the loan proceeds in additional seeds and fertilizer in order to obtain a good crop in the coming growing season.  He hopes to be able to increase the yield on his land and replenish the nutrients in the soil.  He is always proud to see the land produce under his diligent care.

loans.use: To purchase seed and fertilizer

loans.name: Reyna Yojana

texts.es: La señora Reyna Yojana tiene 35 años. Su actividad es la venta de productos lácteos. Hace más de 8 años que tiene este negocio, este negocio lo aprendió de sus padres que compraban y vendían queso de Estelí pues es una mujer muy luchadora y responsable ella se encuentra muy emocionada con este primer crédito que le será de mucha ayuda. Reyna solicita este crédito para la compra de materia prima como queso, leche, crema y cuajada.  Ella sueña lograr construir su propia vivienda pues es importante tener algo que sea de ella y dejarlo a sus hijos.
texts.en: Mrs. Reyna is 35 years old. For the past eight years she has been selling milk products.  She learned this business from her parents, who bought and sold cheese from Estelí. She is a hardworking and responsible woman. She was very emotional about her first loan, as it will help her a lot. Reyna is asking for this loan in order to buy raw material such as cheese, milk, cream and milk curd. She dreams of building her own home as it is important to have something that is hers and that she can leave to her children.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Carmen Eusebia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMAUTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Carmen; ella tiene 66 años de edad, soltera  y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes vendiendo productos de primera necesidad como son azúcar, arroz, leche  y a la vez tiene otro negocio de lavado de carros , el cual lo administra por las mañanas.

 La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar su tienda de abarrotes y su otro negocio de lavado de carros.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “Amauta” Community bank. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the Cusco province in the district of Cusco.
This member is Mrs. Carmen. She is 66 years old, single and has two children. This member splits her daily activities between two businesses. She has a small grocery store where she sells basic food products such as sugar, rice and milk. She also has another business washing cars. She does this business in the mornings.
She is asking for this loan in order to buy supplies for her grocery store and for her car washing business.
She is thankful for the people that have been part of this dream. She promises to pay back the loan according to the terms of the loan.

loans.use: She is asking for this loan in order to run her grocery store and her car washing business.

loans.name: Maria Antonieta

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOC RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Maria Antonieta; tiene 36 años de edad, y es soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta y compra de ropa y también vende zapatos y zapatillas y las trae de la ciudad de Tacna y de Desaguadero, ella vende en forma independiente y los lleva a lugares como Urubamba y Anta, la socia quiere tener una tienda para vender la mercadería. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como zapatos, zapatillas y ropa al por mayor.


La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “Mosoc Ruina” Community bank. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the Cusco province in the district of Cusco.
This member, Mrs. Maria Antonieta, is 36 years old, and single with two children. She splits her daily activities between buying and selling clothes and selling shoes and sandals. She brings her products from the cities of Tacna and Desaguadero. She sells them herself in places like Urubamba and Anta. She would like to have a store from which to sell her merchandise. She is asking for this loan in order to buy merchandise such as shoes, sandals and clothes in general.
She is thankful for the loan that she is asking for and she promises to pay her payments on time.

loans.use: This member is asking for a loan in order to buy merchandise such as shoes, sandals and clothing in general.

loans.name: Miria

texts.en:
Miria is fifty-four years old.  She lives in the village of Macuaco in the district of Oyotun.  It is a rural area with many small farms.  Miria shares her home with her husband and her son.  The family is well respected in the region.  They maintain a stable and happy home.

For over ten years now, Miria has supplemented her family's income by raising animals in the yard behind their home.  She raises ducks, chickens and turkeys.  These animals provide the family with a form of savings account in order to stabilize income as well as an additional source of income.  She sells the animals in local markets once they reach the appropriate size.

Miria has requested this loan in order to purchase balanced feed for her animals and to expand her herd.  She hopes that this action will provide for faster growth and allow her to take advantage of the better prices for her animals during the holiday season.  She is proud of her work and happy to be able to play a significant role in the financial stability of her family.  She hopes her children will benefit from her hard work and have even better opportunities than she had.

loans.use: Purchase balanced feed for her animals and to expand her herd.

loans.name: Elisabeth Koska

texts.es:
La señora Elisabeth es socia del banco comunal El Arenal, del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos, lleva 6 años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos.
La señora Elisabeth se dedica a la venta de comida en horas de la tarde, para poder apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa, porque el sueldo de profesor no le alcanza para todos los gastos de su hogar. 
Con este préstamo de S/ 1,200, comprará utensilios, una nueva parrilla, un saco de carbón, 25 kilos de arroz para los Juanes (comida típica)y azúcar para los refrescos, 6 litros de aceite, condimentos, 1 doc. de vasos y demás insumos que le hacen falta.
Elisabeth está muy contenta porque puede apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y por lo mismo agradece a Manuela Ramos por el apoyo que presta a las mujeres  que desean realizar un negocio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Elizabeth is a member of the El Arenal Community Bandk in the Calleria district, in the department of Ucayali. She is 45 years old, married and has three children. She has been working with the loans from Manuela Ramos for six years.
Mrs. Elizabeth sells prepared food in the afternoons in order to help her husband with their household expenses because a teacher does not earn enough to pay for all the household expenses. With this loan of 1200 soles, she will buy utensils, a new grill, a sack of coal, 25 kilos of rice to be used for a typical dish called Juanes, sugar for drinks, six liters of oil, condiments, one dozen glasses and other supplies that she needs.
Elizabeth is very happy that she can help her husband with the household expenses. She is thankful to Manuela Ramos for the support that they give to women who are starting a business.

loans.use: She will buy supplies.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana, de 41 años, es una madre de familia muy organizada y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia, en compañía de su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Durante el día Juana, se dedica a la costura y a la atención de su nuevo negocio que es una librería, instalado en el primer ambiente de su casa. Pero el trabajo por el cual sus clientes la conocen es como costurera, ya que ésta labor, es la más antigua que ha ejercido. Por otro lado lo considera como un trabajo muy rentable, sobre todo cuando se trata de elaborar prendas femeninas,  donde acumula buenas utilidades sin el mayor esfuerzo ni la mayor inversión. Es por ello que le gusta coser y brindar un buen servicio, de acuerdo a la solicitud de sus clientes, es así que ya lleva 13 años en esta labor que tanto le apasiona y espera ampliar su librería y diversificar con prendas de vestir, debido a la solicitud de sus clientes. Es su segundo crédito con MFP y se compromete a ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, ya que anhela contar con posteriores ayudas para el desarrollo de su  negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, va comprar hilos, cierres, para el trabajo de costura, asimismo desea comprar cuadernos, láminas, escarchas y otros accesorios  para  librerías, e incluso prendas de vestir, para diversificar su negocio.
texts.en:
Juana, age 41, is an organized and hardworking mother who lives in her own home with her husband and two children. During the day, she works as a seamstress and also manages a new business – a bookstore that she set up in the main room of her house. Her customers know her mainly for her sewing since she has done that work the longest. Juana considers this work to be very profitable, especially when it comes to making women’s clothing. She has generated good earnings without having to make any great efforts or large investments. It is for this reason she enjoys sewing and providing good service according to what her customers order. Juana has been in business for 13 years and is passionate about her work. She hopes to expand her bookstore and diversify the clothing she offers based on her customers’ requests.

This is her second loan with MFP. Juana promises to be prompt with her payments so that she can receive further support in developing her business. The loan she requested will be used to buy thread and zippers for sewing. She will also buy notebooks, laminate sheets, glitter, and other bookstore accessories in addition to clothing to diversity her business.

loans.use: Purchase sewing supplies & merchandise to stock her bookstore

loans.name: Vicente

texts.en:
Vincente is fifty-six years old.  He shares his home with his wife and their two children.  They live in the village of Viru in the district of Oyotun.  He and his family are well respected in the area as good citizens, hard workers and supportive community members.

Vincente owns a small parcel of farm land near his home.  He is currently planning to plant rice on the land for this growing season.  For this reason he is in need of a loan in order to purchase additional supplies to better care for the young plants.  He hopes to be able to increase his crop yield.

Edpyme Alternativa has worked with Vincente in the past.  He has a good credit history and punctual repayments.  He has always used credit wisely and for the betterment of his family.  He dreams of providing his children with opportunities and a full education.

loans.use: To purchase additional supplies to better care for the young plants

loans.name: María José

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar encontramos a  la señora María José, ella tiene 29 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual ha procreado tres hijos de 10 – 9 y 4 años, los mayores estudian en la escuela y el menor en el jardín de infantes. El marido es comerciante.
 
Ella además de ser una gran ama de casa se dedica al comercio, vende ropa por catalogo de las marcas Nivi y Unimoda,  su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y su forma de vender es enseñar la revista y allí sus clientes deciden que comprar, luego ella realiza los pedidos a la distribuidora en Quito o Guayaquil y recibe los productos en Rocafuerte en la cooperativa de transporte Reina Del Camino, trabaja cuatro días a la semana tres horas al día, dice que lleva ya en su negocio cerca de 6 años y que empezó gracias a la ayuda de una amiga que la impulso a que empiece en este negocio.

Este crédito es para pagar los pedidos que ha realizado y que están a punto de recibir. Este es el cuarto ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por las comodidades que brinda la institución. Su meta es  incrementar su negocio.
texts.en:
We met María José in Rocafuerte. She is 29 years of age and lives with her life partner with whom she has three children of 10, 9 and 4 years of age. The older children go to school, and the youngest attends kindergarten. Her husband is a merchant. 

As well as a being a great housewife, María José works selling Nivi and Unimodo brand clothes from a catalogue.  She sells door to door. After her customers choose their preferred items from the magazine, María José places their order with distributors in Quito or Guayaquil.  The clothes are later delivered to Rocafuerte via the Reina del Camino transport cooperative. She has been working three hours a day, four days a week for close to six years. She started the business thanks to the help of a friend who encouraged her.

María José will use this loan to pay for the orders she has already placed, which she about to receive payment for. This is her fourth cycle with the community bank. She likes the services that the institution offers. Her goal is to increase her business.

loans.use: Purchase clothes

loans.name: Araceli Del Carmen

texts.en:
Araceli is thirty-nine years old. She lives, along with her husband and her two children, in the village of Espinal in Oyotun. Both of her children are minors. The family owns its small home.

For ten years now, Araceli has run a small general store out of the front of her home. She sells a wide variety of products including rice, beans, soap, toilet paper, hygiene items, beverages and candy. Her children are able to help in the business every now and again, meaning they get to learn about business.

Araceli plans to invest the funds in expanding her selection of merchandise and deepening her inventory of highly requested goods, as currently she finds that she is often unable to meet the demands of her clients. She hopes to be able to continue to expand her market share. She is very happy to be able to work independently and to care for her children.

loans.use: Purchase additional merchandise

loans.name: Tula

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOC RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Tula; tiene 52 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa y también trabaja en un hotel desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 2:00 p.m, la socia quiere tener una tienda para vender ropa. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa como pantalones, casacas, chompas y polos.


La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Tula is a member of the Communal Bank “Mosoc Runa”, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 52 years old, married, and has one child. Tula divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling clothes. She also works at a hotel from 6am to 2pm. Tula wants to have a store where she can sell clothing. She is requesting a loan in order to buy clothes such as trousers, jackets, sweaters, and polo shirts.

Tula is grateful for the loan she requested and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase trousers, jackets, sweaters, and polo shirts

loans.name: Clementina

texts.es:
Clementina es socia del  Banco Comunal “San Salvador”, ubicado en el distrito de Capachica, provincia  Puno, Departamento Puno, tiene 63 años de edad, estado civil viuda, con cuatro hijos y grado de instrucción superior completa.
La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace diez años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/.300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para comprar más productos en su negocio de venta de medicamentos (botica). Actualmente tiene otra actividad múltiple entre ellos podemos mencionar venta de artefactos, juguetes de todo tipo y también el engorde de ganados.
Ahora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/3000.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que le permitirá incrementar el capital de su negocio. 
Su sueño  es retomar el negocio inicial, es decir trabajar en su botica.
Lo  que le gusta del Banco Comunal  es intercambiar ideas, conversar y bromear.
texts.en:
Clementina is a member of the San Salvador Communal Bank, which is located in the District of Capachica, Province and Department of Puno. She is 63 years old, widowed, and has four children. Clementina completed her higher education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for ten years. The first loan she requested was in the amount of 300 PEN, which she used to buy more products for her pharmacy business. Clementina currently has several businesses which include selling appliances and toys of all kinds, as well as fattening cattle.

Now she is requesting a loan for 3000 PEN, which will allow her to increase her business capital. Her dream is to return to her original business of operating a pharmacy. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the exchange of ideas, the conversations, and the ability to joke around.

loans.use: Increase her operating capital

loans.name: Luz Estela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMAUTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luz; ella tiene 74 años de edad, casada  y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de  venta y compra de ropa como son chompas , pantalones , blusas ,camisas . Este negocio le hace sentir bastante feliz.

  La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mas ropa y asi poder distribuir a todos sus amigos.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Luz is a member of the Communal Bank “Amauta”, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 74 years old, married, and has five children. Luz divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling clothes such as sweaters, trousers, blouses, and shirts. This business makes her feel very happy. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy more clothing so that she can distribute them all to her friends.

Luz is grateful to everyone who helped fulfill her dream and promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase more clothing that she can sell to her friends

loans.name: Aquilina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOC RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Aquilina; tiene 65 años D. edad, y es casada y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. ropa y también venD. líneas D. llamada, la socia venD. ropa en forma independiente, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa como pantalones, casacas y polos.


La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Aquilina is a member of the Communal Bank “Mosoc Runa”, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 65 years old, married, and has six children. Aquilina divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling clothes. She also provides calling services. Aquilina sells clothing as an independent merchant and wants to expand her business. She is requesting a loan in order to buy clothes such as trousers, jackets, and polo shirts.

Aquilina is grateful for the loan she requested and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase trousers, jackets, and polo shirts

loans.name: Luis Felipe

texts.es:
Luis de 46 años, es vendedor de ropa y accesorios personales en el suburbio de Guayaquil. Vive en una zona  caracterizada porque la mayoría de sus habitantes son comerciantes.  

Hace 10 años atrás comenzó su negocio de venta de ropa y artículos personales, desde ese tiempo hasta ahora ha trabajado con dedicación para tener su negocio surtido. Trabaja desde las 08h00am hasta las 13h00pm todos los días vendiendo camisas, pantalones, blusas. Tiene de venta ropa desde $ 3.00 en adelante. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar camisas, pantalones y blusas para surtir más la ropa que tiene. En el futuro quiere tener los dos locales fijos uno solo de ropa y otros de accesorios personales.
texts.en:
Luis, age 46, sells clothing and personal accessories in Suburbio de Guayaquil. He lives in an area where most of the residents are merchants.

Luis has been selling clothing and personal accessories for ten years. From the time he started until now, he has worked diligently to ensure that his business is well-stocked. Luis works every day from 8am to 1pm selling shirts, trousers, and blouses. Articles of clothing in his inventory are priced at $3.00 and up.

Luis wants to use this loan to buy shirts, trousers, and blouses to increase his inventory of clothing. In the future, he wants to have two established locations where he will sell only clothing at one and personal accessories at the other.

loans.use: Purchase shirts, trousers, and blouses

loans.name: Ruth Miguelina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOC RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Ruth Miguelina; tiene 41 años de edad, y es divorciada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa y también se dedica  a la producción de café, cacao y chocolate, ella tiene un pequeño terreno de cultivo y luego lo vende en forma independiente, la socia quiere mejorar las tierras de cultivo. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.


La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Ruth Miguelina is a member of the Communal Bank “Mosoc Runa”, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 41 years old, divorced, and has three children. Ruth divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling clothes. She also produces coffee, cacao, and chocolate. Ruth has a small plot of farmland and sells her crops as an independent merchant. She wants to improve her land, so she is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers.

Ruth is grateful for the loan she requested and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase seeds & fertilizers

loans.name: Constantina Maria

texts.es:
Constantina es socia del Banco Comunal “Punta Sahuacasi” ubicado en el distrito de Azángaro, provincia de Azángaro, departamento de Puno, tiene 47 años edad, de estado civil casada y con 02 hijos, la señora estudió hasta 5to de educación primaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 03 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de queso, leche y artesanías.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le servirá para comprar lanas de alpaca para tejer ponchos y escarpines.

Su sueño para el futuro es tener más capital y ser mayorista en artesanía.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones, la puntualidad y responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Constantina is a member of the Communal Bank “Punta Sahuacasi”, which is located in the District and Province of Azángaro, Department of Puno. She is 47 years old, married, and has two children. Constantina has a fifth grade education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for three years. Her first loan of 300 PEN was used to increase her business capital for selling cheese, milk, and handicrafts.

Sra. Constantina is requesting a new loan in the amount of 1000 PEN so that she can buy alpaca wool for making ponchos and baby booties. Her dreams for the future are to have more capital and become a crafts wholesaler. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the meetings, the promptness, and the responsibility.

loans.use: Purchase alpaca wool for knitting ponchos & baby booties

loans.name: Jorge Gerardo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “AMAUTA ”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr.Jorge ; el tiene 52 años de edad y es  soltero y tiene 1 hijo; el socio tiene un negocio de venta de repuestos industriales para todo tipo de maquinarias como hornos , molineros y a la vez vende material de enseñanza acerca de estas maquinarias .

 El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar mas repuestos de maquinas industriales.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sr. Jorge is a member of the Communal Bank “Amauta”, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

He is 52 years old, single, and has one child. Jorge has a business selling industrial parts for all types of machines such as ovens, grain mills, and occasionally he sells instructional materials about these machines. He is requesting a loan to buy more industrial machine parts.

Jorge is grateful to everyone who helped fulfill his dream and promises to complete his payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase industrial machine parts

loans.name: Ana Maria
