texts.es: Ana Maria vende y compra productos de casa comerciales, por lo que ha sido un gran avance para ella, pues no tiene un trabajo que le genere ganancias para su hogar. Por iniciativa propia fue que aprendió este medio de vida ya que tenía que mantener a sus hijos cuando estaban más pequeños, tiene 30 años en este negocio. Con el préstamo quiere comprar perfumes, cremas, desodorantes, maquillaje, etc. En el futuro quiere tener una gran variedad de clientes estables.
texts.en:
Ana Maria buys and sells commercial household products. This was a big step for her because she did not have a job in which she could earn household income. Of her own initiative, she learned this trade so that she could support her children when they were much younger. Ana Maria has been in this business for 30 years.

With this loan she plans to buy perfumes, crèmes, deodorants, make-up and other products. In the future, she wants to have a wide variety of stable customers.

loans.use: Purchase perfumes, crèmes, deodorants, make-up and other products

loans.name: Elvira

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOC RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Elvira; tiene 45 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de azúcar y arroz, ella tiene una tienda donde vende azúcar y arroz al por mayor y luego lo distribuye a las diferentes tiendas, la socia también tiene un cafetín en un colegio particular, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio de venta de arroz y azúcar. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar arroz y azúcar al por mayor.

La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Elvira belongs to the Mosoc Runa ["New People" in Quechua] communal bank, which is located in the district of Cusco, in the province of the same name.

Elvira is 45 years old and is married with two children. Each day she tends to her chores and also runs a business selling sugar and rice. She has a store where she sells these items wholesale, and distributes them to various stores. Elvira also runs a small food stand at a local school. She wants to improve her sugar and rice selling business, and is asking for the loan to buy large quantities of rice and sugar.

Elvira is thankful for the loan and promises to make her payments within the established time period.

loans.use: To buy large quantities of rice and sugar

loans.name: Tereza

texts.en:
Tereza is fifty-four years old. She lives in her own home in Oyotun in the province of Cajamarca. She shares her home with her husband and one of their sons.

For ten years now, Tereza has run a small general store out of her home. She sells basic goods including soap, detergent, dry foods, vegetables, beverages, candy, etc. She enjoys running the store because it provides her with the opportunity of serving her community and maintaining relationships.

Tereza plans to invest the loan proceeds in additional merchandise. She finds that often her supply does not meet the demands of her customers and she therefore would like to expand her product offering. She hopes that this action will increase her family's income and better provide for their needs.

loans.use: Purchase additional merchandise

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOC RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Roxana; tiene 33 años de edad, y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de de tejidos de alpaca, la socia realiza tejidos como chompas, vestidos, y chalinas y luego los exportar hacia el país de Japon, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para el tejido como lana al por mayor.

La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank “Mosoc Runa.”  The bank is located in Cusco District, which is part of Cusco Province, Department of Cusco.

The member is Sra. Roxana.  She is 33 years old, lives with her partner and has 2 children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling woven Alapaca products, for instance sweaters, dresses and scarves.  She then exports her products to Japan.  Through this business, she has been able to give her children a better future.  The member is hoping to expand her businiess.  She is requesting the loan in order to purchase weaving materials, like wholesale wool.

This member is thankful for the loan she has requested, and she promises to comply with the established time frame for repaying the loan.

loans.use: This member is requesting the loan in order to purchase weaving materials, like wholesale wool.

loans.name: Patricia Del Carmen

texts.es: Patricia del Carmen H. de 26 años de edad, reside en el departamento de Usulután en donde vive junto a su esposo y un hijo de 4 años de edad. Patricia posee un pequeño negocio en el cual comercializa diferentes tipos de golosinas como: dulces, chicles, galletas, jugos, así mismo comercializa café en polvo, granos básicos entre otros productos de primera necedidad. Estos los comercializa por mayor, y su negocio se encuentra ubicado en el  mercado llamado “mercado de Pelotas”, uno de los mercados más grandes de Usulután. Patricia solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda invertir en el negocio, comprando mayor cantidad de golosinas, granos básicos, jugos y otros más, y de esta forma aumentar las ventas, las cuales sean de mucha ayuda para la economía de su familia.
texts.en: Patricia del Carmen H. is 26 years old.  She lives in Usulután Department with her husband and their 4-year old son.  Patricia owns a small business in which she sells different types of sweets, like candies, gum, cookies and juice. She also sells instant coffee and basic grains, along with other basic needs products.  She sells these item in bulk.  Her business is located in the “Mercado de Pelotas” market, which is one of the largest markets in Usulután. Patricia is requesting the loan to be able to invest in her business.  She plans to buy a greater quantity of sweets, basic grains, juices and other items, and in this way to increase her sales, which are a great financial help to her family.

loans.use: To purchase basic needs products, which will be invested in her business.

loans.name: Flora Estefani

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMAUTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Flora; ella tiene 52 años de edad, casada  y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de  ollas de la marca Reyna Ware vendiendo sartenes, ollas a presión, cacerolas. 
La socia es profesora de nivel primario y en sus ratos libres se dedica  a  este negocio. 

  La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar más ollas para así poder vender a todos sus conocidos.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Ms. Flora belongs to the "Amauta" communal bank [Amauta means "wise man" or "teacher" in the Quechua language]. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province and department of Cusco.

Flora is 52 years old, married, and has 3 children. She alternates her daily activities with selling Reyna Ware brand cookware.  She sells saucepans, pressure cookers, and casseroles. She is a primary school teacher and runs this business in her spare time.

She is requesting a loan to buy more pots so that she can sell them to all of her acquaintances.

She is thankful to all those who, through this means, will help her realize this dream. She promises to make her repayments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to buy pots and pans to sell to her acquaintances

loans.name: Luz Angelica

texts.es: Luz es una mujer luchadora que hace mas de 5 años emprendió el negocio de vender comida, con su deliciosa sazón  diariamente vende ceviche en la puerta de su casa por las mañanas y por las tardes vende frituras como salchipapas. Eso no es todo, a lo largo de este tiempo comercializa  prendas de vestir que trae desde Tacna. Una de sus cuñadas le incentivo a realizar negocios y a sus 49 años Luz ha logrado  ampliar su vivienda y aportar para el pago del colegio de su último hijo que tiene 14 años. El préstamo será invertido en mercaderías nuevas como juguetes u otros para vender esta campaña navideña próxima. Luz está orgullosa de poder obtener y pagar puntualmente sus créditos en Edaprospo.
texts.en:
Luz is a fighter who has been in business selling food for more than 5 years.  With her delicious seasoning, she sells 'ceviche' (raw fish marinated in citrus juices and spiced with chili peppers) in the doorway of her house every morning and every afternoon she sells fritters such as 'salchipapas' (a Peruvian fast food made from thinly-sliced, pan-fried sausage or hot dog, french fries and condiments).

That isn't all.  Throughout these 5 years she has also been selling clothes which she gets from Tacna.  One of her sisters-in-law encouraged her to go into business and at 49 years old Luz has managed to extend her house and pay towards her (14 year-old) youngest child's school fees.  This loan will be invested in new merchandise such as toys and other products to sell this coming Christmas period.  Luz is proud that she can obtain loans from Edaprospo and pay them on time.

loans.use: To buy toys

loans.name: Guillermo Miguel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOC RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.


El socio es el Sr. Guillermo Miguel; el tiene 48 años de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; el socio se dedica a trabajar como maestro de construcciones es propietario de una pequeña constructora donde construyen diferentes lugares como casas, edificios y centros comerciales y por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar una materiales de construcción.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Guillermo Miguel is a member of the “Mosoc Runa” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Guillermo Miguel is 48 years old.  He is married and has 2 children.  He works as a master builder.  He is the owner of a small construction business which builds different places such as houses, buildings and shopping centers.  Through this business he has managed to get his children ahead.  He would like to expand his business.  He is requesting this loan to buy building materials.

He is grateful to all those who will take part in his dream by funding his loan and pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy building materials

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMAUTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Elizabeth; ella tiene 52 años de edad, casada  y tiene 3 hijos; La socia es profesora de educación primaria, ella trabaja  desde las 7:00am hasta las 02:00pm , la socia se siente feliz ya que trabaja por sus hijos y desea darles una buena educacion.
  
La socia solicita el préstamo para la educación de sus hijos.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a member of the “Amauta” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Elizabeth is 52 years old, married and has 3 children.  She is an elementary school teacher.  She works from 7.00am to 2.00pm.  She feels happy because she works for her children and would like to give them a good education.

She is requesting a loan to pay for her children's education.

She is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by funding her loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To pay for her children's education

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy bigger tubs for clothes which have already been washed and to stock her grocery store

loans.name: Maria Socorro

texts.en:
Maria lives in the village of San Martin in the district of Las Lomas in Piura. She runs a stable home, along with her husband and their two children.  She is thirty-seven years old.

Out of her home Maria runs a small general store. She can be found in her front door attending to clients seven days a week. Maria sells items of basic need including soap, food, beverages, candy and kitchen supplies. She has a dedicated clientele and stable demand. The family also owns a small property in the area on which her husband plants and harvests various crops.

The loan proceeds will be used to increase Maria’s inventory. She often finds herself short of supplies or unable to meet client requests, therefore she would like to increase her existing inventory and expand her market share. She hopes to be able to improve her family’s income and quality of life. She is a dedicated mother and dreams of seeing her children become professionals.

loans.use: Purchase additional merchandise

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOC RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Consuelo; tiene 57 años de edad, y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de confección de ropa y también atiende kiosco escolar, la ropa lo vende de forma independiente y luego los distribuye diferentes tiendas, la socia quiere ampliar. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para confeccionar la ropa.

La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Consuelo is a member of the “Mosoc Runa” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Consuelo is 57 years old.  She is single and has one child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her dressmaking business.  She also serve in a school kiosk.  She sells the clothes independently and then different stores distribute them.  She would like to expand her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy materials for making clothes.

She is grateful for the loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy materials for making clothes

loans.name: Fernando Jose

texts.es: El señor Fernando se dedica a una brindar el servicio de carpintería. Hace más de 3 años que se dedica a esta actividad donde le va muy bien por los numerosos pedidos que tiene. Su familia la conforma su esposa y sus 3 hijos menores de edad que están a su cargo cuenta con una familia. Inicio el taller porque necesitaba ingresos para su hogar.  Este crédito le ayudara al señor en compra una herramienta, Madera, clavos entre otras cosas para mejorar su trabajo.
texts.en: Fernando works as a carpenter. He has done this activity for more than 3 years and it is going well for him because of the numerous orders that her has. His family is made up of his wife and 3 minor children who are under his care. He opened the workshop because he needed income for his home. This loan will help him buy a tool. wood, and nails, among other things, to improve his work.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana Julia R. D. L. D. 54 años D. edad, es una señora muy trabajadora, la cual vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos los cuales se dedican a estudiar, y junto a quienes resiD. en el departamento D. Usulután. Ana posee su propia tienda D. productos perecederos en la cual comercializa productos como: golosinas, sodas, jugos, leche, pan, granos básicos y otros más, el negocio se encuentra en su casa D. habitación, lo cual es D. mucho beneficio para ella debido a que le permite cuidar D. su hogar al mismo tiempo que atienD. su tienda. A pesar que cuenta con mucha competencia, ella posee varios clientes los cuales a diario consumen D. sus productos. Ana solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para surtir la tienda, comprando productos por mayor, D. manera que cuente con todo lo necesario para atender D. la mejor manera a sus clientes y así obtener algunos nuevos. Ana desea mucho poder aumentar sus ventas y D. esta forma vivir mejor junto a su familia.
texts.en: Ana Julia R. D. L. is 54 years old. She is a very hardworking woman who lives with her husband and two children, who go to school. She lives with them in the department of Usulután. Ana owns her own perishable products store where she sells products such as: snacks, soda, juice, milk, bread, basic grains and more. The business is located at her house, which is very beneficial to her because it allows her to take care of her home and attend the store at the same time. Despite having a lot of competition, she has a lot of customers who use her products every day.  Ana is asking for a loan with which she will have enough money to supply the store, buying products wholesale. This way she will have what she needs to best serve her customers and also get some more.  Ana really wants to increase her sales and in this way live better with her family.

loans.use: To buy perishable products

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es:
Consuelo es socia del Banco Comunal “Azangarinas Valientes” ubicado en el distrito D. Azángaro, provincia D. Azángaro, departamento D. Puno, tiene 61 años D. edad, D. estado civil casada y tiene 06 hijos (02 dependientes), realizó estudios D. educación primaria incompleta.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 02 años, su primer préstamo fue D. S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para incrementar el capital D.  su negocio D. venta D. chifleria.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 2000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en su mercadería como: cremas, colinos escobillas para su negocio.

Su sueño para el futuro es mejorar el negocio.

Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal  son las reuniones y la puntualidad
texts.en:
Consuelo is a member of the “Azangarinas Valientes” community bank which is located in Azángaro district, in Azángaro province, in the department of Puno.  She is 61 years old, married and has 6 children (2 of whom are still dependent on her).  She didn't complete her primary education.

She has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 2 years.  Her first loan was for 500 nuevos soles which she used to increase the working capital of her business selling 'chifleria' (natural remedies).

She is requesting a new loan for 2,000 nuevos soles to invest in buying merchandise such as creams, choline supplements and brushes for her business.

Her dream for the future is to improve her business.

What she most likes about her community bank are the meetings and the punctuality.

loans.use: To invest in buying creams, choline supplements, brushes, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Lingerie for her first two events

loans.name: Avery

texts.en:
Avery T. found a pair of clippers in his father’s closet when he was 11 years old and decided to cut his friend’s hair for fun. To his surprise, it actually looked pretty good! He started doing haircuts for all his friends on a regular basis and when he went to college at Savannah ST. College, he cut hair on the side to make some money. 

When Avery had just a bit too much fun with his college fraternity, Avery’s father convinced him to go into the military. In the military, Avery was the “go-to” barber. He says, “After doing 60 haircuts in a day, I really learned how to cut hair.” When he finished his service in the military in 1988, it was difficult for Avery to find a job he was interested in. His friend convinced him to go to cosmetology school. Avery then obtained his cosmetology license, his barber’s license and, with a scholarship from the school, an instructor’s license. 

Avery and his sister then started a beauty salon that they managed together for 15 years. In 2004, Avery was ready to start his own salon, "The Masters by Avery". He had developed such a loyal clientele that some of his clients helped him start this new business financially. He bought two chairs, two mirrors, two lights, and picnic chairs to begin with. The last-minute medley of furniture  did not deter his clients from coming! Avery continued to add items month by month to have a  salon with more sophisticated amenities. He has over 125 clients, and three stylists rent work-stations in his salon. 

With this loan, Avery plans to replace two dryers, a basin (for washing hair), chairs, and buy a new television for the clients to enjoy. Avery says, “These upgrades will contribute to a more relaxing environment and help put the clients and the stylists more at ease, and even make the stylists more motivated to make the business thrive.”

Avery hopes to build his business’ name into that of a prestigious salon that provides quality service in the Baton Rouge community.

loans.use: Replace two dryers, a basin, chairs, and buy a new television

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOC RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Susana; tiene 42 años de edad, y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de caldos que atiende desde las 6:00 p.m hasta las 3:00 a.m, ella prepara diferentes caldos como de pollo y carne y los vende en un puesto de venta de comida, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar los caldos.

La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Susana belongs to the “Mosoc Runa” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Susana is 42 years old and is single.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling soups where she serves from 6.00pm to 3.00am.  She prepares different soups such as chicken and meat and sells them from a food stall.  She would like to improve her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy ingredients for cooking soups.

She is grateful for the loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for cooking soups

loans.name: Pabla Isabel

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

La señora Pabla es socia fundadora del Banco Comunal y está muy contenta, nos dice que le gusta todo, los créditos, los intereses bajos etc. Ella tiene 58 años de edad, está soltera pero de una relación que tuvo hace varios años tiene tres hijos los mismos que son mayores de edad y que ya tienen compromiso.
 
Ella tiene una tienda de productos de primera necesidad y además tiene un pequeño salón de billar donde ella vende ciertas bebidas con grado de alcohol. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6am hasta las 22h00 en ambos negocios, nos cuenta que su tienda la tiene ya hace 18 años y que empezó por la necesidad ya que tenia que sacar a sus hijos adelante a pesar de estar sola.  Los productos de su tienda las compra en Portoviejo y también recibe en su local ciertos productos.

Este crédito lo va a invertir en comprar mas productos para surtir su tienda. Sus sueños son seguir trabajando y gozar de salud.
texts.en:
The members of the “Mujeres Organizadas” (Organized Women) communal bank meet every two weeks in the Rocafuerte hamlet.  This area is known all over the country for the delicious sweets made by its inhabitants.

Pabla is the founding member of the communal bank.  She is very happy with it and tells us that she likes everything about it; the loans, the low interest, etc.  She’s 58 years old and single now, but has three adult children, who are now on their own, from a previous relationship.

She has a store where she sells primary needs products, and also has a small pool hall where she sells certain alcoholic beverages.  She works both businesses every day from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM, and tells us that she started 18 years ago because she needed to get ahead with her children, since she was raising them alone.  She buys her store inventory in Portoviejo, but also gets in certain local products.

She will use the money from this loan to buy more products to stock the store.  Her dreams are to continue working and to stay healthy.

loans.use: Inventory

loans.name: Juliana Lisbeth

texts.es: Juliana es una jovencita muy emprendedora, ella trabaja como estilista hace medio año. Con el sueldo de este servicio que presta pudo ahorrar y comprar algunas tijeras y cepillos; pero aún insuficientes herramientas para lograr su sueño de un salón de belleza en su casa que espera lograr. Desea especializarse más en su carrera. El crédito lo invertirá para comprar accesorios de belleza como tintes, oxigenta, gel, brillo y adornos de cabello dado que está próximo las fiestas de promoción de colegios y en su zona no hay mucha competencia de este tipo de negocio, lo cual espera alcanzar captar regulares clientes.
texts.en: Juliana is a very enterprising young lady.  She has been working as a stylist for six months.  With the money she earns from this service she has been able to save and buy some scissors and brushes.  However, she still has insufficient equipment to achieve her dream of having a beauty salon in her home which she longs to do.  She would like to specialize some more in her career.  She will invest her loan in buying beauty accessories such as dyes, Oxigenta lotion, gloss and hair accessories because school graduation parties are approaching and in her area there is not much competition in this type of business.  She hopes to take advantage of the occasion to attract regular customers.

loans.use: To buy dyes, Oxigenta lotion, gel and gloss

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMAUTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Ana María; ella tiene 50 años de edad, casada  y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta y compra de ropa como son polos, casacas, ropa para niños y también al negocio de venta por catálogos como son perfumes, cremas, delineadores.
  
La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar más sus negocios de ropa y venta por catálogos.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido
texts.en:
Ana María is a member of the “Amauta” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Ana María is 50 years old, married and has 2 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities, her business buying and selling clothes such as polo shirts, jackets and children's clothes and also her business selling products from catalogs such as perfume, creams and eye liners.

She is requesting this loan to increase her clothes-selling business and her catalog business.

She is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by funding her loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To increase her clothes-selling business and her catalog business

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOC RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Julio Cesar; el tiene 25 años de edad y es soltero; el socio se dedica a trabajar como ingeniero químico, el es propietario de una empresa de producción de productos lácteos y néctares y después lo distribuye a diferentes lugares, el socio quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para la producción de leche, queso y mantequilla y de los néctares.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Julio Cesar belongs to the “Mosoc Runa” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Julio Cesar is 25 years old and is single.  He works as a chemical engineer and owns a business producing dairy products and nectars which he distributes to different places.  He would like to improve and expand his business.  He is requesting this loan to buy materials for producing milk, cheese, butter and nectars.

He is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by funding her loan and pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy materials for producing milk, cheese, butter and nectars

loans.name: Daisy Jamileth

texts.es:
Daisy es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Triunfadoras” ubicado en el distrito de Cabanilla, provincia de Lampa, departamento de Puno, tiene 22 años de edad, de estado civil convivientes y tiene 01 hijo, la señora actualmente sigue estudiando.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 02 años, nos cuenta que su  préstamo inicial fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de productos cosméticos.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra de perfumes, polvos entre otros para su negocio

Su sueño para el futuro es tener una tienda. Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones, la unión y la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Daisy is a member of the Mujeres Triunfadoras community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Puno.  She is 22 years old and partnered with one child.  She is in school now.

Daisy approached Movimiento Manuela Ramos for a loan 2 years ago and she tells us that she first borrowed S/.500 new soles, money that she used to stock her beauty products business.  She will use this loan of S/.1,500 new soles to buy perfumes, powders, etc. for the same business.

Daisy's greatest hope for the future is to own a store of her own.

What she most likes about the community bank are the meetings and the fellowship.

loans.use: Buy products to resell.

loans.name: Blance Lidia

texts.en:
Blance Lidia G. V. D. R. is a widow.  She is 56 years old and lives in the village of Sector Medio in TambogranD.. She owns her own home, which she shares with her son. The region in which they live is tropical and populated by many small farmers.

For a number of years now Blance has sold footwear for men and women. She sells the shoes upon request, in the streets and out of her home, given that she is well known in the neighborhood. In addition she owns two milk cows from which she harvests milk, and she receives a pension from a previous job with the state.

This will be Blance’s first loan with Edpyme Alternativa. She appreciates the opportunity to access a reduced interest rate loan as a result of the funding from Kiva. She plans to invest the funds in additional footwear inventory in order to better meet her clients' demands and make use of bulk discounts. She hopes to be able to better proviD. for the education of her child and to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase additional footwear

loans.name: Carmen Dinora

texts.es: Carmen Dinora A. C. de 43 años de edad, reside en el departamento de Usulután, a pesar que ella  esta casada y tiene dos hijos de 16 y 14 años de edad, vive únicamente junto a su hija menor debido a que su esposo vive en Los Estados Unidos junto a su hijo mayor. Carme posee una tortillería, en la cual trabaja desde hace más de 2 años, la cual ha sido un negocio bastante rentable, debido a que la tortilla por ser parte de la dieta básica de los salvadoreños, posee mucha demanda. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y visionaria la cual a pesar que posee ayuda de su esposo, desea salir adelante y contar con una mejor estabilidad económica en la cual no le haga falta nada a ella ni a su hija. Carmen  solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la venta de tortillas comprando maíz por mayor para obtenerlo a menor precios, así mismo desea poder comprar una cocina más grande llamada plancha, la cual se utiliza especialmente para hacer tortillas y pupusas, de esta manera ella podrá elaborar mayor cantidad de estas y así atender a más clientes.
texts.en: Carmen Dinora A. C., 43, lives in the Salvadoran "departamento" of Usulutan.  Although she is married and has two children--16- and 14-years old, respectively--she lives only with her younger child because her husband and older child are in the United States.  Carmen has a tortilla business that she has operated for more than 2 years.  The business is reasonably profitable because tortillas are a basic ingredient of the Salvadoran diet and, consequently, much in demand.  Carmen is deliberate and hard-working.  Even thought she receives help from her husband, she wants a steady, stable income of her own so that she can better support herself and her daughter.  Carmen is applying for a loan to raise the money she needs to support her tortilla business.  She will buy a bulk supply of maize to get the best price.  She also wants to buy a "plancha", a kitchen appliance that is used for making tortillas and pupusas.  The plancha will allow her to make more tortillas and serve more customers.

loans.use: Buy supplies for food business.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es:
Reynaldo es un joven padre de familia de 22 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a su pequeña hija en el anexo Santa Rosa del caserío Lagunas, una zona rural que pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y que se encuentra situada a una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace mas de dos años a la comercialización de artículos de respuestos para bicicletas, el cuenta con un pequeño establecimiento en su vivienda donde suele ofrecer en venta su mercadería a los vecinos de la zona. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores, especialmente de aves de corral, el las cría en la parte posterior de su domicilio, y cuando ya han alcanzado un buen punto de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que frecuentan la zona en donde reside.

Reynaldo desea ampliar su negocio de crianza y venta de animales adquiriendo más aves y alimento balanceado, de modo que pueda aumentar sus ventas y por ende, sus ganancias. Para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

El es una persona bastante responsable y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y respeto.
texts.en:
Reynaldo, 22, is a young father.  He lives with his wife and daughter in Lagunas, a rural area in Lambayeque province, about an hour and a half from the Peruvian city of Chiclayo.

Reynaldo has operated a bicycle parts business for more than two years.  He has a small shop in his house where he sells his merchandise to customers in the neighborhood.  He also operates a poultry business, raising and selling young birds that he keeps in a poultry yard behind his house.  When the birds are ready for sale, he sells them to the wholesalers who pass through the neighborhood.

Reynaldo wants to expand his poultry business, buying more birds and a balanced feed, so that he can increase his sales and, in turn, his earnings.  To meet his goal, he is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a S/.2,000 new soles loan.  

Reynaldo is a responsible man, ambitious to get ahead.  Those who know him like and respect him.

loans.use: Buy birds and feed for poultry business.

loans.name: Leticia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMAUTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Leticia; ella tiene 43 años de edad, casada  y tiene 2 hijos; La socia se dedica al proceso de productos naturales mediante molinos como son morón, chaquepa, haba, (mediante el molino se muela las habas y sale la harina de habas) luego selecciona y saca lo mejor de su producción para empacarlos y distribuirlos a las diferentes tiendas  para su venta final. 
  
La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar sus molinos y comprar las semillas de cada producto natural que necesita.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Leticia is a member of the AMAUTA communal bank, which is located in the district of Cusco, province of Cusco, department of Cusco.

Leticia, 43, is married and has 2 children. She is in the business of milling natural products, such as "morón", "chaquepa" and beans (bean flour is made by mill grinding beans). She then selects the best production, packs it and distributes it to different stores for final sale.
  
She is requesting a loan to install mills and buy seeds of all the natural product she needs.

She would like to thank those who are supporting her dream. She is committed to repaying the loan in the terms agreed.

loans.use: Loan requested to install mills and buy seeds of the different natural products needed.

loans.name: Ruben Dario

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOC RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Ruben Dario; el tiene 40 años de edad y es soltero; el socio se dedica a trabajar en el sector salud y también se dedica al negocio de artesanía, el vende en forma independiente, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de artesanía. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar artesanía como chompas, pantalones, cuadros y mantas.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Ruben Dario belongs to the “Mosoc Runa” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Ruben Dario is 40 years old and single.  He works in the health sector and also has a handicrafts business.  He sells independently.  He would like to expand his handicrafts business.  He is requesting this loan to buy handicrafts such as sweaters, pants, pictures and blankets.

He is grateful to those who will take part in his dream by funding his loan and pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy handicrafts such as sweaters, pants, pictures and blankets

loans.name: Santos De La Cruz

texts.es:
Santos tiene 31 años de edad, es soltera y tiene un hijo dependiente, reside junto a su madre en el distrito de Santa Rosa, una zona cuya economía depende principalmente de la pesca, se encuentra situada a veinticinco minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la confección y tejido de manteles, mantas, pañuelos y fundas, ella elabora estos artículos de modo artesanal y debido a la buena calidad con la que los prepara se ha convertido en una de las artesanas mas solicitadas de la zona. El negocio es una fuente importante de ingreso para su familia por lo que siempre trata de brindar lo mejor de si para mantenerlo.

Santos desea adquirir material para seguir elaborando productos de modo que pueda cumplir con algunos pedidos con los que actualmente cuenta, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Santos es una mujer bastante creativa y empeñosa, ella desea seguir ampliando su taller para percibir mas ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is 31 years old.  She is single and has one child who is dependent on her.  She lives together with her mother in Santa Rosa district, an area whose economy depends mainly on fishing.  It is twenty-five minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

She works making and weaving tablecloths, blankets, scarves and covers.  She makes these articles by hand and, owing to the good quality of her work, she has become one of the most requested craftswomen in the area.  Her business is an important source of income for her family which is why she always tries to provide her best work so that she can maintain her business.

Santos would like to acquire material so that she can continue making products and thereby fill some orders which she currently has.  For this reason she is requesting her first loan from Edpyme Alternatia for 2,000 nuevos soles which will help her to achieve her objective.

Santos is quite a creative and determined woman.  She would like to continue expanding her workshop so that she can make more money and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: To acquire material to continue making products

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge es un padre D. familia D. 38 años D. edad que resiD. junto a su esposa y sus hijos en un sector urbano marginal D. L. ciudad D. Chiclayo, una D. las zonas mas comerciales del norte del país.

Se dedica desD. hace cuatro años a brindar servicio D. reparación D. llantas y venta D. repuestos para moticiletas en un pequeño taller ubicado cerca a su domicilio, su negocio goza D. muy buena acogida ya que por L. zona no existen otros parecidos. El negocio es su única fuente D. ingresos por lo que siempre trata D. brindar lo mejor D. si para salir adelante.

Jorge desea adquirir algunos repuestos para contar con un stock estable D. productos que le permita mejorar L. atención que brinda, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1000 nuevos soles.

Sus vecinos y clientes le consideran una persona bastante responsable y tranquiL.. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario y poder instalar otros talleres en L. ciudad.
texts.en:
Jorge is a 38 year-old father who lives together with his wife and children in a marginal urban area of the city of Chiclayo, on of the most important commercial areas in the north of the country.

He has been working for four years providing tire repairs and selling spare parts for motorcycles in a small workshop located near his home.  His business is very popular since there are no other similar businesses in his area.  The business is his only source of income which is why he always provides the very best of himself so that he can get ahead.

Jorge would like to acquire some spare parts so that he can have a stable stock of products which will allow him to proviD. his customers with a better service.  For this reason, he is requesting his first loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,000 nuevos soles.

His neighbors and customers consider him to be quite a responsible and quiet man.  His greatest wish is to continue growing as a businessman and to  set up other workshops in the city.

loans.use: To acquire some spare parts so that he has a stable stock of products

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es:
Marcela tiene 27 años de edad, es soltera, y vive junto a su madre y sus hermanos en el distrito pesquero de San José, ubicado a 20 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Hace 6 años se dedica al arte del bordado artesanal, desde entonces se ha valido de esta actividad para ganarse la vida y solventar sus propios gastos; ella trabaja en base a pedidos y suele bordar manteles, cortinas y servilletas.

Ella desea expandir su negocio haciendo más bordados, con los cuales pueda cumplir con algunos pedidos que tiene pendientes; por este motivo se encuentra solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 600 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en la compra de más hilos y telas para empezar a trabajar de manera independiente y con recursos propios.

Ella es una joven bastante conocida y estimada por sus vecinos y clientes quienes la consideran una persona responsable y de confianza.
texts.en:
Marcela is 27 years old.  She is single and lives together with her mother and siblings in the fishing district of San José, 20 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

For 6 years she has been making hand-embroidered products.  Through this activity she has earned her living and covered her own expenses.  She works on orders and usually embroiders tablecloths, curtains and napkins.

She would like to expand her business by doing more embroidery.  This will enable her to fill some outstanding orders which she has.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 600 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She plans to invest the money in buying more thread and fabric so that she can begin to work independently and with her own resources.

She is a young woman who is quite well known and respected by her neighbors and customers who consider her to be a responsible and trustworthy person.

loans.use: To expand her embroidery business

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: La señora Maria Teresa S. B. esta separa de su ex marido desde hace cuatro años y tiene a su cargo dos pequeños uno es un  niño y otra niña que están en edad escolar a los cuales quiere ofrecer una mejor patrimonio. María adquirió su casa por medio de interés social a la que en este momento quiere poner piso firme enfrente por que en épocas de mucho aire el polvo se pasa hasta adentro de su casa, para poder realizar su proyecto necesita comprar material de construcción y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en: Mrs Maria Teresa S. B. has been separated from her husband for four years and has two small children in her care; a boy and a girl.  The children are school age and she wants to be able to offer them a better estate to inherit.  María acquired her house through a government-subsidized, low income housing program.  She would like to install a solid surface outside the front of her house because whenever they have windy periods the dust blows inside.  In order to carry out her project she needs to buy building materials and pay workmen.

loans.use: To build a solid surface outside the front of her house

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco Pérez M. es un joven casado y muy trabajador que tiene una niña pequeña a la que desea ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida. El techo de su vivienda es de madera y necesita colocarse la teja arriba pues para que no se deteriore con las épocas de lluvia y en tiempo de frio no traspase lo helado y se conserve a buena temperatura. Para esto el necesita de su apoyo para poder realizar su proyecto.
texts.en: Francisco Pérez M. is a young, hard-working, married man.  He has a small daughter for whom he wants to provide a better quality of life.  The roof of his house is made from wood and he needs to install tiles on top so that his roof doesn't deteriorate when the weather is rainy and so that when it is cold the frozen air doesn't pass through.  He would like his house to maintain a comfortable temperature.  He needs your help to carry out his project.

loans.use: To fix his roof

loans.name: Adela Ignacia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMAUTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Adela; ella tiene 64 años de edad, separada  y tiene 3 hijos. La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de manualidades esto quiere decir que ella misma los confecciona en su casa, una de sus confecciones son los cobertores para almohadas, también vende artesanía como son vasos y platos en cerámica todo esto la socia ofrece a sus amigas y familiares.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar más material para sus manualidades como son telas , hilos.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Adela is a member of the “Amauta” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Adela is 64 years old.  She is separated and has three children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling handicrafts.  That is to say, she makes the handicrafts herself in her own home.  One of the things she makes is cushion covers.  She also sells handicrafts such as ceramic cups and plates.  She offers her products to friends and family members.

She is requesting this loan to buy more material for her handicrafts such as fabric and thread.

She is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by funding her loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy more material for her handicrafts such as fabric and thread

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOC RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Roxana; tiene 31 años de edad, y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza de una empresa llamada Unique, ella vende en forma independiente y por medio de este negocio puede pagar sus estudios, la socia quiere una tienda para que pueda vender los productos de belleza. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos de belleza al por mayor.

La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Roxana belongs to the “Mosoc Runa” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Roxana is 31 years old and single.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling beauty products from a company called Unique.  She sells independently and is using the income from her business to pay for her studies.  She would like to have a store where she could sell her beauty products.  She is requesting a loan to buy beauty products wholesale.

She is grateful for the loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy beauty products wholesale

loans.name: Delia Rosa

texts.es:
Delia es socia del Banco Comunal “Sol de Oro”  ubicado en el distrito Juliaca,  provincia de San Román y departamento de Puno, tiene 35 años de edad, estado civil  conviviente y tiene 01 hijo, estudió hasta 3ro de educación secundaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 08 meses, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que incrementó al capital de su negocio de venta de mercerías.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en su mercadería para comprar cremas, papeles y detergentes para vender en su negocio.

Su sueño para el futuro es tener más capital y tener más mercadería.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son los ahorros y las charlas.
texts.en:
Delia is a member of the “Sol de Oro” community bank which is located in Juliaca district, in San Román province, in the department of Puno.  She is 35 years old and lives with her partner.  She has one child and studied up to the 3rd year of her secondary education.

She has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 8 months.  Her first loan was for 500 nuevos soles which she used to increase the working capital of her business selling merchandise.

She is requesting a new loan for 500 nuevos soles which she will invest in her merchandise buying creams, paper and detergents to sell in her business.

Her dream for the future is to have more capital and more merchandise.

What she most likes about her community bank are the savings and the talks.

loans.use: To buy creams, paper and detergent to sell in her business

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es: El señor Natividad D. L. es chofer de taxi actividad que realiza prestando su servicio a la comunidad desde hace 12 años, el automóvil en que trabaja se encuentra descompuesto y quiere repararlo, es su única fuente de ingreso para mantener a su familia
texts.en: Mr Natividad D. L. is a taxi driver.  He has been providing this service to the community for 12 years.  The vehicle in which he works has broken down and he would like to repair it as it is the only source of income he has to support his family with.

loans.use: To fix his taxi

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMAUTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Carmen; ella tiene 81 años de edad, soltera   y no tiene hijos.  La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de juguetes para niños como son: carros a control remoto, muñecas para las niñas, pelotas, y la vez también vende ropa para bebes las cuales las venden a sus familiares y amigos.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar más variedad de juguetes para su negocio.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Carmen belongs to the Amauta Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Carmen is 81 years old, single, and has no children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling children’s toys.  She sells things like remote control cars, dolls for girls, and balls.  She also sells baby clothes to her relatives and friends.

She is requesting the loan to buy a greater variety of toys for her business.

She is grateful to those who are part of this dream through the loan.  She pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To buy a greater variety of toys for her business

loans.name: Dominga Cecilia

texts.es:
Dominga es socia del Banco Comunal “Punta Sahuacasi” ubicado en el distrito de Azángaro, provincia de Azángaro, departamento de Puno, tiene 42 años de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 04 hijos, la señora llegó a estudiar hasta 5to de educación primaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 18 meses, su  préstamo inicial fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital de su negocio de compra y venta de animales menores.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá para comprar animales.

Su sueño para el futuro es tener más capital para tener mejores ganados.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones y el ahorro.
texts.en:
Dominga is a member of the Punta Sahuacasi Communal Bank.  It is located in the Azángaro district, Azángaro province, Puno department.  She is 42 years old, married, and has four children.  She has a fifth grade education.

She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 18 months.  Her first loan was for 500 soles.  She used the money as working capital for her business of buying and selling small farm animals.

She is requesting a new loan for 1,000 soles.  She will use the money to buy animals.

Her dream for the future is to have more capital in order to have better livestock.

What she likes most about her communal bank are the meetings and the savings.

loans.use: To buy small farm animals

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMAUTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Lucy; ella tiene 78 años de edad, soltera   y no tiene hijos.  La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de juguetes para niños como son: robots, osos de peluche, pelotas, carros entre otros mas   y la vez también vende ropa para niños las cuales las venden a sus familiares y amigos.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar más variedad de juguetes y ropa  para su negocio.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Lucy belongs to the Amauta Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Lucy is 78 years old, single, and has no children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling children’s toys.  She sells things like robots, stuffed bears, balls, and cars, among other things.  She also sells children's clothes to her relatives and friends.

She is requesting the loan to buy a greater variety of toys and clothes for her business.

She is grateful to those who are part of this dream through the loan.  She pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To buy a greater variety of toys and clothes for her business

loans.name: Adelma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMAUTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Adelma; ella tiene 66 años de edad, separada  y tiene 2  hijos.  La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ropa en forma independiente , la socia quiere ampliar su negocio y mejorar.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como chompa , blusas, pantalones.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido
texts.en:
Adelma belongs to the “Amauta” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Adelma is 66 years old.  She is separated and has 2 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business buying and selling clothes, an activity which she does independently.  She would like to expand and improve her business.

She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as sweaters, blouses and pants.

She is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by funding her loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as sweaters, blouses and pants

loans.name: 25 De Julio Group

texts.es: Historia de kiva Esta foto fue tomada en la tortilleria de la sra Soledad M. B. V. Una integrante del grupo 25 de Julio, que esta ubicado en el estado de Puebla en Mexico. Se ve el grupo al que pertenece y parte de la maquinaria con la que elabora tortillas, ella se dedica  atender esta tortilleria, negocio que inicio hace seis años, solicita el prestamo para la compra de maiz y Harina para la elaboracion de tortillas. Sus clientes prefieren comprar con ella por que consideran que son de buena calidad y estan muy bien elaboradas y cumple con la exigencia de sus clientes aparte de tener buenos precios y un trato personalizado. Al momento de solicitar su credito ella se siente agradecida. Tiene treinta y cinco años de edad y estudio hasta el sexto año de primaria es casada y tiene tres hijos dos mujeres y  un varón. Le gustaría en un futuro hacer la ampliacion de su negocio y dentro de sus proyectos personales ella quiere aperturar una cuenta de ahorro para asegurar los estudios de sus hijos.
texts.en: This photo was taken in Soledad M. B. V.'s tortilla bakery.  Soledad is a member of the “25 de julio” (25th of July) group which is located in the state of Puebla in Mexico.  You can see the group which she belongs to and also some of the machinery which she uses to make her tortillas.  She serves in her tortilla bakery which she set up six years ago.  She is requesting this loan to buy corn and flour to make her tortillas.  Her customers prefer to buy from her because they consider her tortillas to be good quality and very well made.  She fulfils her customers' demands, offers good prices and gives all her customers individual attention.  As she requests this loan she is feeling very grateful.  She is 35 years old and studied up to the sixth year of elementary school.  She is married and has three children; two girls and one boy.  In the future, she would like to expand her business and one of her personal plans is to open a savings account so that she can guarantee her children's studies.

loans.use: To buy corn and flour

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es:
Aparece la esposa de José Luis.

José Luis M. A. tiene una negocio de abarrotes denominado “Mini súper A.” que ya tiene una antigüedad de 5 años ofreciendo a sus cliente calidad y bajo precio. El señor aparte de tener su negocio; trabaja en maquiladora para tener un ingreso extra para ofrecer a sus hijos una mejora calidad de vida. José solicita de su apoyo para comprar mercancía  para incrementa su ventas.
texts.en:
(This photo is of José Luis' wife)

José Luis M. A. has a grocery store called “Mini súper A.” which he has had for 5 years now.  He offers his customers quality and low prices.  Apart from his grocery store business he also works in a 'maquiladora' (a foreign-owned assembly plant on the US / Mexico border) so that he has an additional income to offer his children a better quality of life.  José is requesting your support so that he can buy merchandise to increase his sales.

loans.use: To stock his business

loans.name: Rosa Giovanna

texts.es: ROSA ES UNA MUJER JOVEN TIENE 02 NIÑAS DE 8 Y 4 AÑOS  EN EDAD ESCOLAR, DIA A DIA SE ESFUERZA POR LOGRAR LLEVAR A SUS NIÑAS A LA ESCUELA POR LO QUE DEBE CERRAR UNAS HORAS SU NEGOCIO. ROSA TIENE UN NEGOCIO DE VENTA DE FRUTAS  Y BEBIDAS EN LA CARRETERA CENTRAL SUS CLIENTES SON VIAJEROS QUE CON MUCHO GUSTO CONSUMEN LAS RICAS TUNAS, NISPEROS, CHIRIMOYAS Y BEBIDAS QUE ELLA OFRECE. SU CONYUGUE ES ALBAÑILY LA APOYA EN LOS GASTOS DE CASA. ES UNA BUENA TEMPORADA PARA LA TUNA Y CHIRIMOYAS NOS MANIFIESTA  ROSA. EL PRESTAMO SERA INVERTIDO EN FRUTAS, BEBIDAS Y  GOLOSINAS PARA AMPLIAR SU STOCK Y SATISFACER  ASUS CLIENTES, ELLA SUEÑA  QUE SU NEGOCIO CREZCA Y PUEDA AHORRAR PARA INVERTIR EN UN AUTO PARA COMPRAR SU MERCADERIA. ROSA ESTA CONTENTA CON LOS PRESTAMOS QUE RECIBE DE EDAPROSPO POR QUE SON RAPIDOS  Y HACEN CRECER SU NEGOCIO. EN LA FOTO PODEMOS APRECIAR A ROSA CON SU PEQUEÑA DAYANA MUY CONTENTAS DE SER ENTREVISTADAS.
texts.en: Rosa is a young woman.  She has two daughters aged 8 and 4 who both go to school.  Every day she makes a real effort to take her daughters to school.  It means that she must close her business for a few hours.  Rosa has a business selling fruit and drinks on the main highway.  Her customers are travelers who really enjoy consuming the rich prickly pears, loquats, custard apples and drinks which she offers.  Her husband is a bricklayer and supports her in covering their household expenses.  Rosa tells us that it is a good season for prickly pears and custard apples.  Her loan will be invested in buying fruit, drinks and candies to expand her stock and satisfy her customers.  Her dream is for her business to grow and to be able to save up to buy a car which she can use when buying her merchandise.  Rosa is happy with the loans which she receives from Edaprospo as they are quick and help her business to grow.  In this photo we can see Rosa with little Dayana, both so happy to be interviewed.

loans.use: To buy fruit, drinks and candies

loans.name: Andres Roberto

texts.es: Andrés Roberto M. N. con el apoyo de su esposa cuentan con un negocio de venta de ropa usada y artículos para el hogar al que desea invertir para incrementar sus ganancias y así ofrecer a su familia estabilidad y un mejor patrimonio.
texts.en: Andrés Roberto M. N., with the support of his wife, has a business selling used clothing and articles for the home.  He would like to invest in his business to increase his profits and thereby be able to offer his family stability and better family assets.

loans.use: To stock his business

loans.name: Domitila

texts.es:
Domitila es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Triunfadoras” ubicado en el distrito D. Cabanilla, provincia D. Lampa, departamento D. Puno, tiene 50 años D. edad, D. estado civil casada y con 02 hijos (01 dependiente), la señora tiene estudios D. educación primaria incompleta.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 02 años, su préstamo inicial fue D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital D.  su negocio D. venta D. prendas D. vestir.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 2000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar más mercaderías para su negocio.

Su sueño para el futuro es construir una casa en Juliaca y mejorar su negocio.

Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal son las reuniones y  la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Domitila is a member of the “Mujeres Triumfadoras” (Triumphant Women) Communal Bank.  It is located in the Cabanilla district, Lampa province, Puno department.  She is 50 years old, married, and has two children (one independent).  She did not complete elementary school.

She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for two years.  Her first loan was for 300 soles.  She used the money to increase her working capital to buy articles of clothing.

She is requesting a new loan for 2,000 soles.  She will use the money to buy more merchandise for her business.

Her dream for the future is to build a house in Juliaca and to improve her business.

What she likes the most about her communal bank are the meetings and the punctuality.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise for her business

loans.name: Dora Marivel

texts.es:
Dora es socia del Banco Comunal “22 de Setiembre” ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 38 años de edad, de estado civil casada y con dos hijos, tiene grado de instrucción de segundo de primaria.
Dora inicio con una actividad consistente en la compra y venta de ganados menores, su negocio fue mejorando y ahora no solo se dedica al negocio mencionado sino trabaja con engorde de toros en forma trimestral. Ella viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace cinco años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio inicial ya mencionado.
Ahora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 500.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que le permitirá incrementar el capital  de su negocio.
Su sueño es tener una tienda de abarrotes.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es compartir la alegría.
texts.en:
Dora is a member of the 22 de Septiembre Communal Bank.  It is located in the Ilave district, Collao province, Puno department.  She is 38 years old, married, and has two children.  She has a second grade education.

Dora started a business of buying and selling small farm animals.  Her business was improving.  Now she not only works in the  business mentioned above, but she also works fattening bulls quarterly.

She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for five years.  The first loan she requested was for 300 soles.  She used the money in her original business.

She is now requesting a loan for 500 soles.  The loan will allow her to increase the capital in her business.

Her dream is to have a grocery store.

What she likes about her communal bank is sharing the happiness.

loans.use: Increase the capital in her business

loans.name: Dorotea

texts.es:
Dorotea es socia del Banco Comunal “Azangarinas Valientes” ubicado en el distrito de Azángaro, provincia de Azángaro, departamento de Puno, tiene 44 años de edad, de estado civil casada y con 08 hijos (06 dependientes), tiene estudios de educación primaria completa.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 04 años, su  préstamo inicial  fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de golosinas y helados.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá para comprar mercaderías para su negocio.

Su sueño es tener un negocio de salchimote. Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la organización y capacitaciones.
texts.en:
Dorotea is a member of the “Azangarinas Valientes” community bank which is located in Azángaro district, Azángaro province, in the department of Puno.  She is 44 years old, married and has 8 children (6 of whom are dependent on her).  She completed her primary education.

Dorotea has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 4 years.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles which she used to increase the working capital of her business selling candies and ice cream.

She is requesting a new loan for 800 nuevos soles which will be invested in buying merchandise for her business.

Her dream is to have a business selling 'salchimote' (a fast food made of fried corn, chicken and sausage).  What she most likes about her community bank is the organization and the training sessions.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Egidia

texts.es:
Egidia es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Triunfadoras” ubicado en el distrito D. Cabanilla, provincia D. Lampa, departamento D. Puno, tiene 40 años D. edad, D. estado civil casada y tiene 02 hijos,  la señora  realizó estudios D. educación superior incompleta.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 04 años, su  préstamo inicial fue D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital D. su negocio D. venta D. animales caseros.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá para comprar ovejas.

Su sueño para el futuro es tener una tienda D. abarrotes y tener mejores ganados.

Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal son las reuniones y las charlas.
texts.en:
Egidia is a member of the “Mujeres Triunfadoras” (Triumphant Women) community bank which is located in Cabanilla district, in Lampa province, in the department of Puno.  She is 40 years old, married and has 2 children.  She did not complete her primary education.

Egidia has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 4 years.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles which was used to increase the working capital of her business selling domestic animals.

She is requesting a new loan for 300 nuevos soles to invest in buying sheep.

Her dream for the future is to have a grocery store and better livestock.

What she most likes about her community bank are the meetings and the talks.

loans.use: To buy livestock such as sheep

loans.name: Estefania

texts.es:
Estefanía es socia del Banco Comunal “Santiago Apóstol” ubicado en el distrito de Paucarcolla, provincia de Puno, departamento Puno, tiene 41 años de edad, de estado civil casada, con cuatro  hijos y con grado de instrucción de quinto de primaria.
Estefanía tiene un negocio de venta de golosinas, galletas y gaseosas. Ella viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le permitió comprar animales menores como ovejas  y cerdos, actividad de aquel tiempo. 
Ahora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 1200.00 nuevod soles, dinero que invertirá en su negocio.
Su sueño es  seguir adelante con su negocio y  llenar su bodeguita de full productos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la ganancia de los ahorros.
texts.en:
Estefanía is a member of the “Santiago Apóstol” community bank which is located in Paucarcolla district, in Puno province, in the department of Puno.  She is 41 years old, married and has four children.  She studied up to the fifth year of elementary school.

Estefanía has a business selling candies, cookies and soda.  She has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for one year.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles which she used to buy young animals such as sheep and pigs which is the business activity she was engaged in at that time.

She is now requesting a new loan for 1,200 nuevos soles which she will invest in her business.  Her dream is to succeed in her business and stock her business full of products.

What she most likes about her community bank is the earnings made on her savings.

loans.use: To invest in buying merchandise for her business

loans.name: Geronica

texts.en:
Geronica T. is from Palilan, Jimenez,  Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is 30 years old. Geronica is married and has two school-aged children. To make a living, Geronica owns and operates a retail store, selling seafood products including fish and shrimp. Geronica has been engaged in her business for more than 10 years and earns approximately 1600 PHP a month.

In 2004, Geronica joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Geronica has successfully repaid a previous loan of 7000 PHP from PMPC. This previous loan was used to to purchase new equipment and tools to expand the business. Geronica is requesting a new loan of 20000 PHP, which she will use to invest in renovating the business. This will be the tenth loan taken by Geronica from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to supplement her family's income. 

About PMPC:
Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To invest in renovating the business

loans.name: Lelia

texts.en:
Lelia D. is 26 years old and married with two school-aged children. She is from the village of Bitibut, Sapang Dalaga. To make a living, Lelia runs a grocery store. She has been in her business for two years with a monthly net income of 2300 PHP.

In 2010, Lelia joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Lelia is requesting her first loan of 3000 PHP, which will be used as additional capital for the store.  

About PMPC:
Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To provide additional capital for the business

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma S. runs a grocery store. She has been operating her business for four years and earns a monthly net income of 2500 PHP. Vilma is 39 years old, married, and blessed with four school-aged children. She is from the village of Bitibut, Sapang Dalaga.

In 2002, Vilma joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Vilma is requesting her first loan of 3,000 PHP which will be used as additional capital. 

About PMPC:
Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: Additional capital for the business

loans.name: Jenalyn

texts.en:
Jenalyn P. is 30 years old, married, and has two school-aged children. She is from the village of Mabini, Baliangao. To make a living, Jenalyn grows assorted crops to sell. Out of this activity, Jenalyn is able to earn a monthly net income of 4000 PHP. 

In 2006, Jenalyn joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Jenalyn has successfully repaid a previous loan of 3,000 PHP from PMPC. This previous loan was used as additional capital for her business. Jenalyn is requesting her tenth loan of 3,500 PHP, which will be used to purchase farm supplies. 

About PMPC:
Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa G. is engaged in fishing activity. While not the only means of generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from selling of ocean-caught fish in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for 20 years and earns a monthly net income of 3500 PHP. Elsa is 46 years old, married and has one school-aged child. She is from the village of Mabini, Baliangao.

In 2008, Elsa joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Elsa has successfully repaid a previous loan of 3,000 PHP from PMPC. This previous loan was used as additional capital for her business. Elsa is requesting 2nd loan of 3,000 PHP which will be used to purchase fishing materials. 

About PMPC:

Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.
