They started the farm with help from her father and it is now the main source of income for the family.  However, the gases from the volcano have damaged their fields and lowered their crop yields.  Sra. Rosa is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers, pesticides and other supplies so that she can increase her output and, in turn, improve her family's quality of life.  For the future, she wants to buy more land and increase the amount of crops she can grow. Her ultimate goal is to support her children's schooling.

loans.use: Soil treatment plan for farming business.

loans.name: Nelsa Abigail

texts.es: La señora Nelsa Abigail M. A., tiene la edad de 54 años es una mujer adulta, madre soltera de una hija mayor de edad, casada que labora en el exterior pero apoya a su madre en los gastos en los que esta incurre, ella habita en una humilde casa del municipio de Esquipulas, es para su vivienda que solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales que le permitan la instalacion de una malla en el muro de la parte trasera de su hogar, que brinde una mayor seguridad, y a futuro las comodidades necesarias para recibir a la familia de su único hijo, y/o un lugar digno donde habitar sus días de retiro.
texts.en: Sra. Nelsa Abigail M. A., 54, is a single mother.  Her daughter, married and working abroad, helps her mother with daily expenses.  Sra. Nelsa lives in a small house in the township of Esquipulas.  She is applying for a loan to improve the house.  She wants to buy materials for building a screen on the wall behind the house, a project that will make the house safer.  She wants the house to be more comfortable in case she has to take in the family of her only son and to give herself a decent place to live her retirement.

loans.use: Install a security screen.

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es:
Eusebia es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Triunfadoras” ubicado en el distrito D. Cabanilla,  provincia D. Lampa, departamento D. Puno, tiene 51 años D. edad, D. estado civil viuda y tiene 06 hijos (03 dependientes), la señora estudio hasta 2do D. educación primaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 03 años, su préstamo inicial fue D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital D.  su negocio D. venta D. ganados, comidas y tejidos.

La señora solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma D. S/. 1200.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá comprando una vaca y materiales para sus tejidos.

Su sueño es tener una tienda D. abarrotes.

Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal son las reuniones y la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Eusebia is a member of the “Mujeres Triunfadoras” (Triumphant Women) community bank which is located in Cabanilla district, Lampa province, in the department of Puno.  She is 51 years old, widowed and has 6 children (3 of whom are still dependent).  She studied up to the second year of elementary school.

Eusebia has been working for Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 3 years.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles which she used to increase the working capital of her business selling livestock, food and knitted items.

She is requesting a new loan for 1,200 nuevos soles which she will invest in buying a cow and material for her knitting.

Her dream is to own a grocery store.

What she most likes about her community bank are the meetings and the punctuality.

loans.use: To buy a cow and material for her knitting

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es:
Eusebia es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Flores de Vilquechico” ubicado en el distrito de Vilquechico, provincia de Huancané, departamento de Puno, tiene 49 años de edad, de estado civil casada y con 06 hijos, realizó estudios de educación primaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 04 meses, el primer préstamo fue S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de pescados y pastoreo de ganados.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar animales para su negocio. 
	
Su sueño para el futuro es tener más capital para mejorar su negocio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Eusebia is a member of the “Las Flores de Vilquechico” (Flowers of Vilquechico) community bank which is located in Vilquechico district, Huancané province, in the department of Puno.  She is 49 years old, married and has 6 children.  She completed her primary education.

Eusebia has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 4 months.  Her first loan was for 500 nuevos soles which she used to increase the working capital of her business selling fish and shepherding livestock.

She is requesting a new loan for 500 nuevos soles which she will use to buy animals for her business.

What she most likes about her community bank is the punctuality.

loans.use: To buy animals for her business

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es:
Eusebia es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Flores de Vilquechico” ubicado en el distrito de Vilquechico, provincia de Huancané, departamento de Puno, tiene 48 años de edad, de estado civil casada y con 08 hijos (05 dependientes), la señora estudió hasta 4to de educación primaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 08 meses, nos cuenta que con el primer  préstamo solicitado de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para  incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de abarrotes y golosinas.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le servirá para comprar mercaderías para su tienda. 
	
Su sueño para el futuro  es hacer su casa y tener ganados.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo y el ahorro.
texts.en:
Eusebia is a member of the “Las Flores de Vilquechico” (Flowers of Vilquechico) community bank which is located in Vilquechico district, Huancané province, in the department of Puno.  She is 48 years old, married and has 8 children (5 of whom are still dependent).  She studied up to the fourth year of elementary school.

Eusebia has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 8 months.  She tells us that her first loan was for 500 nuevos soles which she used to increase the working capital of her business selling groceries and candies.

She is requesting a new loan for 800 nuevos soles which she will use to buy merchandise for her store.

Her dream for the future is to build her own home and to own livestock.

What she most likes about her community bank is the ease of acquiring a loan and the savings.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her store

loans.name: Evelyny Karol

texts.es:
Evelyny es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Mensajeras”  ubicado en el distrito Juliaca, provincia San Román  y departamento de Puno, tiene 22 años de edad, de estado civil soltera y  no tiene hijos. La señorita tiene estudios de educación secundaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 08 meses, su primer préstamo fue S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para incrementar el capital de su negocio fabricación de polos.

La señorita solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 200.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra de materiales para su negocio de confección de polos.
	
Su sueño para el futuro  es ampliar el negocio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la facilidad del préstamo y la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Evelyny is a member of the “Las Mensajeras” (Messengers) community bank which is located  in Juliaca district, San Román province, in the department of Puno.  She is 22 years old, single and doesn't have any children.  She completed her secondary education.

Evelyny has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 8 months.  Her first loan was for 500 nuevos soles which she used to increase the working capital of her business making polo shirts.

She is requesting a new loan of 200 nuevos soles to invest in buying fabric for her business.

Her dream for the future is to expand her business.

What she most likes about her community bank is the ease of acquiring a loan and the punctuality.

loans.use: To buy material for making polo shirts

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es:
Faustina es socia del Banco Comunal “Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe II” ubicado en el distrito de Cojata, provincia de Huancané, departamento de Puno, tiene 46 años de edad, de estado civil casada y con 03 hijos, la señora estudió hasta 4to de educación secundaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 04 meses, con un préstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de comidas y crianza de cuy.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar alimentos para su negocio de venta de comidas y crianza de cuy.
	
Su sueño para el futuro es tener una empresa de crianza de cuy y producción de artesanías en Capachica.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones, la ayuda mutua y el intercambio de ideas.
texts.en:
Faustina is a member of the community bank "Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe II", located in the Cojata district in the province of Huancané in the department of Puno.  She is 46 years old, married, and has three children.  She studied through her fourth year of secondary school.

She began working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos four months ago when she received a loan for 500 nuevos soles, which she used to increase the capital in her business that sells food and breeds guinea pigs.

She is asking for a new loan of 800 nuevos soles to purchase ingredients for her business that sells food and food for her guinea pigs.

Her dream for the future is to have a guinea pig breeding business and to make handicrafts in Capachica.

The things she likes best about her community bank are the meetings, the mutual assistance, and the exchange of ideas.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients for her business selling food, and food for her guinea pigs

loans.name: Felicia Candelaria

texts.es:
Felicia es socia del  Banco Comunal “San Salvador”, ubicado en el distrito de Capachica, provincia de Puno, Departamento de Puno, tiene 44 años de edad, de estado civil casada y con cinco hijos. La señora tiene grado de instrucción de secundaria incompleta.
Felicia tiene diferentes actividades como la venta de abarrotes, compra y venta de chuño y artesanía. Ella viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace diez años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue S/.300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizo para comprar lanas para el tejido.
La señora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 2000.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que le permitirá incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de abarrotes 
Su único sueño  es que sus hijos sean profesionales y seguir adelante con su negocio.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es que se encuentra en su pueblo y las facilidades del préstamo.
texts.en:
Felicia is a member of the San Salvador Communal Bank, which is located in the District of Capachica, Province and Department of Puno. She is 44 years old, married, and has five children. Felicia did not complete her high school education.

Felicia engages in different activities such as selling groceries, buying and selling dried potatoes, and making crafts. She has been working with Manuela Ramos for ten years. The first loan she requested was for 300 PEN, which she used to buy wool for weaving.

Sra. Felicia is requesting a new loan in the amount of 2000 PEN to increase the capital for her grocery business. Her only dreams are for her children to become professionals and to move forward with her business. What she likes most about her Communal Bank are the people and the conveniences of the loan.

loans.use: Operating capital for her grocery business

loans.name: Feliciana

texts.es:
Feliciana es socia del Banco Comunal “Brisas del Rió Blanco” ubicado en el distrito de Pilcuyo, provincia El Collao, departamento Puno, tiene 60 años de edad, de estado civil casada, con tres hijos y con grado de instrucción de primaria incompleta.
Feliciana viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace seis años, el primer préstamo fue S/ 300.00 nuevos soles, el cual le permitió incrementar el capital de su negocio, consistente en la compra y venta de animales menores.
La señora  solicitara un préstamo de S/ 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá  en su negocio.
Su sueño es seguir adelante con su negocio y tener capital propio.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son los ahorros que generan ganancias.
texts.en:
Feliciana is a member of the Communal Bank “Brisas del Rio Blanco” (Breezes of the White River), which is located in the District of Pilcuyo, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. She is 60 years old, married, and has three children. Feliciana did not finish her elementary school education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for six years. The first loan she received was for 300 PEN, which she used to increase her business capital for buying and selling small animals.

Sra. Feliciana is requesting another loan in the amount of 500 PEN to invest in her business. Her dream is to move forward with her business and have her own capital. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the savings which earn interest.

loans.use: Operating capital for buying & selling animals

loans.name: Felicitas Emiliana

texts.es:
Felicitas es socia del Banco Comunal “Punta Sahuacasi” ubicado en el distrito de Azángaro, provincia de Azángaro, departamento de Puno, tiene 40 años de edad, estado civil  casada y tiene 03 hijos (02 dependientes), la señora  estudió hasta 5to de educación secundaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde 04 años, nos cuenta que su  préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de animales.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 2000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar animales menores para su engorde y luego venderlos.

Su sueño para el futuro es tener más capital y tener una tienda de abarrotes en Azángaro.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las charlas y lo que gana el ahorro.
texts.en:
Felicitas is a member of the Communal Bank “Punta Sahuacasi”, which is located in the District and Province of Azángaro, Department of Puno. She is 40 years old, married, and has three children (two of whom are dependents). Felicitas completed her education through the fifth year of secondary school.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for four years. Felicitas says that her first loan was for 300 PEN, which she used to increase her business capital for selling animals.

Now she is requesting a new loan in the amount of 2000 PEN in order to buy small animals for fattening and resale. Her dreams for the future are to have more capital and to open a grocery store in Azángaro. What she likes most about her Communal Bank are the discussions and the interest she earns from her savings.

loans.use: Purchase animals for fattening & resale

loans.name: Jessica Cecilia

texts.es:
Jessica tiene 27 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, tiene dos hijos a su cargo (madre soltera).
Cliente vive en casa de familia (padres ). Casa que la habitan desde su infancia, la cual queda ubicada en  Casaerio. Federico Villarreal, Jose Olaya – Chiclayo., cuyas condiciones de vida del cliente son normales, su casa es de material noble.

Cliente se dedica al  negocio de Animaciones de Fiestas, asi tambien a la decoración de fondos para fiestas. Actividad en que se desempeña hace 2 años aproximadamente. Sus eventos los realiza con mayor fuerza de venta los fines de semana. El prestamo esta destinado a invertir en la compra de telas para hacer disfraces, asi como tambien para compra de Sancos, para organizar lo que se conoce como “hora loca”, es decir una parte lo invertira en activo fijo.

El credito otorgado a cliente le ayudara a tener  mas  activo fijo y capital para invertir  en compra de vestimentas y accesorios para eventos,  lo cual hara que posea mayor ventas, ademas que otra parte del credito invertira en mejorar su domicilio.  Cliente esta captando mas numero de clientes lo cual hace que sus ventas sean mayores, por lo que clientes se agencia de credito para invertir en este rubro.
texts.en:
Jessica is 27 years old and a single mother with two dependent children. She lives with her parents in her childhood home in Casaerio, Federico Villarreal, Jose Olaya – Chiclayo. Her living conditions are normal and her home is made of solid material.

Jessica operates a party entertainment business and is also responsible for providing decorations for these parties. She has been in the business for approximately two years. Most of her events are booked on the weekends. This loan will be invested in fabrics for making costumes as well as stilts for organizing what is known as “Crazy Hour”. These items will become part of her permanent inventory.

The loan Jessica is receiving will help her acquire more equipment and capital to invest in costumes and accessories for events. This will help her book more events. In addition, part of the loan will be invested in home improvements. Jessica wants to attract more customers so that she can obtain better revenues. This loan is essentially an investment in her customers.

loans.use: Purchase costumes & stilts to use for events

loans.name: Atanacio Geovani

texts.en:
Atanacio, 39, lives with his wife and their two children in a small rural zone near the city of Chiclayo. Residents of the region for over six years, they are well-respected and hard workers.

For the last four years Atanacio has worked as a public transportation driver. He owns a mototaxi which he drives on a daily basis, carrying a wide variety of clients all over the city, taking them to work, on shopping trips or to social events. His is a very common service in the city, given the relatively few cars owned by residents.

This will be Atanacio’s fourth credit with Edpyme Alternativa. He has requested the loan in order to complete come major repairs to the mototaxi and purchase additional accessories for it. He wants to make the investment immediately in order to keep the mototaxi running, reduce his ongoing maintenance expenses, and improve the service he provides to his clients.

loans.use: To repair his mototaxi and purchase accessories

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.en:
Lorenzo, 37, lives with his family in the village of San Pablo de Escurre in the district of Olmos, a rural region with many small farmers, in northern Peru.

Lorenzo has a small farm on which he raises cattle, goats, sheep and various fowl including ducks, chickens and turkeys. He has been raising these animals for some time and is a skilled caretaker. He enjoys earning income for his family independent of a boss or major company. He is proud to provide in this manner.

The requested loan will be used to purchase an additional cow. Because prices are low at the moment, he will be able to purchase a higher quality animal at a more reasonable price. Lorenzo hopes that by expanding his herd he will be able to increase his family’s income and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: Purchase a cow.

loans.name: Olga

texts.en:
Olga, 49, shares her home with her husband. They live in Olmos, a rural region in northern Peru primarily populated by small farmers.

Olga runs a small general store out of her home, selling a wiD. range of items including drinks, candy, and foodstuffs. She has run the business for a number of years and enjoys serving her neighbors and improving their access to items.

Olga plans to use the loan to purchase additional inventory in order to meet the increased demand she is expecting for the holiday season. It is her dream to expand the store to sell additional items and improve her client service.

loans.use: To purchase additional inventory

loans.name: Camen Bethy

texts.en:
Carmen, 40, shares her home with her husband in the district of Olmos in northern Peru, a primarily rural area with a number of small farmers.

Carmen runs a small general store selling a broad range of products including detergent, candy, canned food, vegetables, drinks and other general products. She would like to continue to expand her business and improve her capital. She is proud to be able to serve her community and increase their access to basic items.

The loan will be used for the purchase of additional inventory, as Carmen hopes to be able to meet client demand and improve her income. It is important to her to continue growing her business in order to better provide for her family and the community.

loans.use: To purchase additional inventory

loans.name: Lara Marleni

texts.en:
Lara, 50, lives with her partner and their two minor children in Salas in the región of Lambayeque. She manages a small general store selling a variety of basic items including food, hygienic supplies and candy. She is proud to serve her community and increase their access to general items. He husband works as a field hand on local farms.

Lara plans to use the loan to purchase additional inventory in order to ensure that she has the proper quantity of products for the holiday season and expand her business. She hopes this will help her get nearer to her dream of running a large full-size store in the same town.

loans.use: To purchase additional inventory

loans.name: Pelegrina

texts.en:
Pelegrina is 59 years old. She lives in her own home and shares it with her children. She is very well known in her hometown as a supportive and intelligent member of the community. She lives in Pan de Azucar in the region of Oyotun. It is a rural area with many small farmers.

Pelegrina owns one hectare on which she normally plants rice or other crops depending on the season and the proper rotation of crops. She plans to invest this loan in the harvest of the upcoming crop and the planting of the next crop. She needs to purchase fertilizers and seed in order to assure a good crop yield. She has worked with Edpyme Alternativa in the past and has a good history of payment.

loans.use: For farming supplies and labor

loans.name: Feliza

texts.es:
Feliza  es socia del  Banco Comunal “San Salvador”, ubicado en el distrito D. Capachica, provincia D. Puno, Departamento D. Puno, tiene 50 años D. edad, D. estado civil viuda, con cinco hijos y con grado D. instrucción D. primaria  incompleta.
Feliza viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace siete años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue D. S/.300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en la compra y venta D. ganado ovino. 
Ahora solicitara un nuevo préstamo D. S/ 1300.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que le permitirá incrementar el capital D. su negocio. 
Su sueño  es tener un restaurant. Lo  que le gusta del Banco Comunal  es la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Feliza is a member of the San Salvador Communal Bank, which is located in the District of Capachica, Province and Department of Puno. She is 50 years old, widowed, and has five children. Feliza did not finish her elementary school education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for seven years. The first loan she requested was for 300 PEN, which she used for buying and selling sheep.

Now she is requesting a new loan in the amount of 1300 PEN to increase her business capital. Her dream is to open a restaurant. What she likes most about her Communal Bank is the punctuality.

loans.use: Additional operating capital for buying & selling sheep

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To improve her restaurant and increase her service to her clients

loans.name: Noemi

texts.en:
Noemi is 22 years old. She lives with her husband and their 3-year-old daughter. It is a very loving and happy home and they have great attitude and excitement to improve their lives. They live in the sector of San Salvador in the district of Paijan, approximately forty minutes outside of the city of Trujillo. They own their home and live in an urban zone.

Noemi sells beauty products of the Eskia brand. She has been running her business for a number of years and she has a solid client base. She sells products both on credit and on request. She also maintains a small inventory so that she can make immediate sales to new clients. Her clients appreciate her high level of customer service and flexible terms. Noemi’s husband has a stable job in the city.

This will be Noemi’s first loan with Edpyme Alternativa. She plans to use the loan to purchase additional inventory in order to better serve her clients during the holiday season. She also plans to use a portion of the funds to meet a few personal expenses for her home and to improve her family’s quality of life. Noemi is proud to be a solid income source for her family and to be maintaining her own business.

loans.use: To purchase additional inventory

loans.name: Flavia

texts.es:
Flavia es socia del Banco Comunal “Ciudad Nueva” ubicado en el distrito D. Pilcuyo, provincia D. El Collao, departamento D. Puno, tiene 45 años D. edad, D. estado civil casada y con cuatro hijos, tiene grado D. instrucción D. primaria incompleta.
Ella viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace cuatro años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue S/ 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero pudo utilizar para  incrementar el capital D. su negocio D. engorD. D. ganado vacuno.
La señora solicitara un nuevo monto S/ 3000.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que le permitirá incrementar el capital D. su negocio.
Su sueño es crecer en su negocio. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es conversar y la unión.
texts.en:
Flavia is a member of the Communal Bank “Ciudad Nueva” (New City), which is located in the District of Pilcuyo, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. She is 45 years old, married, and has four children. Flavia did not finish her elementary school education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for four years. The first loan she requested was for 300 PEN, which she used to increase her business capital for fattening cattle.

Sra. Flavia is requesting a new loan in the amount of 3000 PEN so that she can increase the operating capital for her business. Her dream is to grow in her business. What she likes most about her Communal Bank are the conversations and the unity.

loans.use: Increase her operating capital

loans.name: Flavia

texts.es:
Flavia es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Mensajeras”  ubicado en el distrito de Juliaca, provincia de San Román, departamento de Puno, tiene 36 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y con 05 hijos. La señora realizó estudios de educación secundaria completa.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 03 años, su primer préstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de  su negocio de venta de comidas y bicicletas de segunda mano.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra de insumos para su negocio venta de comidas y también en la venta de bicicletas de segunda mano.
	
Su sueño para el futuro es tener una casa y mejorar el negocio. Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  son las charlas y capacitaciones.
texts.en:
Flavia is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Mensajeras” (The Messengers), which is located in the District of Juliaca, San Román Province, Department of Puno. She is 36 years old, in a common law marriage, and has five children. Flavia completed her high school education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for three years. Her first loan was for 300 PEN, which helped increase her business capital for selling food and secondhand bicycles.

Now she is requesting a new loan in the amount of 1000 PEN to invest in the purchase of supplies for her food business as well as merchandise for her other business of selling secondhand bicycles.

Flavia dreams of having a house and improving her business in the future. What she likes most about her Communal Bank are the discussions and the training seminars.

loans.use: Operating capital for her food business & her other business of selling secondhand bikes

loans.name: María Auxiliadora

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora María ella tiene 57 años de edad, está casada y tuvo 10 hijos todos mayores de edad, dos de ellos viven con ella, el marido es agricultor. Ella es parte del Banco Comunal hace ya seis ciclos este es el séptimo y le gusta porque los intereses son muy bajos y fáciles de pagar.
 
Ella se dedica a la producción y comercialización de dulces, todas las mañanas se levanta a las 5am a preparar los dulces los mismos que realiza con mucha paciencia y cariño nos dice que esa es la clave para que las cosas salgan bien hacer las cosas con mucho amor, una vez preparado sus deliciosos dulces, los entrega a comerciantes que se los llevan a vender a otros cantones y ciudades del país, en esta labor le ayuda uno de sus hijos. Lleva en este negocio desde hace 30 años y dice que su mamá le enseño a preparar los dulces.

Este crédito es para comprar los ingredientes necesarios para la fabricación de los dulces. Su sueño siempre ha sido tener una microempresa con maquinarias para producir mayor cantidad de dulces.
texts.en:
The members of the Communal Bank “Mujeres Organizadas” [Organized Women] meet every two weeks at the Rocafuerte Canton. This place is known for its delicious sweets made by the locals and recognized throughout the country.

Maria is 57 years old, married, and has 10 adult children. Two of them live with her and her husband who is a farmer. She has been part of the communal bank for six loan cycles, this will be her seventh. She likes the bank because the interests are low and easy to pay.

She makes and sells sweets. She gets up every morning at 5:00am to make them which she does with patience and love. She says that these are the key to obtaining wonderful results. Once the sweets are ready she gives them to other vendors who take them to various cantons and cities around the country. She has done this work for 30 years and she says her mother taught her how to do it. One of her children helps her with her work

This loan will be used to buy the necessary ingredients to make the sweets. Her dream has been to have a small company with the appropriate machinery to make the sweets in large quantities.

loans.use: To buy the ingredients to prepare sweets

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María es socia del Banco Comunal “22 de Setiembre” ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 46 años de edad, de estado civil viuda,  con dos hijos y sin estudio.
María viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela R. desde hace un año, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le permitió iniciar con el negocio de compra y venta de animales menores, ahora no solo realiza el negocio ya antes mencionado sino también se dedica al engorde de ganado vacuno.
La señora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 3000.00 nuevos soles,  préstamo que le permitirá incrementar el capital  de su negocio.
Su sueño es progresar en su negocio y tener un restaurant.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es el ahorro.
texts.en:
María is a member of the September 22nd Communal Bank, which is located in the District of Ilave, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. She is 46 years old, widowed, and has two children. María did not receive an education.

She has been working with Manuela R. for the past year. The first loan she requested was for 300 PEN, which she used to start her business of buying and selling small animals. In addition to this business, she has also started fattening cattle.

Sra. María is requesting a new loan in the amount of 3000 PEN to increase the capital for her business. Her dreams are to make progress with her business and to open a restaurant. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the savings.

loans.use: Additional operating capital for buying & selling livestock

loans.name: Angela Mercedes

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

La señora Angela es parte del Banco Comunal hace ya seis años y en la actualidad se desempeña como fiscal de pagos del Banco. Tiene 35 años de edad, está casada y freto de esta relación tiene tres hijos de 15 – 14 y 11 años, los mayores están en el colegio y el menor en la escuela. El marido tiene una fábrica de adoquines y además es albañil. Ella estudió ciencias en la educación en la Universidad Técnica De Manabí y obtuvo el título de licenciada y en la actualidad es profesora de una escuela.

Este crédito solicitado es para el negocio del esposo ya que es el negocio de la familia, el trabaja de lunes sábado desde las 8am hasta las 17h00 en la fabricación y venta de los adoquines, nos cuenta que les vende tanto a personas particulares como a las instituciones públicas que necesitan de ellos para arreglar calles y veredas. En las tardes la señora le ayuda mas que todo en lo que es venta y contabilidad de la pequeña empresa. Trabaja con dos personas a los que él les paga un sueldo semanal.

Este crédito es para comprar cemento y otros materiales necesarios para la fabricación de los adoquines. Su sueño es que el negocio crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
In Rocafuerte canton, the 'Mujeres Organizadas' (Organized Women) community bank meets every fortnight.  This place is known for the delicious sweets and desserts which its residents make.  They are well known throughout the country.

Angela has been a member of the community bank for six years.  She is currently the bank's collector of payments.  She is 35 years old, married, and has three children aged 15, 14 and 11.  Her oldest children are in high school and her youngest is in elementary school.  Angela's husband has a paving stone factory and is also a construction worker.  Angela studied Education Sciences at Manabí Technical University and is currently a school teacher.

This loan is for her husband's business since it is a family business.  He works from Monday to Saturday, from 8.00am to 5.00pm, making and selling paving stones.  She tells us that he sells them to the general public as well as to public institutions who need them to repair streets and sidewalks.  In the afternoon, Angela helps her husband mostly with sales and the small business' accounts.  She works with two people to whom her husband pays a weekly wage.

This loan will be used to buy cement and other necessary materials for making paving stones.  Her dream is for the business to keep growing every day.

loans.use: To buy cement and other materials for making paving stones

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
Manuela es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Mensajeras” ubicado en el distrito de Juliaca, provincia de San Román, departamento de Puno, tiene 46 años de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 03 hijos (01 dependiente), la señora asistió hasta 5to de educación  secundaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 07 años, su primer préstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital de  su negocio de venta de puertas, mesas, sillas y otros muebles de madera.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá comprando materiales para su taller de carpintería y elaborar puertas, mesas, sillas y otros muebles.
	
Su sueño es tener una casa. Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  son las reuniones por que intercambian palabras con las socias.
texts.en:
Manuela is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Mensajeras” (The Messengers), which is located in the District of Juliaca, San Román Province, Department of Puno. She is 46 years old, married, and has three children (one of whom is a dependent). Manuela attended secondary school through the fifth year.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for seven years. Her first loan was for 300 PEN, which helped increase her business capital for selling doors, tables, chairs, and other types of wood furniture.

Now she is requesting a new loan in the amount of 1000 PEN to invest in the purchase of materials for her carpentry shop. They will be used to make doors, tables, chairs, and other furniture pieces.

Manuela dreams of having a house. What she likes most about her Communal Bank are the meetings in which she gets to exchange words with the other members.

loans.use: Purchase materials for her carpentry shop

loans.name: Mercedes Esperanza

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

La señora Mercedes  tiene 60 años de edad y hace varios años su compañero de toda su vida falleció y quedo viuda, pero de esta relación tuvo tres hijos que fueron su compañía y fortaleza en sus momentos difíciles. Uno de sus hijos aun vive con ella.

Ella tiene una pequeña  tienda de productos de primera necesidad  en la que trabaja todos los días desde las 6am hasta las 19h00. También vende artículos de bazar y papelería.  Los productos de su tienda la compra en Portoviejo y Rocafuerte, también recibe en su local ciertos productos como gaseosas y otras bebidas. Nos dice que su tienda es herencia de sus padres que le dejaron cuando ellos fallecieron hace ya muchos años.

Este crédito lo va a invertir en comprar mas productos para surtir su tienda.  Está en el Banco Comunal hace ya tres años y le gusta por la ayuda que recibe con los créditos. Sus sueños son seguir trabajando y gozar de salud.
texts.en:
In Rocafuerte canton, the 'Mujeres Organizadas' (Organized Women) community bank meets every fortnight.  This place is known for the delicious sweets and desserts which its residents make.  They are well known throughout the country.

Mercedes is 60 years old.  Several years ago her life partner died and she was left a widow.  However, she has three children from the relationship who were her company and strength in  difficult times.  One of her children still lives with her.

Mercedes has a small convenience store in which she works every day from 6.00am to 7.00pm.  She also sells stationery.  She buys the products for her store in Portoviejo and Rocafuerte.  She also receives certain products such as soda and other drinks in her store.  She tells us that she inherited the store from her parents who left it to her when they died many years ago.

Mercedes will invest this loan in buying more products to stock her store.  She has been a member of her community bank for three years and she likes it for the help which she receives with the loans.  Her dreams are to continue working and to enjoy good health.

loans.use: To buy convenience store items and stationery

loans.name: Digna Viviana

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

La señora Viviana tiene 31 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual ha procreado tres hijos de 11 – 5  y 2 años de edad, los mayores están en la escuela. Su marido es profesor de un colegio de la ciudad.

Tiene un negocio de imprenta y papelería, también realiza trabajos en computadoras, en su negocio vende desde útiles escolares, libros y otros materiales que los estudiantes utilizan para su aprendizaje, trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las 6h30 hasta las 21h00, le ayudan su mamá y su hermano. Además de esto ella y su esposo realizan trabajos de mantenimiento de computadoras en la localidad. 

Este crédito es para comprar mas productos de imprenta y papelería. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio y está muy contenta en el Banco Comunal ya que gracias a los créditos ha logrado salir adelante en su negocio. Su sueño es prosperar en su negocio por el bien de su familia.
texts.en:
In Rocafuerte canton, the 'Mujeres Organizadas' (Organized Women) community bank meets every fortnight.  This place is known for the delicious sweets and desserts which its residents make.  They are well known throughout the country.

Viviana is 31 years old and lives with her common-law husband.  They have three children aged 11, 5 and 2.  The older children are in school.  Her husband is a school teacher in the town.

Viviana has a printing and stationery business.  She also does work on computers.  In her business she sells school supplies, books and other things that students use in their studies.  She works from Monday to Saturday, from 6.30am to 9.00pm.  Her mom and her brother help her out.  As well as this, she and her husband service computers locally.

This loan will be used to buy more printing and stationery products.  Viviana has been in her community bank from the very beginning and she is very happy because, thanks to the loans they provide, she has managed to get ahead in her business.  Her dream is to prosper in her business for the well-being of her family.

loans.use: To buy printing and stationery items such as sheets of paper, school supplies, books, etc.

loans.name: Lucia Silvia

texts.es:
Lucia es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Mensajeras” ubicado en el distrito de Juliaca, provincia de San Román, departamento de Puno, tiene 56 años de edad, de estado civil casada y con 02 hijos, la señora tiene estudios de educación superior incompleta.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 06 años, el primer préstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de  su negocio venta de revistas y periódicos.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en la mercadería de su negocio.
	
Su sueño para el futuro es prosperar más en el negocio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones, las charlas y la solidaridad.
texts.en:
Lucia is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Mensajeras” (The Messengers), which is located in the District of Juliaca, San Román Province, Department of Puno. She is 56 years old, married, and has two children. Lucia completed her higher education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for six years. Her first loan was for 300 PEN, which helped increase her business capital for selling magazines and newspapers.

Now she is requesting a new loan in the amount of 1000 PEN to invest in merchandise for her business. For the future, Lucia dreams of continued prosperity in her business. What she likes most about her Communal Bank are the meetings, the discussions, and the unity.

loans.use: Increase the inventory of her news stand

loans.name: Angélica María

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

La señora Angélica es socia del Banco Comunal hace ya seis años y está muy agradecida con la Fundación Espoir por la ayuda que siempre le han brindado a través de los créditos. Ella tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tuvo una sola hija que es su adoración quien ya tiene 14 años y está en la escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una farmacia.

Ella se dedica además de su hogar al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo pero nos cuenta que lo que más vende es ropa de mujer y de niñas, trabaja los viernes, sábados y domingos desde las 8h30 hasta las 16h00 aunque si alguna cliente quiere algo la llama y ella la recibe en su  casa que es donde ella vende. Sus productos los compra en una distribuidora en Chone, ella vende al contado y también deja a crédito y cobra por semana.

Este crédito es para comprar ropa sobretodo de mujer y de niñas. Su sueño es llegar a tener una boutique.
texts.en:
In Rocafuerte canton, the 'Mujeres Organizadas' (Organized Women) community bank meets every fortnight.  This place is known for the delicious sweets and desserts which its residents make.  They are well known throughout the country.

Angélica has been a member of the community bank for six years and she is very grateful to Fundación Espoir for the help which they have always provided her with through their loans.  She is 38 years old and married.  She has one daughter who she adores.  Her daughter is 14 years old and in school.  Her husband works in a pharmacy.

Angélica looks after her home and also works selling all kinds of clothes.  However, she tells us that what she sells most of is women's and girls' clothes.  She works Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays from 8.30am to 4.00pm, though if a customer wants something they often ring her and she invites them to her home which is where she makes her sales.  She buys her products from a wholesaler in Chone.  She sells for cash but also sells on credit and collects payments weekly.

This loan will be used to buy clothes, especially women's and girls'.  Angélica's dream is to own a boutique.

loans.use: To buy women's and girls' clothes

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es:
Florencia es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Flores D. Vilquechico” ubicado en el distrito D. Vilquechico, provincia D. Huancané, departamento D. Puno, tiene 63 años D. edad, D. estado civil viuda y tiene 06 hijos independientes, la señora no ha estudiado en ningún centro educativo.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 01 año, el primer préstamo solicitado fue D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital D. su negocio D. venta D. artesanías.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo D.  S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar lanas para la producción D. sus ponchos. 
	
Su sueño para el futuro es tener más capital para su negocio.

Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal  son las reuniones y la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Florencia is a member of the community bank "Las Flores D. Vilquechico", located in the district of Vilquechico in the province of Huancané in the department of Puno.  She is 63 years old, married, and has six grown children.  She has never gone to school.

She began working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos one year ago.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles, which she used to increase the capital of her business that sells handicrafts.

She is now asking for a loan for 300 nuevos soles to purchase wool to make ponchos.

Her dream for the future is to have more money for her business.

The things she likes best about her community bank are the meetings and the punctuality.

loans.use: Purchase wool to make ponchos

loans.name: Yanis Del Carmen

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar encontramos a la señora Yanis, ella tiene 46 años de edad, está casada y tiene hija de 14 años que es su vida y a la cual cuida mucho, ella esta en tercer año de colegio. Su marido es comerciante. Ella es fundadora del Banco Comunal y está muy contenta ya que gracias a los créditos a podido aumentar su negocio.

Ella y su marido trabajan en la venta de frutas y legumbres, tienen un puesto en el mercado de Tarqui en Manta, trabajan todos los días, el desde las 5am hasta las 16h00 y ella llega un poco más tarde luego que su hija se va al colegio y solo trabaja hasta el medio día ya que su hija requiere de muchos cuidados, su mercadería la compran a comerciantes mayoristas que venden en el mercado y ciertos productos los llevan desde Rocafuerte.

Este crédito es para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio comprando frutas y legumbres. Sus sueños son tener una tienda en su casa y ver que su hija sea una gran profesional.
texts.en:
The members of the cooperative bank Mujeres Organizadas (“Organized Women”) meet every fifteen days in the zone of Rocafuerte.  This place is known for its delicious sweets, which are made by area residents and recognized throughout the country.

This is where we find Yanis who is 46 years of age, married, and has a 14-year old daughter who is her whole life and who she takes great care of.  She is in her third year of school.  Her husband is a merchant.  She is a founder of the cooperative bank, and is very happy since, thanks to the loans, she has been able to grow her business.

Yanis and her husband work selling fruits and vegetables.  They have a location at the Tarqui market in Manta.  They work every day, from 5 am to 4 pm.  She arrives a little later and only works until midday because her daughter requires care.   Their products are sold to wholesalers at the market, and she takes certain merchandise to Rocafuerte.

This loan is to continue investing in her business, through the purchase of fruits and vegetables.  Her dreams are to have a store in her home, and to see her daughter become a successful professional.

loans.use: To purchase fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca es socia del Banco Comunal “Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe II” ubicado en el distrito de Cojata, provincia de Huancané, departamento de Puno, tiene 39 años de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 04 hijos, realizó estudios de educación secundaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 04 meses,  nos cuenta que su primer préstamo fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de  su negocio de venta de abarrotes, golosinas y otros.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le servirá para comprar mercaderías para su tienda.
	
Su sueño para el futuro es tener más capital para su negocio y poder educar a sus hijos.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  son las reuniones.
texts.en:
Francisca is a member of the communal bank "Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe II" (Our Lady of Guadalupe II) located in the district of Cojata, Huancané province, in the department of Puno.  She is 39 years old, married, has 4 children and has completed high school.
  
She has been working with the Manuela Rosa Movement for 4 months.  Her first loan was for 500 nuevos soles (Peruvian currency), money that increased the capital for her business selling groceries, candy, etc.  

She is requesting a new loan for 500 nuevos soles. She will use the loan to buy merchandise for her store. 
	
She dreams that in the future she will have more business capital and be able to educate her children. 

What she likes most about her communal bank are the meetings.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her store

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca es socia del  Banco Comunal “San Salvador” ubicado en el distrito de Capachica, provincia de Puno, Departamento de Puno, tiene 54 años de edad,  estado civil casada, con ocho hijos y sin estudio.
La señora tiene su negocio de venta de pescado entre ellos Carachi y pejerrey. Ella viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace dos años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero utilizo para comprar redes de pesca, actividad realizada por su esposo.
Ahora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 1500.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que le permitirá incrementar el capital de su negocio. 
Su sueño  es seguir adelante con su negocio. Lo  que le gusta del Banco Comunal es el ahorro.
texts.en:
Francisca is a member of the “San Salvador” community bank which is located in Capachica district, Puno province, Puno department.  She is 54 years old, married and has 8 children.  She never attended school.

Francisca has a business selling different types of fish including 'carachi' and 'pejerrey'.  She has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 2 years.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles which she used to buy fishing nets for her husband.

She is now requesting a loan for 1,500 nuevo soles which she will use to increase her business capital.

Her dream is to succeed in her business.  What she most likes about her community bank is the savings.

loans.use: To increase the working capital of her business

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

Nuestra amiga María tiene 26 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual ha procreado dos hijos de 1 año y dos meses y un bebe de solo dos meses, su marido tiene un disco móvil. Ella es parte del Banco Comunal hace un año, este es su tercer ciclo en el banco y le ha gustado por las facilidades de pagos de las cuotas.

Tiene un bar en la Universidad Técnica De Manabí, donde vende una gran variedad de bocadillos o comida rápida, entre lo que mas vende están los corviches, los panes de almidón entre otros. También vende yogurt granizado, colas, refrescos, café y té para los que prefieren de estos productos. Trabaja de lunes a viernes desde las 8am hasta las 11am y de 17h00 hasta las 20h30 y los sábados solo de mañana. Tiene en este negocio 6 años y le ha ido bien. Los corviches y panes  de almidón los compra a una señora que le prepara para que ella venda.

Este crédito es para comprar mas de los productos que ella vende en su bar. Su sueño es tener su  local propio ya que donde vende es alquilado y tiene que pagar una mensualidad a la Universidad.
texts.en:
The members of the cooperative bank Mujeres Organizadas (“Organized Women”) meet every fifteen days in the zone of Rocafuerte.  This place is known for its delicious sweets, which are made by area residents and recognized throughout the country.

Our friend María is 26 years old and in a common-law marriage that has produced two children, a 1-year old and a baby that is only 2 months old.  Her husband has a disc jockey business.  She has been a member of the cooperative bank for one year; this is her third cycle with the bank, and she has appreciated the credit terms.

She has a pub at the Technical College of Manabí, where she sells a variety of snacks and fast foods.  Her corviches and bread, among other items, are what sell most.  She also sells yogurt, sodas, beverages, coffee and tea, for those who prefer these products.  She works from Monday to Friday from 8 am to 11 am, and from 5 pm to 8:30 pm, and on Saturdays only in the morning.  She has had the business for 6 years, and things have gone well for her.  She buys the corviches and breads from a lady who makes them for her to sell.

This loan is for the purchase of more products for her to sell in her pub.  Her dream is to have her own locale, since where she works now is a rented space and she has to pay monthly rent to the College.

loans.use: To purchase corviches, breads, sodas, beverages, yogurt, tea, coffee, etc.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca es socia del Banco Comunal “Punta Sahuacasi” ubicado en el distrito Azángaro,  provincia de Azángaro y departamento de Puno, tiene 48 años de edad, de estado civil  conviviente y tiene 03 hijos (01 dependientes), la señora estudió educación primaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 02 años, nos cuenta que el primer préstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  utilizó para  incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de escobas y escobillas para zapatos.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá  para comprar materiales para su negocio como colas, alambres y maderas.

Su sueño para el futuro es engrandar su taller. Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la facilidad del préstamo y intercambiar palabras con las socias.
texts.en:
Francisca is a member of the “Punta Sahuacasi” community bank which is located in Azángaro district, Azángaro province, in the department of Puno.   She is 48 years old and lives with her partner.  She has 3 children (1 dependent).  She completed her primary education.

Francisca has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 2 years.  She tells us that her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles which she used to increase the working capital of her business selling brooms and shoe brushes.

She is requesting a new loan for 1,000 nuevos soles which she will invest in buying material for her business such as glue, wire and wood.

Her dream for the future is to expand her workshop.  What she most likes about her community bank is the ease of obtaining a loan and being able to chat with other members.

loans.use: To buy material such as glue, wire and wood

loans.name: Gladys Roxana

texts.es:
Gladys  es socia del Banco Comunal “22 de Setiembre” ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 26 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y con un hijo, tiene grado de instrucción de cuarto de primaria.
La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace cinco años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital de su negocio de  engorde de ganado vacuno (toro).
Ahora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 3000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le permitirá incrementar el capital  de su negocio.
Su sueño es tener toros de raza bronsuis. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la puntualidad, orden y las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
Gladys is a member of the “22 de Setiembre” (22nd of September) community bank which is located  in Ilave district, El Collao province, in the department of Puno.  She is 26 years old.  She lives with her partner and has one child.  She studied up to the fourth year of elementary school.

Gladys has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 5 years.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles which she used to increase the working capital of her business fattening cattle (bulls).

She is now requesting a new loan for 3,000 nuevos soles which will allow her to increase her business capital.

Her dream is to have bulls of the Bronsuis breed.  What she most likes about her community bank is the punctuality, the order and the training sessions.

loans.use: To increase her business capital

loans.name: Teresa Margarita

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar encontramos a  la señora Teresa,  ella tiene 54 años de edad y hace varios años su esposo falleció, pero de esta relación tuvo dos hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, tiene a su cargo a un nieto de 16 años  que es como su hijo y estudia en el colegio.

Además de ser una ama de casa también tiene una pequeña fábrica donde fabrica y vende chifles, también prepara  comida, trabaja todos los días, desde las 6am se dedica a la fabricación de los chifles que luego con la ayuda de su nieto se encarga de entregar a distintos lugares de Rocafuerte, vende en cebicherías y tiendas.  La comida vende es en las tardes.

Este crédito es para comprar plátanos, aceite y otros ingredientes para la fabricación de los chifles y además productos para la preparación de los alimentos que vende. Está en el Banco Comunal desde los inicios y le gusta porque los intereses son muy bajos en relación a los bancos.  Su sueño es tener una microempresa con maquinarias.
texts.en:
The members of the cooperative bank Mujeres Organizadas (“Organized Women”) meet every fifteen days in the zone of Rocafuerte.  This place is known for its delicious sweets, which are made by area residents and recognized throughout the country.

This is where we find Teresa, who is 54 years old and a widow for several years.  However, from her marriage, she has two grown children.  She is caring for a 16-year old grandson, who is like her own son, and who is in school.

In addition to being a homemaker, she also has a small workshop where she makes and sells chifles (fried plantain chips) and prepared foods.  She works every day from 6 am, making the chifles and then, with the help of her grandson, delivering them to different locations in Rocafuerte.  She sells to food stands and stores.  She sells the food in the afternoons.

This loan is to buy plantains, cooking oil, and other ingredients for making the chifles and the other foods she sells.  She has been with the cooperative bank since its inception, and she likes it because the loan interest rates are much lower than other banks.  Her dream is to have a micro-enterprise with machinery.

loans.use: To purchase plantains, cooking oil, salt and other supplies.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria es socia del Banco Comunal “22 de Setiembre” ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 27 años de edad, estado civil soltera y con tres hijos, tiene grado de instrucción  primaria completa.
Gloria viene trabajando con Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace cinco años, el primer préstamo solicitado que fue de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles,  le sirvió para incrementar el capital de su negocio de engorde de ganado vacuno (toro).
Ahora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 1000.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que le permitirá incrementar el capital  de su negocio.
Su sueño es crecer en su negocio. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es el ahorro que genera ganancia.
texts.en:
Gloria is a member of the “22 de Setiembre” (22nd of September) community bank which is located  in Ilave district, El Collao province, in the department of Puno.  She is 27 years old, single and has three children.  She completed her primary education.

Gloria has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for five years.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles which she used to increaes the working capital of her business fattening cattle (bulls).

She is now requesting a new loan for 1,000 nuevos soles which will allow her to increase her business capital.

Her dream is to help her business grow.  What she most likes about her community bank is the interest she makes on her savings.

loans.use: To increase her business capital

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
Gregoria es socia del Banco Comunal “Punta Sahuacasi” ubicado en el distrito de Azángaro,  provincia de Azángaro, departamento de Puno, tiene 57 años de edad, de estado civil  conviviente y con 02 hijos (01 dependiente), la señora estudió solo hasta primero de educación primaria.

Viene  trabajando con  el Movimiento  Manuela  Ramos  desde hace 02 años, su primer   préstamo fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de  su negocio venta de animales menores.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar ovejas.

Su sueño para el futuro es mejorar su negocio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la puntualidad y lo que gana el ahorro.
texts.en:
Gregoria is a member of the “Punta Sahuacasi” community bank which is located in Azángaro district, Azángaro province, in the department of Puno.  She is 57 years old, lives with her partner and has 2 children (1 of whom is still dependent).  She only studied up to the first year of elementary school.

Gregoria has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 2 years.  Her first loan was for 500 nuevos soles which she used to increase the working capital of her business selling young animals.

She is requesting a new loan for 300 nuevos soles which she will use to buy sheep.

Her dream for the future is to improve her business.

What she most likes about her community bank is the punctuality and what she makes on her savings.

loans.use: To buy sheep to invest in her business

loans.name: Angela Margarita

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

Aquí conocimos a la señora Angela, ella tiene 55 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tuvo 4 hijos ya todos mayores de edad. El marido es comerciante. Ella esta en el Banco Comunal hace  ocho años,  está muy contenta y le gusta por la ayuda que recibe por parte de la Fundación  Espoir.

Es un ama de casa que junto a su esposo tienen un negocio de producción y venta de helados. Trabajan todos los días desde las 7am hasta las 17h00. Ella fabrica los helados de distintos sabores que luego su esposo sale a vender en un carro  que tienen, por la localidad y por los campos, ella también vende sus ricos helados en su casa. Además también en las tardes prepara meriendas que vende en su casa hasta las 20h00. Nos cuenta que llevan en este negocio ya 20 años y que a pesar de la competencia les va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar los productos que utilizan en la preparación de los deliciosos helados. Sus sueños son seguir trabajando y gozar de salud.
texts.en:
The members of the cooperative bank Mujeres Organizadas (“Organized Women”) meet every fifteen days in the zone of Rocafuerte.  This place is known for its delicious sweets, which are made by area residents and recognized throughout the country.

We meet Angela here, who is 55 years old, married, and has 4 grown children.  Her husband is a merchant.  She has been with the cooperative bank for eight years, and is very content and happy for the help she receives from Fundación Espoir.

She is a homemaker who, with her husband, has a business making and selling ice cream.  They work every day from 7 am to 5 pm.  She makes ice cream of a variety of flavors, and then her husband uses their vehicle to travel around selling their products throughout the locality and countryside.  She also sells her delicious ice creams from her house.  In addition, she prepares snacks in the afternoons, which she sells from her house until 8 pm.  She tells us she’s been in business for 20 years and that, despite competition, things are going well for her.

This loan is for the purchase of ingredients she uses to make her ice creams.  Her dreams are to continue working and to enjoy good health.

loans.use: To purchase ingredients for making ice cream, such as fruits, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
Gregaria es socia del Banco Comunal “Santiago Apóstol” ubicado en el distrito de Paucarcolla, provincia de Puno, departamento de Puno, tiene 32 años de edad, estado civil casada y con 3 hijos, tiene grado de instrucción  de primaria completa.
Gregaria viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace cinco años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le permitió incrementar la mercadería de su negocio, nos cuenta que lleva quinua lavada y carne de cordero, a las diferentes ferias de mina rinconada, lugar perteneciente a una de las provincias de Puno.
Ahora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 1000.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que le permitirá aumentar la mercadería de su negocio.
Su sueño es  seguir adelante con su negocio y tener una ferretería en la ciudad de Puno. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  es el ahorro que genera las ganancias.
texts.en:
Gregoria is a member of the community bank "Santiago Apóstol", located in the district of Paucarcolla in the province of Puno in the department of Puno.  She is 32 years old, married, and has three children.  She finished primary school.

Gregoria has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for five years.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles, which allowed her to increase the merchandise for her business.  She brings quiN. and lamb to different markets in Mina Rinconada in one of the provinces of Puno.  

Now she is asking for a new loan for 1000 nuevos soles to increase the merchandise in her business.

Her dream is to continue improving her business and have a stall in the market in the city of Puno.  The thing she likes best about the community bank is the savings, which generate profits.

loans.use: Increase the merchandise for her business

loans.name: Gricelda

texts.es:
Gricelda es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Mensajeras” ubicado en el distrito de Juliaca, provincia de San Román, departamento de Puno, tiene 33 años de edad, de estado civil soltera y con 04 hijos, la señora tiene estudios de educación secundaria incompleta.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 05 años, nos cuenta que su primer préstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de abarrotes.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero con el que comprará mercaderías para su tienda de abarrotes.
	
Su sueño para el futuro es tener una casa, mejorar su tienda y hacer estudiar a sus hijos.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo y la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Graciela is a member of the community bank "Las Mensajeras" which translates to "The Messengers". The bank is located in the district of Juliaca in the San Roman province which is located in the department of Puno. Graciela is 33 years old, is single and has four children. She did not complete her secondary education. 

Graciela has been working with field partner Movimiento Manuela Ramos for five years. Her first loan was in the amount of 300 nuevos soles (PEN) which she used to increase the working capital for her grocery business. 

She is now requesting a loan in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles (PEN) which she will use to buy merchandise for her grocery store. 

Her dreams for the future are to have a home, to improve her store and to provide her children with an education.

What she likes most about her community bank is the ease of the loan and its punctuality.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Karina Elizabeth

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Charapoto se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal San Esteban. Esta localidad se conoce por su cultura tradicional y además por estar a pocos minutos de dos de las  mejores playas de la provincia como son San Jacinto y San Clemente.

En este lugar encontramos a Karina, ella tiene 25 años de edad, está soltera y vive en casa de sus padres. Este es el sexto ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y sin tantos requisitos, además por que los intereses son bajos.

Ella se dedica a la comercio vende ropa y zapatos por catalogo.  También vende productos de Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas) trabaja todos los días por las tardes, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella visita a sus clientes les enseña la revista para que ellos vean que es lo que desean comprar, luego ella realiza los pedidos y entrega los productos los mismos que deja a crédito y cobra cada quince días.

Este nuevo crédito es para comprar más de su mercadería en especial ropa que es lo que mas vende. Su sueño es tener su propio almacén.
texts.en:
The members of the cooperative bank San Esteban meet every fifteen days in the city of Charapoto.  This locality is known for its traditional culture, and also for being just a few minutes away from two of the best beaches in the province, San Jacinto and San Clemente.

We find Karina here, who is 25 years old, single, and lives with her parents.  This is her sixth cycle with the cooperative bank and she likes it because the loans are quick and don’t require as much paperwork.  In addition, the interest rates are low.

She dedicates herself to commerce, selling clothing and shoes by catalog.  She also sells Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women’s accessories).  She works every day in the afternoon, selling door-to-door, visiting customers to show them the catalog so they can choose what they’d like to purchase.  Later, she places the orders and delivers the products herself.  She delivers on credit, and collects payment every fifteen days.

This new loan is to purchase more merchandise, especially clothing, which is what sells best.  Her dream is to have her own store.

loans.use: To purchase clothing, shoes and cosmetics.

loans.name: Gumercinda

texts.es:
Gumersinda es socia del  Banco Comunal “Bartolina Sisa”, ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia de EL Collao, Departamento de Puno, tiene 46 años de edad,  de estado civil casada y con cuatro hijos, tiene grado de instrucción de primaria  completa.
Gumersinda viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace doce años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/.300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le permitió  incrementar  el capital  de su negocio de engorde de ganado vacuno. 
La señora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 1500.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que le permitirá incrementar el capital de su negocio. 
Su sueño  es crecer en su negocio. Lo  que le gusta del Banco Comunal  es aprender de las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
Gumersinda is a member of the community bank "Bartoilna Sisa" which is located in the Llave district, provinde of El Collao in the department of Puno. She is 46 years old, is married and has four children. She completed her primary education. 

Gumersinda has been working with field partner Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 12 years. Her first loan was in the amount of 300 nuevos soles (PEN) which allowed her to increase the working capital of her business which is fattening cattle. 

She is requesting a new loan in the amount of 1500 nuevos soles (PEN) which will allow her to increase the working capital of her business. Her dream is to expand her business. What she likes about the community bank is learning new skills.

loans.use: Increase the working capital for her business.

loans.name: Ramona Monserrate

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Charapoto se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal San Esteban. Esta localidad se conoce por su cultura tradicional y además por estar a pocos minutos de dos de las  mejores playas de la provincia como son San Jacinto y San Clemente.

La señora Ramona tiene en el Banco Comunal 4 años y esta muy contenta ya que gracias  a los créditos a logrado sacar su negocio y su familia adelante. Tiene 41 años de edad, está casada y tuvo un hijo pero falleció, en la actualidad esta embarazada.

Ella se dedica a la venta de joyas de Visón, sale los sabados y domingos, deja a crédito y cobra cada fin de semana. Además su esposo tiene un taller de ebanistería donde realizan trabajo a base de madera como muebles, sillas y camas, realiza muchas obras a personas que llegan  hasta su taller a pedir que le realice sus obras. También fabrica para entregar a un almacén. Trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las 8am hasta las 17h00.

Este crédito es la mitad para comprar joyas de visón y la otra parte es para comprar madera para el negocio de su esposo. Sus sueños son tener a su hijo y que sea sano.
texts.en:
Ramona has been a member of her community bank for 4 years.  She is very happy because, thanks to the loans, she has managed to make progress in her business and get her family ahead in life.  She is 41 years old and is married.  She had one son but he died.  She is currently pregnant.

Ramona sells Visón jewelry.  She goes out every Saturday and Sunday, leaving her products on credit and collecting payment for them every weekend.  Her husband has a cabinet-making workshop where he makes furniture, chairs and beds.  He makes many items for people who come to his workshop with their orders.  He also makes furniture which he delivers to a store.  He works from Monday to Saturday, from 8.00am to 5.00pm.

Half of this loan will be used to buy Visón jewelry and the other half will be used to buy wood for her husband's business.  Ramona's dream is to have a child and for her child to be healthy.

loans.use: To buy jewelry and wood

loans.name: Hermelinda

texts.es:
Hermelinda es socia del Banco Comunal “22 de Setiembre” ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 27 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y con dos hijos, tiene grado de instrucción secundaria completal.
Hermelinda tiene un local de imprenta en donde hace todo tipo de tarjetas, volantes y muchos otros. Ella viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace cinco años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en el negocio que en aquel tiempo realizaba lo cual era cría, compra y venta de chanchos.
La señora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 3000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le permitirá ampliar su negocio de imprenta a través de la compra de materiales.
Su sueño es crecer en su negocio. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  es el ahorro que genera ganancia y la alegría.
texts.en:
Hermelinda is a member of the community bank "22 de Septiembre" which is located in the Llave district, El Collao province, in the department of Puno. She is 27 years old, lives with her live-in partner and has two children. She completed her secondary education.

Hermelinda has a printing business where she makes all types of cards, flyers and other products. She has been working with field partner Movimiento Manuela Ramos for five years. The first loan she received was in the amount of 300 nuevos soles (PEN) which she used to invest in the business she had at the time which was raising, buying and selling pigs. 

She is requesting a new loan in the amount of 3000 nuevos soles (PEN) which will allow her to expand her printing business through the purchase of materials. 

Her dream is to expand her business. What she likes about the community banks is the savings that generate earnings and the happiness it provides.

loans.use: Purchase materials for her printing business.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Charapoto se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal San Esteban. Esta localidad se conoce por su cultura tradicional y además por estar a pocos minutos de dos de las  mejores playas de la provincia como son San Jacinto y San Clemente.

Aquí encontramos a la señora María, ella tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta linda relación tiene tres hijos de 18, 15 y 8 años los mayores están en el colegio y el menor en la escuela. Su marido es comerciante.

Tiene un negocio de compra y venta de fundas plásticas, trabaja de jueves a domingo en su local ya que es en estos días hay mas movimiento en el sector, empieza su labor desde las 8am hasta las 17h00 que cierra en esos días. Sus productos los va  a comprar a Guayaquil en una fábrica llamada Plasti Sud. Este negocio lo han mantenido ya por cinco años.

Este crédito es para ir a comprar sus productos para tener para las ventas del mes. Está en el Banco Comunal hace ya 15 años y esta muy contenta por eso y le gusta por la seriedad de sus compañeras. Su sueño es tener un negocio mas grande y con otras sucursales.
texts.en:
In the city of Charapoto, the 'San Esteban' community bank meets every fortnight.  This place is known for its traditional culture and also because it is only a few minutes from two of the best beaches in the province, San Jacinto and San Clemente.

Here we find María.  She is 43 years old and married.  From this beautiful relationship, she has three children aged 18, 15 and 8.  The older children are in high school and the youngest is in elementary school.  Her husband is a salesman.
